tsn: 11 feb 2010motlotlegi mmusakgotla.
zul: 11 feb 2010somlomo ohloniphekile.

tsn: modulasetilo wa lekgotla la bosetshaba la diporofense.

tsn: motlatsammusakgotla wa kokoanobosetshaba gammogo le motlatsamodulasetilo wa lekgotla la bosetshaba la diporofense.
zul: phini likasomlomo wesishayamthetho sikazwelonke nephini likasihlalo womkhandlu kazwelonke wezifundazwe.

tsn: motlatsamoporesidente wa rephaboliki, motlotlegi kgalema motlanthe.
zul: phini likamongameli weriphabhulikhi, mhlonishwa kgalema motlanthe.

tsn: motlotlegi moatlhodimogolo wa rephaboliki ya aforika borwa le ditokololo tse di tlotlegang tsa boatlhodi.
zul: mhlonishwa jaji elikhulu leriphabhulikhi yaseningizimu afrika kanye nawo wonke amalungu ahloniphekile.

tsn: isithwalandwe, moporesidente nelson rolihlahla mandela.

zul: ondunankulu abahloniphekile nosomlomo bezishayamthetho zezifundazwe zethu.

zul: sihlalo wenhlangano yohulumeni basekhaya yaseningizimu afrika nabo bonke ubuholi bohulumeni basekhaya.

tsn: iditlhogo tsa ditheo tsa puso tse di tshegetsang temokerasi ya molaotheo.
zul: sihlalo wendlu kazwelonke yamakhosi endabuko.

tsn: mmusisi wa banka ya resefe.
zul: zinhloko zezikhungo zikahulumeni eziseka intando yeningi.

tsn: baeng ba boditshabatshaba ba ba kgethegileng, bogolosegolo modulasetilo wa khomisene ya kopano ya aforika, rre jean ping.
zul: zimenywa zomhlaba ezikhethekile, ikakhulukazi usihlalo wekhomishana yenhlangano yamazwe ase-afrika, mnu.

tsn: bagolegwa ba sepolotiki ba maloba, mmogo le bagaka.
zul: ziboshwa zezombusazwe zangaphambilini kanye nezingqalabutho.

tsn: ditokololo tsa mephato ya sedipolomatiki.
zul: malungu amanxusa.

tsn: bobegakgang jwa aforika borwa le ba batswantle.
zul: abezindaba baseningizimu afrika kanye nangaphandle.

tsn: maaforika borwa a gaetsho.
zul: zakhamizi zaseningizimu afrika.

tsn: dumelang, molweni, goeienaand, good evening, dumelang botlhe ka fa lapeng!
zul: dumelang, molweni, goeienaand, good evening, sanibonani nonke emakhaya!

tsn: re itumelela go nna le lona mo maitseboeng ano a a botlhokwa go gaisa.
zul: siyajabula ukuba nani ngalobu busuku obubaluleke kangaka.

tsn: motlotlegi mmusakgotla,ke ema fano fa pele ga lona maitseboeng ano dingwaga di le 20 go tloga motsi moporesidente nelson rolihlahla mandela a golotsweng mo kgolegelong.
zul: somlomo ohloniphekile,ngimi phambi kwenu kule ntambama, sekuphele iminyaka enga-20 selokhu unelson rolihlahla mandela aphuma ejele.

tsn: re tlhophile letsatsi leno go epa pitso ya bonno jwa motlhakanelwa jwa palamente, go neela puo ya maemo a setshaba, gore re keteke motsi wa phetogo ya diragadibonwe e e fetotseng naga ya rona.
zul: sikhethe lolu suku ukubiza lokhu kuhlala ngokuhlanganyela kwezindlu zombili zephalamende ukuthula inkulumo echaza isimo sezwe, ukugubha lo mzuzu ongumlando owashintsha izwe lethu.

tsn: go gololwa ga mandela go tlhodilwe ke kgaratlho ya go itoma sesino ya baagi ba aforika borwa.
zul: ukukhululwa kukamadiba kwalethwa yimizabalazo eqinile yabantu baseningizimu afrika.

tsn: bagolegwa ba sepolotiki ba maloba mmogo le bagaka ba ba nang le rona gajaana, ke basupi ba ntlha e ka gobo ba nnile karolo ya tiragalo eo.
zul: ababeyiziboshwa zezombusazwe kanye nezingqalabutho ezinathi namhlanje la zakubona lokho ngoba zaziyingxenye yalolo hlelo.

tsn: lo tla gakologelwa gore matshutitshuti a naga e, a le mo digongwaneng tse di farologaneng, a ne a tsibogela kgwetlho ya go tlhola botlhokataolego jwa naga mmogo le go fedisiwa ga tlhaolele ka maikaelelo a magolo tota.
zul: nizokhumbula ukuthi abantu bakuleli lizwe, kwizinhlangano zabo ezahlukene, baphendula ngokuzimisela ekhweleni lokwenza izwe lingabuseki nobandlululo lungasebenzi.

tsn: re keteka letsatsi le, re le mmogo le bagolegwa ba sepolotiki ba maloba ba re ba laleditseng ka tsela e e kgethegileng.
zul: sigubha lolu suku neziboshwa zangaphambilini zezombusazwe ezimenywe ngokukhethekile ukuthi zihlanganyele nathi.

tsn: re amogela bogolosegolo bagolegwa ba ba maloba ba ba tsereng mosepele go tswa moseja ga mawatle gore ba tle go nna fano helene pastoors, michael dingake go tswa botswana, rre andimba toivo ya toivo wa swapo kwa namibia.
zul: samukela kakhulukazi labo abahambe besuka emazweni angaphandle ukuba lapha, uhelene pastoors, michael dingake basebotswana, mnu.

tsn: re motlotlo gobo re na le ditokololo tsa setlhopha sa babueledi ba tsheko ya boepapuso ya rivonia ?
zul: andimba toivo ya toivo weswapo enamibia.

tsn: gareng ga tse dingwe, rre schwarz o nnile tokololo ya setlhopha sa babueledi ba rivonia.
zul: sijabula kakhulu ukuba namalungu eqembu labameli ecaleni laserivonia lokuvukela umbuso ?

tsn: balelapa loo mandela ba nnile sekai sa boineelo jwa bontsi, jo bo duleng setlhabelo sa kgobelelo ya tlhaolele.
zul: phakathi kokunye, wayeyilungu leqembu elalimele abasolwa erivonia.

tsn: re isa madume go boeteledipele jwa lekoko le le busang mmogo le balekanesemphato.
zul: sidlulisa ukubonga kwethu kubangani bethu kanye namaqabane emazweni omhlaba ngokulwa ngokuhlanganyela nathi ukuze sithole inkululeko.

tsn: bakaulengwe le ditsala,mo letsatsing leno le le kgethegileng, re tshwanetse go amogela go tsenya seatla ga boeteledipele jwa national party, jo kwa bofelong bo lemogileng gore tlhaolele ga e na bokamoso.
zul: sibingelela ubuholi beqembu elibusayo kanye nozakwethu bombimbi, kubona okuwumcimbi obalulekile lona.

tsn: ntetleng go bolela seabe se moporesidente wa maloba pw botha a nnileng naso.
zul: bantu bakithi kanye nabanganikulolu suku olukhethekile, kufanele sivume igalelo lalabo ababesebuholini be-national party, abagcina bebonile ukuthi ubandlululo lwalungenalo ikusasa.

tsn: ke ena a ragositseng puisano ka ga kgonego ya kgololo ya bagolegwa ba sepolotiki.
zul: nguye owaqala izingxoxo mayelana namathuba okukhululwa kweziboshwa zezombusazwe.

tsn: moporesidente botha o dirile mmogo le tona ya bosiamisi ya maloba, rre kobie coetzee yo ena a neng a thusiwa ke ngaka neil barnard le mike louw.
zul: umongameli ubotha wasebenza nowayengungqongqoshe wezobulungiswa umnu.

tsn: ba nnile le seabe sa botlhokwa mo go betleng tsela ya kgololesego ya ga madiba.
zul: badlala indima ebalulekile enqubeni eyaholela ekukhululweni kukamadiba.

tsn: bakaulengwe ba ba tlotlegang,aforika borwa e sa ntse e tla amogela ka botlalo, seabe sa botlhokwatlhokwa se moporesidente wa anc wa maloba oliver tambo a nnileng le sone ka go aga motheo o naga eno e duleng sekao se se phatsimang sa kgololesego le temokerasi.
zul: bantu bakithi abahloniphekile,iningizimu afrika ayikaze ibonge ngokugcwele indima ebalulekile eyadlalwa ngumongameli wangaphambilini we-anc, iqabane u-oliver tambo, owakha isisekelo sokuthi leli lizwe libe yisibonelo esikhazimulayo senkululeko kanye nentando yeningi.

tsn: ke boeteledipele jwa gagwe jo bo tlhololo, ponelopele mmogo le pono e e edileng, tse di tataisitseng anc gore e nonotshe motlhala wa tumalano ka dipuisano.
zul: kwaba wubuholi bakhe obuqotho, ukubona izinto eziphambili kanye nokucaca kombono okwaholela ukuthi i-anc iqinise ukufuna isixazululo esenziwe ngezingxoxo.

tsn: botlhale jwa gagwe bo itshupile gape mo tlhomamisong ya harare, e a e kwadileng le go e tswerefatsa.
zul: ubuhlakani bakhe baphinda bavela ngesikhathi sesimemezelo saseharare asibhalayo waphinda wasisekela.

tsn: se ke sona se tlhomileng motheo wa dikitsiso tsa hisetori ka moporesidente fw de klerk, dingwaga di le 20 tse di hulereng.
zul: yilokhu okwenza umsebenzi oyisisekelo ngezimemezelo ezaba yingqophamlando ezenziwa ngumongameli fw de klerk eminyakeni engama-20 edlule.

tsn: ka dikitsiso tse, moporesidente de klerk o supile bopelokgale mmogo le boeteledipele jo bo edileng.
zul: kulokhu, umongameli de klerk wakhombisa isibindi esikhulu kanye nobuholi obukwaziyo ukuthatha izinqumo.

tsn: mo letsatsing le legolo leno, nte ke amogele le seabe se se tserweng ke moswi mme helen suzman.
zul: kulolu suku olukhulu, angiphinde ngibonge indima eyadlalwa ngunkz.

tsn: mo pakeng e telele, helen suzman o nnile ntsweesi mo palamenteng,a goa phetogo.
zul: helen suzman ongasekho.

tsn: re amogela le seabe sa moeteledipele wa inkatha freedom party, kgosi mangosuthu buthelezi, yo le ena a goileng kgololesego ya ga madiba mmogo le ya bagolegwa ba sepolotiki ba bangwe, a bo a goa le poelogae ya batshediswamelelwane.
zul: esikhathini eside, nguye kuphela ephalamende owayeshumayela izwi lokuthi kube khona ushintsho.

tsn: re gatelela tebogo ya rona ya botswapelo go morafe wa boditshabatshaba malebana le tshegetso ya bona e e tlhomameng mo kgaratlhong ya rona.
zul: siyaphinda sibonga siyanconcoza emphakathini womhlaba ngokuseseka kwawo emzabalazweni wethu.

tsn: metsotso e etsa eno mo hisetoring ya rona e supa bokgoni jwa rona jwa go tshwaragana, le mo maemong a a bokete go gaisa, ka maikaelelo a go eteletsa dikgatlhegelo tsa naga pele, go gaisa dikgatlhegelo tsotlhe tse dingwe.
zul: lezi zikhathi emlandweni wethu zikhombisa ikhono lethu lokuhlangana, ngisho ngaphansi kwezimo ezinzima kakhulu, futhi sibeke intshisekelo yezwe phezu kwazo zonke ezinye izintshisekelo.

tsn: fa re dirisana re ka fitlhelela go le gontsintsi.
zul: ngokusebenzisana singenza okuningi.

tsn: maloko a a tlotlegang,mo tsamaong ya ngwaga o, re tla tshwaya ngwaga wa ngwagakgolo wa tlhomo ya kitlano ya aforika borwa e e tlhomilweng ka 1910. se se tlhamile naga e e kopaneng.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile,ngokuhamba kwalo nyaka, sizobe siqela ikhulunyaka lokusungulwa kwenhlanganisela yezwe laseningizimu afrika, neyasungulwa ngonyaka we-1910.

tsn: se se lemogiwang ke gore go tlhotlhololwa ga bantsho mo kopanong e, e nnile lebakalegolo la go tlhomiwa ga african national congress ka 1912. fa re tshwaya ngwagakgolo o, moragonyana monongwaga, re tshwanetse go leba gore naga ya rona e tsamaile sekgala se le kae go tloga ka 1912. maloko a a tlotlegang, re gakologelwa mafoko a ga madiba ka motsi wa go gololwa ga gagwe fa a ne are mme ke a nopola:?
zul: kakhulukazi ukushiywa kwabantu abamnyama kule nhlanganisela kwaba ngesinye sezizathu sokusungulwa kweqembu le-african national congress ngonyaka we-1912.

tsn: go sa lape go ineela ga lona, ka bogaka, go nkgontshitse go nna fa, mo tsatsing jeno.
zul: ukuzinikela kwenu okungakhathali futhi okukhombisa ubuqhawe kwenze ngakwazi ukuba la namhlanje.

tsn: ka jalo ke baa dingwaga tse di setseng tsa botshelo jwa me mo diatleng tsa lona?.
zul: ngakho-ke ngibeka iminyaka yempilo yami esele ezandleni zenu.

tsn: mafoko a a re rotloetsa gore re se ka ra bo ra ikhutsa go fitlhela re fitlhelela ditlhologelelo tsa morafe o o gololesegileng mo lehumeng le kiletso.
zul: "la mazwi asigqugquzela ukuthi singaphumuli, kuze kube sifeza imigomo yomphakathi okhululekile kububha kanye nasencindezweni.

tsn: mo dingwagasomeng di le pedi tsa kgololesego ya ga madiba, motheo wa naga ya rona o fetogile.
zul: eminyakeni engamashumi amabili selokhu kwakhululwa umadiba, izwe lethu lishintshe kakhulu.

tsn: moporesidente mandela o tshwaragantse naga e malebana le phitlhelelo ya demokerasi le tswelelopele e e se nang kgethololo ya bong kana semorafe.
zul: umongameli mandela wabumba leli lizwe ngaphansi kwephupho elilodwa leningizimu afrika engabandlululi ngokobulili, ngokobuhlanga, enentando yeningi futhi eqhakazile.

tsn: jaaka re keteka kgololesego ya ga madiba gompieno, a re itlameng seswa go aga bokamoso jo bo botoka go maaforika borwa otlhe, bantsho le basweu.
zul: njengoba sigubha ukukhululwa kukamadiba namhlanje, asiphinde sizibophezele ukwakha ikusasa elingcono lazo zonke izakhamizi zaseningizimu afrika ezimnyama nezimhlophe.

tsn: a re tebeleng tlhologelelo e madiba a e lwetseng botshelo jwa gagwe jotlhe, tlhologelelo ya morafe wa demokerasi o o gololesegileng fao batho ba botlhe ba tshelang mmogo ka kagiso mme ba na le tshono e e lekanang.
zul: asiqhubeke nokufuna ukufeza imigomo ayilwele impilo yakhe yonke umadiba- umgomo womphakathi okhululekile futhi onentando yeningi, lapho umphakathi uphila ndawonye ngokuthula futhi ube namathuba alinganayo.

tsn: maloko a a tlotlegang,re epile pitso ya bonno jwa motlhakanelwa ya maitseboa gore bontsi jwa batho mo nageng, badiri mmogo le bana ba sekolo, bo kgone go nna karolo ya motsi ono.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile,sibize ukuhlala kwezindlu zephalamende zombili kule ntambama ukuze abantu abaningi ezweni lethu, abasebenzi kanye nezingane zesikole, babe yingxenye yalo mcimbi.

tsn: re kgatlhilwe ke matlhagatlhaga a baswa malebana le motsi o. bana ba le makgolopedi masomethataro thataro go tswa diporofenseng tsotlhe, ba tsere karolo mo dikganetsanong tsa ketelela maemo a setshaba, malebana le seabe sa baswa mo ntweng kgatlhanong le lehuma.
zul: zingamakhulu amabili namashumi ayisithupha nesithupha izingane ezisuka kuzo zonke izifundazwe ezibambe iqhaza kwinkulumo-mpikiswano eyandulela inkulumo echaza isimo sezwe mayelana neqhaza lentsha ekulweni nobubha.

tsn: re akgola mofenyikakaretso, charlotte le fleur wa sekolosegolwane sa worcester, mmogo le batsaakarolo botlhe ka matsapa a bona.
zul: sihalalisela ucharlotte le fleur wasesikoleni samabanga aphezulu iworcester odle umhlanganiso kanye nabo bonke ababambe iqhaza ngokusebenza ngokuzikhandla.

tsn: bakaulengwe le ditsala,re kopane fano mo lemoragong la maemo a tlalelo ya ikonomi ya lefatshe.
zul: bakwethu kanye nabangani,sihlangana ngaphansi kwesimo sokukhahlamezeka komnotho womhlaba.

tsn: mo ngwageng o o fetileng, re itemogetse kwelotlase ya ntlha mo dingwageng di le 17. kwelotlase e, e jetse ikonomi ya rona ditiro di ka nna 900 000. bontsi jo bo latlhegetsweng ke ditiro e nnile batlamelalapa mo malapeng a bahumanegi.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, sibhekane nokuphelelwa ngamandla komnotho wethu okokuqala ngqa eminyakeni eyi-17.

tsn: ka tlhakole ngogola baemedi ba puso, bagwebi, badiri mmogo le baagi ba dumalane ka dikgato tsa go fokotsa kelo le maatla a tlalelo.
zul: le nkinga iholele ekulahlekeni kwemisebenzi eyi-900 000. abaningi balabo abalahlekelwa yimisebenzi kwakuyibona abondla imindeni edla imbuya ngothi.

tsn: re diragaditse tirisomadi ya puso e e kgatlhanong le kwelotlase, bogolosegolo mo dipopotheong.
zul: siqalisile ukusebenzisa indlela yokuchitha imali kuhulumeni elwisana nokuphelelwa ngamandla komnotho, kakhulukazi kwingqalasizinda.

tsn: go bebofaletsa bokobodikhutshwane, re atolositse madi a tlamelo ya bana go akaretsa bana ba ba fetang dingwaga di le 14. mo dingwageng di le tharo tse di latelang, palo e e okeditsweng ka dimilione di le pedi ya bana go tswa malapeng a batlhoki bana ba dingwaga di le 15 go ya go 18 e tla ungwa go tswa go maditlamelo a bana.
zul: ukuqinisekisa ukuvikeleka kwabadla imbuya ngothi, sisheshe senza ukukhushulwa kwezibonelelo zikahulumeni, saphinda sanyusa iminyaka yezingane ezihola izibonelelo zikahulumeni zezingane zaba ngaphezu kweminyaka eyi-14 ubudala.

tsn: setlamo sa tlhabololo ya madirelo se beetse kwa thoko r6 bilione go thusa ditlamo tse di khidiegileng.
zul: eminyakeni emithathu ezayo, ezinye izingane ezingaphezu kwezigidi ezimbili eziqhamuka emindenini kanye nasemakhaya adla imbuya ngothi ezineminyaka eyi-15 kuya kweyi-18 zizohlomula kusibonelelo sikahulumeni sezingane.

tsn: puso e itsisitse ?
zul: uhulumeni uqalise ?

tsn: sekema sa katiso?
zul: uhlelo lukuqeqeshwa emsebenzini?

tsn: go neela badiri tlhotsho ya nako ya go katisiwa go na le go rodisiwa tiro.
zul: ukunikeza abasebenzi ithuba lokuqeqeshwa kunokudilizwa.

tsn: setshaba se tla gakologelwa gore ka nako ya puo ya maemo a setshaba ya 2009, ke itsisitse gore lenaneo le le atolositsweng la ditiro tsa setshaba le tla tlhola tshono ya ditiro di le 500 000 pele sedimonthole wa 2009 a khutla.
zul: le mizamo yenziwa ngcono wuhlelo lwemisebenzi yomphakathiisizwe sizokhumbula ukuthi kunkulumo echaza isimo sezwe yonyaka we-2009, ngamemezela ukuthi uhlelo olunwetshiwe lwemisebenzi yomphakathi luzovula amathuba emisebenzi ayi-500 000 ngozibandlela ka-2009.

tsn: tseno ke ditshono tsa ditiro tse di tlholwang go neela batho ba ba sa direng, lotseno, maitemogelo a tiro mmogo le tshono ya go katisiwa.
zul: lawa mathuba emisebenzi akhelwe ukunikeza abantu abangasebenzi amasentshana, isipiliyoni somsebenzi kanye namathuba okuqeqeshwa.

tsn: maloko a a tlotlegang, maaforika borwa a gaetsho,re motlotlo go itsise gore fa sedimonthole a khutla, ke fa re tlhodile ditshono tsa ditiro tsa setshaba di le 480 000, e bong 97% ya ntlhatebo e re neng re e totile.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile, bantu baseningizimu afrika,sinenjabulo yokubika ukuthi ekupheleni kukazibandlela, bese sakhe amathuba emisebenzi yomphakathi angaphezu kwe-480 000, nokungamaphesenti angama-97 omkhawulo esasizibekele wona.

tsn: ditiro, tse di mo mefameng e e jaaka kago, tlhokomelo ya fa gae le ya morafe, mmogo le diporojeke tsa tikologo.
zul: imisebenzi yakhiwe ezindaweni ezifana nezokwakha, onompilo bomphakathi kanye nabasemakhaya, kanye nasezinhlelweni zezemvelo.

tsn: re lemogile dikarolo tse di tlhokang tokafatso, tse re tla di tlhokomelang fa re ntse re gatela pele, go akarediwa netefatso ya diporojeke tse di tlhokang diatla tsa badiri, bogolosegolo.
zul: sihlonze ezinye izindawo ezidinga ukwenziwa ngcono ezizoba nomthelela kwinqubekela phambili, okubandakanya ezinye izinhlelo ezisebenzisa abasebenzi abaningi.

tsn: re a itse gore dikgato tse mmogo le tse dingwe di ka se timole bogale jwa sephetho sa kwelotlase.
zul: siyazi ukuthi lezi zinyathelo kanye nezinye ngeke ziqede ngokuphelele umthelela wokukhahlamezeka komnotho.

tsn: re motlotlo ka mowa wa lelapa, wa morafe, le wa boithaopi, o o rotloetsang bontsi jwa batho go thusa ba ba amilweng ke tlalelo, mo nakong eno e boima.
zul: siyabonga ngomoya womndeni, womphakathi kanye nomsebenzi wobuvolontiya ogqugquzele abantu abaningi ukusiza labo abakhahlanyezwe yile nkinga, kulezi zikhathi ezinzima.

tsn: maloko a a tlotlegang,ditshupo tsa ikonomi di tlhagisa gore gajaana re a retologa.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile,izinkomba zomnotho zikhombisa ukuthi sesiyaphuma manje kule nkinga.

tsn: maemo a ikonomi a a tlhatloga mo aforika borwa, mme re solofetse kgolo go tloga fa go ya pele.
zul: imisebenzi yezomnotho iyakhula eningizimu afrika futhi silindele ukukhula ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.

tsn: dipalopalo tsa bodiri tse di golotsweng ka labobedi di supa gore ikonomi gajaana e tlhola ditiro go gaisa go di fedisa.
zul: izibalo zabasebenzi ezikhishwe ngolwesibili, zikhombisa ukuthi manje umnotho wakha imisebenzi kunokuyiqeda.

tsn: ka jalo, puso ga e ye go gogela tshegetso ya yona morago.
zul: ngakho-ke uhulumeni ngeke azihoxise izinyathelo zakhe zokweseka.

tsn: gajaana ke nako ya go ala motheo wa kgolo e e tiileng fa re ya pele, kgolo e e tlhamang ditiro tse dingwe.
zul: manje sekuyisikhathi sokwakha umsebenzi oyisisekelo sokukhula ngokuqina njengoba siphikelele phambili, kanye nomnotho okhulisa amathuba emisebenzi.

tsn: lenaneo la rona la ditirelo la pakatelele le tla re thusa go gola ka lebelo.
zul: uhlelo lwethu lwesikhathi eside lwengqalasizinda luzosisiza ukuthi sikhule ngesivinini.

tsn: mananeo a rona a thuto le bokgoni a tla oketsa kumo le bogaisani.
zul: izinhlelo zethu zezemfundo kanye namakhono zizokhulisa ukukhiqiza kwethu kanye nokuncintisana.

tsn: leanotiro la pholisi ya bodiredi mmogo le tebontshwa ya ditiro tse diswa, di tla aga madirelo a a maatla le a a ngokang badiri.
zul: uhlelo lwethu lokusebenza lwenqubomgomo yezimboni kanye nokugxila kwethu emisebenzini yemvelo luzokwakha izimboni eziqinile futhi eziqasha abasebenzi abaningi.

tsn: mananeo a rona a tlhabololo ya magae a tla tokafatsa kumo ya selegae mmogo le matshelo a batho ba ba tshelang mo mafelong a magae.
zul: uhlelo lwethu lokuthuthukisa izindawo zasemakhaya luzokwenza ngcono ukukhiqiza ezindaweni zasemakhaya, kanye nezimpilo zabantu abahlala ezindaweni zasemakhaya.

tsn: motheo wa mananeo a rona a tsosoloso le kgodiso ya ikonomi ke mananeo a peeletso ya madi.
zul: isisekelo seqhinga lethu lokusimama kanye nokukhula komnotho, wuhlelo lwethu lokutshala izimali.

tsn: mo dingwageng tse tharo tse di tlang, puso e tla dirisa r846 bilione malebana le dipopotheo tsa setshaba.
zul: eminyakeni emithathu ezayo, uhulumeni uzochitha izigidigidi ezingama-846 zamarandi kwizingqalasizinda zomphakathi.

tsn: mo go tsa dipalangwa, re tla tshola le go godisa mafaratlhatlha a ditsela.
zul: kwezokuthutha, sizokhanda futhi sisabalalise ubuxhakaxhaka bemigwaqo yethu.

tsn: re tla netefatsa gore mafaratlhatlha a rona a diporo a a ikanyega, a kgona go gaisana, e bile a nyalana le go golagana botoka le boemelakepe.
zul: sizokwenza isiqiniseko ukuthi ubuxhakaxhaka bemizila yethu ehamba izitimela ithembekile, iyancintisana futhi ididiyelwe kahle nezikhumulo zethu zemikhumbi.

tsn: go netefatsa kabo ya maatlamotlakase e e ikanyegang, re tlhomile komiti ya ditona ya maatlamotlakase, go re kgontsha go tlhama thulaganokgolagano ya dingwaga di le 20. gareng ga tse dingwe, thulagano e, e ya go leba botsayakarolo jwa batsweletsi ba maatlamotlakase ba ba ikemetseng ka bosi, mmogo le go sireletsa batlhoki kgatlhanong le tlhotlhwa ya motlakase e e tlhatlogang.
zul: ukuqinisekisa ukuphakelwa kukagesi okuthembekile, sakhe ikomidi likagesi elakhiwe ngongqongqoshe, ukuthuthukisa uhlelo oludidiyelwe lwemithombo lweminyaka engama-20.

tsn: re ya go tlhoma botsamaisi jo bo ikemetseng, jo bo sa golaganang le eskom holdings.
zul: phakathi kwezinye izinto, lokhu kuzobheka ekubambeni iqhaza kwabakhiqizi bakagesi abazimele, kanye nokuvikela abadla imbuya ngothi kumanani kagesi akhuphukayo.

tsn: eskom e tla tswelela go aga mothamo o o okeditsweng wa maatla, le go tokafatsa tlamelo ya diteisene tsa yona tsa maatlamotlakase.
zul: sizosungula umlawuli wohlelo oluzimele, olungahlangene nenkampani yakwa-eskom.

tsn: re tlhamile lekgotlakgakololo la matlafatso e e atolositsweng ya ikonomi ya go tlhomamisa thotloetso ya ikonomi e e akaretsang botlhe.
zul: u-eskom uzoqhubeka nokwakha ezinye iziphehlo zokukhiqiza ugesi kanye nokwenza ngcono ukukhandwa kweziteshi zokuphehlwa kukagesi.

tsn: tebo e e tshwanetseng go potlakelwa ya phetogo ya pholesi e tshwanetse go nna botsereganyi ka maikaelelo a go tlhola ditiro tsa baswa.
zul: lapho esizogxila khona ezinguqukweni zenqubomgomo kufanele kube wukungenelela ekwakheni imisebenzi yentsha.

tsn: kelo ya botlhokatiro mo basweng e kwa godimo ga palogare.
zul: amazinga entsha entula imisebenzi makhulu kakhulu kunokujwayelekile.

tsn: go ya go begwa ditshikhinyo tsa go etleetsa tlhotlhwa ya go thapa badiri ba baswa.
zul: iziphakamiso zizondlalwa ukuxhasa ezindlekweni zokuqasha abasebenzi abancane, ukukhuthaza amafemu ukuthi aqashe abasebenzi abangenaso isipiliyoni.

tsn: se se tla rotloetsa madirelo go thapa badiri ba ba se nang maitemogelo.
zul: okunye ukusatshalaliswa kwezinhlelo zokuqashwa komphakathi seziqalile.

tsn: katoloso e nngwe ya mananeo a go thapiwa ga setshaba e mo tseleng.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya ingqalasizinda yendawo kanye nezinhlelo zemfundo ephakeme kanye nezokufunda, ukunakekelwa emakhaya, ukulungiswa kwezikole kanye nezinhlelo zokuthuthukiswa kwezingane zisencane.

tsn: mo ngwageng o o fetileng re kgakotse mokgatlho wa bosetshaba wa tlhabololo ya baswa.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, sathula inhlangano kazwelonke yokuthuthukiswa kwentsha.

tsn: re kaetse setheo se go potlakisa tlhamo ya makala a sona naga ka bophara gore se kgone go re thusa go tsenya mananeo a tlhabololo ya baswa o moseleng o o maleba mo pusong.
zul: sijube inhlangano ukuthi isebenze ngokushesha ukwakha izinhlaka zayo, ezweni lonke, ukuze sikwazi ukufaka izinhlelo zokuthuthukiswa kwentsha kuhulumeni.

tsn: maloko a a tlotlegang,fa botsamaiso joo bo tsena tirong ngogola, re itlamile go dira ka natla gore re age naga e e nonofileng ya tlhabololo.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile,ngesikhathi lo hulumeni uthatha izintambo ngonyaka ofile, sazinikela ekusebenzeni ngokuzikhandla ukwakha umbuso othuthukayo oqinile.

tsn: re rile naga e, e ya go tsibogela ditlhokwa le ditlhologelo tsa batho, mme e ya go nna naga e e dirang botoka, e ntse e direla ka lobelo lo lo okeditsweng.
zul: sathi kuyoba umbuso ophendula kwizidingo kanye nezifiso zabantu, futhi osebenza kangcono futhi ngokushesha.

tsn: ngwaga ono, 2010, e ya go nna ngwaga wa go dira.
zul: lo nyaka we-2010 kufanele kube ngunyaka wokusebenza.

tsn: ponagalo e e itlhaolang ya botsamaisi jono e ya go nna gore bo itse gore batho ba tshela kae, bo tlhaloganya ditlhokwa tsa batho mme bo tsibogela ditlhokwa tse, ka lobelo lo lo okeditsweng.
zul: into eyenza lohulumeni uhluke ukuthi uyazi ukuthi abantu bahlala kuphi, uyaziqonda izindingo zabo, futhi uphendula ngokushesha.

tsn: puso e tshwanetse go dira ka lobelo lo lo okeditsweng, ka natla go gaisa mme e le ka manontlhotlho.
zul: uhulumeni kufanele asebenze ngokushesha, ngokuzikhandla futhi ngobuchule.

tsn: re lebeletse gore khuduthamaga le bodiredipuso bo inaakanye le maitlhomo a. re aga naga e e sokegetseng mo go direng le go diragatseng, mme re dira jaana ka go tokafatsa thulaganyo mmogo le kelotlhoko ya tiragatso le tlhatlhobo.
zul: sizolindela isigungu esiphezulu kanye nabasebenzi bakahulumeni ukuthi bathobele lo mbono.

tsn: re tlhoka le go nyalanya maiteko a tekatekanyo ya bong le lenaneo la tiro la puso.
zul: sakha umbuso ogxile ekusebenzeni, ngokwenza ngcono ukuhlela kanye nokuqapha nokuhlola indlela okusetshenzwa ngayo.

tsn: tiro e e tla netefatsa gore basadi, baswa le digole ba fitlhelela tshono ya tlhabololo.
zul: lesi sinyathelo sizoqinisekisa ukuthi abesimame, izingane kanye nabantu abakhubazekile bayakwazi ukuthola amathuba entuthuko.

tsn: re motlotlo go itsise tsela e ntshwa ya go dira dilo mo pusong.
zul: siyajabula ukwethula indlela entsha yokwenza izinto kuhulumeni.

tsn: tiro ya mafapha e tla lekanyetswa ka dipoelo tse di tlhamilweng go ya ka thulaganyo kelotlhoko ya tiragatso le tlhatlhobo.
zul: imisebenzi yeminyango izokalwa ngemiphumela ethuthukiswe ngokusebenzisa uhlelo lokuqapha nokuhlola indlela okusetshenzwa ngayo.

tsn: ditona tse di rweleng maikarabelo a poelo e e rileng, di tla saena tumalano ya tiragatso e e tletseng, le moporesidente.
zul: ongqongqoshe abanomsebenzi womphumela othile bazosayina isivumelwano esibanzi nomongameli.

tsn: tumalano e, e tla tlhalosa se se tshwanetseng go dirwa, gore se dirwa jang, ke mang, mo pakeng e e kae, go dirisiwa tekanyetso le didirisiwa dife.
zul: sizobalula ukuthi yini okufanele yenziwe, kanjani, ngubani, esikhathini esingakanani futhi kusetshenziswa kuphi ukukala kanye nezinsiza.

tsn: jaaka lo setse lo itse, re itlametse ditlapele tse tlhano:thuto, boitekanelo, tlhabololo ya metsemagae le bonno jwa batho, go tlhama ditiro tse di eletsegang, le go lwantsha bosenyi.
zul: njengoba nazi, sizibophezele emisebenzini emihlanu eseqhulwini: ezemfundo, ezempilo, ukuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemakhaya kanye nokuhlelwa kabusha komhlaba, ukwakha imisebenzi ehloniphekile kanye nokulwa nobugebengu.

tsn: go tlaleletsa fa, re tla dira ka natla go tokafatsa boleng jwa pusoselegae, tlhabololo ya dipopotheo lebonno jwa batho.
zul: phezu kwalokhu, sizosebenzela ukwenza ngcono indlela asebenza ngayo uhulumeni wasekhaya, ukuthuthukiswa kwengqalasizinda kanye nokuhlaliswa kwabantu.

tsn: re ya go dira ditiro di le mmalwa go fitlhelela dipoelo tse.
zul: sizoqala imisebenzi eminingana ekubhekeni ukufeza le miphumela.

tsn: re beile thuto le tlhabololo ya bokgoni jaaka pinagare ya dipholesi tsa puso.
zul: kuhlelo lwethu lonyaka we-2010 sifuna ukwenza ngcono ikhono lezingane zethu lokufunda, ukubhala, ukubala eminyakeni yemfundo eyisisekelo.

tsn: fa re sa dire se, re ka se ka ra tokafatsa boleng jwa thuto.
zul: ngaphandle uma senza lokhu, ngeke sikwazi ukwenza ngcono izinga lemfundo.

tsn: dintlhanaikaelelo tsa rona ka ga thuto di bonolo, le gale di botlhokwa.
zul: imikhawulo yemfundo esizibekele yona ilula kodwa ibalulekile.

tsn: re batla baithuti le barutabana ba nne kwa sekolong, mo phaposing, ka nako, ba ithuta le go ruta, diura di le supa ka letsatsi.
zul: sifuna othisha nabafundi babe sesikoleni, emagunjini okufundela, ngesikhathi, befunda futhi befundisa amahora ayisikhombisa ngosuku.

tsn: re tla thusa barutabana ka go ba neela dithulaganyotiro tse di tletseng, tsa letsatsi le letsatsi.
zul: sizosiza othisha ngokubanikeza izinhlelo zesifundo sosuku ezinqala.

tsn: go baithuti, re tla ba abela dibukatiro tse di ka dirisiwang bonolo, ka dipuo tsotlhe tse 11. go simolola monogwaga go ya pele, baithuti botlhe ba dikereite 3, 6 le 9 ba tla kwala diteko tsa puisokwalo le thutapalo tse di tla lekanyediwang ke balekanyetsi ba ba ikemetseng.
zul: kubafundi, sizobanikeza izincwadi okulula ukuzisebenzisa ngezilimi eziyi 11. kusukela kulo nyaka kuya phambili, bonke abafundi bebanga lesithathu, lesithupha kanye nelesishiyagalolunye bazobhala ukuhlolwa kwelitheresi kanye nezibalo okuhlelwe ngokuzimela.

tsn: re ikaelela go oketsa kelo ya phalolo ya diteko tse go tloga palogareng ya gajaana ya 35% le 40% go ya go bonnye, 60% ka 2014. dipholo di tla romelelwa batsadi gore ba sale morago tswelelopele ya bana.
zul: sihlose ukukhuphula izinga lokuphasa kulokhu kuhlolwa elisuka phakathi kwamaphesenti angama-35 kuya kwangama-40 eya okungenani kumaphesenti angama-60 ngonyaka we-2014.

tsn: go tlaleletsa fa, sekolo sengwe le sengwe sa tse 27 000 se tla tlhatlhojwa ke batlhankedi go tswa lefapheng la thuto ya motheo.
zul: phezu kwalokhu, isikole ngasinye ezikoleni eziyi-2700 sizohlolwa ngumhloli ophuma emnyangweni wemfundo eyisisekelo.

tsn: se se tla kwalwa mo rekotong ya pegelo e e kwadilweng e e ka runwang.
zul: lokhu kuyoqoshwa kumbiko obhaliwe olungisekayo.

tsn: re ikaelela go oketsa palo ya baithuti ba materiki ba ba ka kgonang go amogelwa kwa diyunibesithing go ya go 175 000 ka ngwaga ka 2014. re rotloetsa batsadi go dirisana le rona go netefatsa katlego se.
zul: sihlose ukukhulisa isibalo sabafundi bebanga leshumi abamukelekayo emanyuvesi nge-175 000 ngonyaka we-2014.

tsn: naptosa, sadtu le saou, foo ba neng ba boeletsa boitlamo jwa bona malebana le kgoeletso ya boleng jo bo kwa godimo jwa go ithuta le go ruta go simolola ka 2010. maloko a a tlotlegang,re tlhoka go beeletsa mo basweng go tlhomamisa gore re nna le mophato wa badiri o o nang le bokgoni jwa go tshegetsa kgolo le tlholego ya ditiro.
zul: siyasamukela isitatimende esithulwe yizinyunyana ezintathu zothisha, i-naptosa, sadtu kanye ne-saou, begcizelela ukuzinikela kwabo emkhankasweni wokufundisa nokufunda okuqotho ekuqaleni konyaka we-2010.

tsn: ka jalo, re rulaganyetsa go oketsa le go godisa katiso ya baswa ba dingwaga di le 16-25 malebana le ditirelo tsa thuto le katiso e e tswelelang.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile,sidinga ukutshala entsheni yethu ukuqinisekisa ukuthi bangabasebenzi abanamakhono futhi abakwaziyo ukusebenza ukusekela ukukhula kanye nokwakhiwa kwemisebenzi.

tsn: se, se tla re kgontsha go neela baithuti ba ba sa lekanelang yunibesithi, tshono ya go rutega.
zul: ngakho-ke sihlela ukuqeqesha intsha eneminyaka eyi-16 kuya kwengama-25 ezikhungweni zokuqeqeshwa kanye nokuqhutshezwa kwemfundo.

tsn: re dira mmogo le ditheo tsa thuto e kgolwane go netefatsa gore baithuti ba ba nang le tshwanelo ya go amogelwa, ba bona thuso ya madi, ka mosele wa sekema sa setshaba sa thuso ya matlole sa baithuti.
zul: lokhu kuzosenza sikwazi ukunikeza ithuba lesibili lemfundo kulabo, abangenayo imiphumela efanele yokubangenisa enyuvesi.

tsn: re beile dintlhaphitlhelelo tsa maemogodimo tsa tlhabololo ya bokgoni, go oketsa palo ya baenjenere le bategeniki, le go oketsa palo ya barutabana ba ba nonofileng ba mmetse mmogo le bonetetshi.
zul: sisebenza nezikhungo zemfundo ephakeme ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abafundi abafanele bathola usizo lwezezimali, ngokusebenzisa isikhwama sikazwelonke sokusiza abafundi ngezimali.

tsn: re tshwanetse ra oketsa le palo ya baswa ba ba tsenelang dithutela tirong mo maphateng a poraefete mmogo le a puso.
zul: siphinde sazibekela imikhawulo ethile yokuthuthukiswa kwamakhono, ukukhiqiza abanye onjiniyela kanye nochwepheshe, kanye nokukhulisa isibalo sothisha abaneziqu zezibalo kanye nesayensi.

tsn: poelo nngwe ya botlhokwa ke go netefatsa botshelo jo boleele jwa boitekanelo gommaaforika borwa otlhe.
zul: kufanele siphinde sikhulise isibalo sentsha eqeqeshelwa imisebenzi emikhakheni ezimele kanye nekahulumeni.

tsn: re tla tswelela go tokafatsa thulaganyo ya rona ya tlhokomelo ya boitekanelo.
zul: sizoqhubeka nokwenza ngcono uhlelo lwethu lokunakekelwa ngezempilo.

tsn: se se akaretsa kago le tlhabololo ya dikokelo le ditleliniki, mmogo le tokafatso ya maemo a tiro a badiri ba tlhokomelo ya boitekanelo.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya ukwakha kanye nokulungisa izibhedlela kanye nemitholampilo, kanye nokwenza ngcono izimo zokusebenza kubasebenzi bezempilo.

tsn: re utlwanetse bolekane le bankatlhabololo ya borwa jwa aforika, malebana le go tokafatsa bodiredi jwa dikokelo tsa puso mmogo le dikantoro tsa dikgaolo.
zul: sibambisane nebhange lentuthuko laseningizimu ne-afrika ukwenza ngcono ukusebenza kwezibhedlela zomphakathi kanye namahhovisi ezifunda.

tsn: re bile re dirisana le bankatlhabololo ya aforika borwa (dbsa) mmogo le koporasi ya tsweletso ya madirelo.
zul: sisebenza ngokubambisana futhi nebhange lentuthuko laseningizimu ne-afrika kanye nenhlangano yokuthuthukiswa kwezimboni, kuhlelo lukahulumeni ebambisene nezimboni ezizimele ukwenza ngcono izibhedlela kanye nokusiza ngezezimali ezinhlelweni.

tsn: maloko a a tlotlegang,re lebanwe ke go itebaganya le bonnete jwa gore boleelebotshelo go tswa pelegong, bo fokotsegile go tswa go di ngwaga di le 60 ka 1994 go ya go dingwaga di le ka fa tlasenyana ga 50 gajaana.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile,kufanele sibhekane neqiniso lokuthi iminyaka yokuphila kusuka uzalwa yehlile isuka kwengama-60 kuya ngaphansi kwengama-50 namhlanje.

tsn: ka jalo, re tshwaragane le go tsereganya go fokotsa kelo ya dintsho tse di tlholwang ke pelegi, go fokotsa phetetso ya hiv mmogo le go alafa hiv le lohuba.
zul: ngakho-ke, siyangenelela ukwehlisa izinga lokushona kwabantwana bezalwa, ukunciphisa ukusuleleka ngesandulela ngculaza kanye nokwelapha isandulela ngculaza kanye nesifo sofuba.

tsn: re ya go fokotsa dintsho tsa masea ka tiriso ya mananeo a a kwenneng a moento.
zul: sizophinda sehlise ukushona kwabantwana ngokusebenzisa uhlelo lokugoma.

tsn: re ya go busa mananeo a tsa boitekanelo kwa dikolong.
zul: sizobuyisela izinhlelo zezempilo ezikoleni.

tsn: re ya go diragatsa maitlamo otlhe a a tserweng ka letsatsi la lefatshe la aids, maitlamo a a amanang le mekgwa e meswa ya thibelo le kalafo ya hiv.
zul: sizoqalisa ukusebenzisa konke ukungenelela okwenziwa ngosuku lomhlaba lwengculaza oluphathelene nezinyathelo ezintsha zokuvimbela nokwelapha isandulela ngculaza.

tsn: re tshwaragane le tiro e e makitla go netefatsa gore tiro e, e diragala mo nakong e e utlwanetsweng.
zul: umsebenzi omkhulu uyaqhubeka ukwenza isiqinisekiso ukuthi lo msebenzi uhamba ngokohlelo.

tsn: re tla tswelela le ka paakanyetso ya go tlhomiwa ga thulaganyo ya puso ya insorense ya bosetshaba ya boitekanelo.
zul: sizoqhubeka namalungiselelo okwakha uhlelo lomshuwalense kazwelonke wezempilo.

tsn: maaforika borwa a gaetsho,re dira ka natla go netefatsa gore mongwe le mongwe mo aforika borwa o ikutlwa a babalesegile le gore o babalesegile.
zul: zakhamizi zaseningizimu afrika,sisebenza kanzima ukuqinisekisa ukuthi wonke umuntu eningizimu afrika uzizwa ephephile futhi kuphephile.

tsn: re ya go tsweletsa tiro ya rona go fokotsa bokebekwa jo bogolo, le go netefatsa gore thulaganyo ya bosiamisi e dira ka tolamo.
zul: sizoqhubezela phambili umsebenzi wethu wokunciphisa amacala abucayi kanye nanesihluku futhi siqinisekise ukuthi uhlelo lwezobulungiswa lusebenza ngendlela efanele.

tsn: re tsenya tirisong dithulaganyo tsa go oketsa palo ya mapodisi ka 10% mo dingwageng tse tharo tse di latelang.
zul: siqalisa ukusebenza kwezinhlelo zokukhuphula isibalo samaphoyisa ngamaphesenti ayi-10 eminyakeni emithathu ezayo.

tsn: re lemogile le go tlhaola jaaka ditlapele, ntwa kgatlhanong le go thopiwa ka dikgoka, thukutho ya mafelokgwebo le matlo, mmogo le bonokwane bo tshwana le polao, petelelo le kgobatso.
zul: sihlonze ukulwa nokuduna izimoto, ukuphangwa kwamabhizinisi kanye nezindlu, kanye nobugebengu obuhlanganisa abantu njengokubulala, ukudlwengula kanye nokushaya njengamacala aseqhulwini.

tsn: rotlhe re tshwanetse go nna le seabe.
zul: sonke sinendima okufanele siyidlale.

tsn: a re tseeng karolo mo ditheong tsa pabalesego tsa motse.
zul: asibambe iqhaza kuzinhlaka zokuphepha komphakathi.

tsn: a re leseng go reka dithoto tsa bogodu.
zul: asiyeke ukuthenga izimpahla ezebiwe.

tsn: a ka gale re nne re ipaakanyeditse go neela mapodisi tshedimosetso ka ga bosenyi.
zul: asihlale sikulungele ukunikeza amaphoyisa ulwazi mayelana nemisebenzi yobugebengu.

tsn: fa re dirisana re tla fenya bosenyibakaulengwe le baeng ba tlotlego,pusoselegae e tshwanetse go dira.
zul: ngokusebenzisana sizobunqoba ubugebengu.

tsn: bommasepala ba tshwanetse go tokafatsa thebolo ya matlo, metsi, kgeleloleswe, motlakase, taolo ya matlakala le ditsela.
zul: bakwethu kanye nezimenywa ezihloniphekile,uhulumeni wasekhaya kufanele asebenze.

tsn: re tsene pitso le bommeiyara le balaodi ba mmasepala ngogola.
zul: omasipala kufanele benze ngcono ukunikezelwa kwezindlu, amanzi, izindlu zangasese, ugesi, ukuphathwa kwemfucuza kanye nemigwaqo.

tsn: pitso e e re neetse tshedimosetso e e boteng malebana le dikgwetlho tse di fitlhelwang mo pusoselegaeng.
zul: lokhu kusivule amehlo mayelana nezinselelo ezikhona kuhulumeni wasekhaya.

tsn: re bile re etetse merafe le bommasepala ba ba farologaneng, go akarediwa balfour kwa mpumalanga mmogo le thembisa kwa gauteng.
zul: siphinde savakashela imiphakathi kanye nomasipala abaningana, kubandakanya ibalfour empumalanga kanye nethembisa egauteng.

tsn: morago ga ketelo ya balfour re rometse setlhopha sa ditona di le robongwe go etela kgaolo e ya balfour go mekamekana le dintlha tse di tlhagisitsweng ke baagi.
zul: emva kokuvakashela ebalfour, sathumela ithimba elalakhiwe ngongqongqoshe abayisishiyagalolunye ukuthi bavakashele le ndawo ukuxazulula izinkinga ezaziphakanyiswe ngumphakathi.

tsn: dintlha dingwe di setse di tsibogetswe.
zul: izinkinga eziningana sezixazululiwe.

tsn: ke laetse ditona go tlhokomela dintlha tse di saletseng morago.
zul: ngijube ongqongqoshe ukuthi babhekane nezindaba ezingakaxazululwa.

tsn: re gatelela gore ga go dingongorego dipe tse di fiwang jaaka lebaka la borukhutlhi le tshenyo ya dithoto.
zul: siyaphinda siyasho, azikho izikhalo ezingaba yizizathu ezinqala zodlame kanye nokulinyazwa kwempahla.

tsn: re laetse badiredi ba semolao gore ba gagamatse ditomo mo botlhokataolong jwa kwa balfour le dikarolo tse dingwe.
zul: siyalele izinhlaka eziphathelene nokuqiniswa komthetho ukuthi zithathe izinyathelo ezinqala mayelana nokungahlonishwa komthetho ebalfour kanye nakwezinye izindawo.

tsn: ka sedimonthole 2009, kabinete e atlanegisitse togamaano ya semenogane ya pusoselegae.
zul: ngozibandlela wonyaka we-2009, ikhabhinethi yamukela iqhinga lokushintsha ukusebenza kukahulumeni wasekhaya.

tsn: se se tla netefatsa gore pusoselegae e na le bolaodi jo bo maleba mmogo le bokgoni jwa tsamaiso le setegeniki.
zul: lokhu kuzoqinisekisa ukuthi uhulumeni wasekhaya unamakhono afanele ezokuphatha, ukulawula kanye nawezobuncweti.

tsn: mo ngwageng ono wa tiro, a re direng mmogo go netefatsa gore kwa bofelong, pusoselegae e nna tiro ya rona rotlhe.
zul: kulo nyaka wokusebenza, asisebenze ngokubambisana ukwenza umsebenzi kahulumeni wasekhaya ube wawo wonke umuntu.

tsn: re tshwaragane le go tlhabolola mekhukhu mmogo le go tlhoma ditirelo tse di tlhamatsegang go bonnye jwa malapa a le 500 000 ka 2014. re rulaganya go beela thoko dihekethara di feta 6 000 tsa naga ya puso e e mo felong go isegang, go aga matlo a a tlhwatlwa tlase.
zul: sisebenzela ukuthuthukisa izakhiwo ezingahlelekile ezisendaweni enhle kanye nokuhanjiswa kwezidingo ezifanele kubandakanya umhlaba kubantu okungenani abayi-500 000 ngonyaka we-2014.

tsn: maitlhomomagolo a maswa e ya go akaretsa batho ba lotseno lwa bona lo leng kwa godimo foo lo ba rontshang go amogela ketleetso ya puso, le gale lotseno lo lo le kwa tlase ga kelo ya go bona ketleetso ya dibanka.
zul: sihlela ukubeka eceleni amahektha ayi-6 000 omhlaba osendaweni ekahle ukwakha izindlu zabantu abahola kancane futhi ezingambi eqolo.

tsn: re ya go tlhoma ketleetso ya r1 bilione go tlhotlha dibanka tsa poraefete mmogo le lekala la matlo go aga dikumo go tlhokomela kgwetlho e ya matlo.
zul: uhlelo olusha olubalulekile ukuhlalisa abantu abahola kakhulu ukuthi bengathola uxhaso lukahulumeni kodwa abahola kancane ukuthi bengatshelekwa amabhange imali.

tsn: bakaulengwe, mo ngwageng o o fetileng re rile baagi ba metsemagae le bona ba na le tshwanelo ya go nna le motlakase, metsi, matlwana a metsi mmogo le ditsela.
zul: sizovula isikhwama esinegaranti yesigidigidi esisodwa ukugqugquzela amabhange kanye nomkhakha wezezindlu ukuthi uthuthukise imikhiqizo emisha ukuhlangabezana nalesi sidingo sezindlu.

tsn: ra re ba tshwanetse go nna le ditikwatikwe tsa metshameko gammogo le tsa marekelo jaaka kwa ditoropong.
zul: bakwethu,ngonyaka odlule sathi, abantu basemakhaya nabo banelungelo lokuba nogesi, amanzi, izindlu zangasese ezigijima amanzi nemigwaqo.

tsn: go tloga motsi o, go agilwe matlo a le 231. go nnile le tswelopele mo neelong ya ditirelo go tshegetsa tlhabololo ya tsa temo, mmogo le katiso ya ditokololo tsa morafe.
zul: sathi kufanele babe nezindawo zezemidlalo kanye nezindawo zokuthenga ezinkulukazi eziphucuzekile njengezasemadolobheni.

tsn: mananeo a a tla tswela mosola dikgaolotlhopho di le 21. fa 2014 o rogwa, re ikaelela go nna le mafelo mo dikgaolotlhophong di le 160. re eletsa gore 60% ya malapa mo mafelong a e kgone go fitlhelela ditlhokego tsa bona tsa dijo go tswa dikumong tsaabo ka ngwaga wa 2014. kgato ka kgato re tla bo re fitlhe jaaka seane se re bakaulengwe, dilo tse kgolo di simolola ka dikgato tse dinnye.
zul: mayelana nalokhu, sethule uhlelo lokuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemakhaya oluqukethe konke endaweni yokuhlola egiyani elimpopo ngoncwaba kofile.

tsn: re lebanwe gape ke go nyalana mananeo tshegetso a tlhabololo ya naga mmogo le temo.
zul: inqubekela phambili yenziwe futhi ekwakheni ingqalasizinda ukusekela ukuthuthukiswa kwezolimo kanye nokuqeqeshwa kwamalungu omphakathi.

tsn: mo karolong e katlego ya rona e tla lekanyetswa ka koketsego ya palo ya balemipotlana ba ba nnang balemibagolo.
zul: ukufinyelela ezikhungweni zezempilo kanye nezemfundo kwenziwe ngcono.

tsn: re ya go bopa maano a go fokotsa tatlhegelo ya metsi ka seripa fa 2014 a rogwa.
zul: ngonyaka we-2014 sihlela ukuba nezindawo ezigcemeni eziyi-160.

tsn: maloko a a tlotlegang,jaaka karolo ya maiteko a rona a go rotloetsa kgolo ya ikonomi, re dira ka natla go fokotsa ditshenyegelo tsa tlhaeletsano.
zul: sifuna amaphesenti angama-60 abantu kulezi zindawo bahlangabezane nezidingo zabo zokudla ngokuzikhiqizela bona ngonyaka we-2014.

tsn: morafe wa aforika borwa o ka solofela phokotso ya kelo ya tlhotlhwa ya go dirisa mogala wa selefounu, wa fa gae mmogo le wa botlhe.
zul: kancane kancane kuze kulunge, phela bakwethu, kuthiwa nempandla iqala ngenhlonhlo.

tsn: re ya go dira ka natla go oketsa lebelo la kgolagano, ka maikaelelo a go netefatsa maemogodimo a tirelo ya ditirelo tsa inthanete, re inaakantse le moono wa boditshabatshaba.
zul: futhi sidinga ukudidiyela ukuhlelwa kabusha komhlaba kanye nezinhlelo zokusekela ezolimo.

tsn: maaforika borwa a gaetsho, puso e ya go netefatsa gore dithoto tsa rona tsa tikologo mmogo le madirelo a tlhago di a tlhokomelwa le go atlarelwa ka gale.
zul: impumelelo yethu kulezi zindawo iyokalwa ngukukhula kwesibalo sabalimi abancane ababamba iqhaza emnothweni ngendlela ebonakalayo.

tsn: le fa tumallano e e sa fitlha fa re neng re solofetse, e nnile kgato ya botlhokwa ka gobo e bofa dinaga tsotlhe go tsibogela phetogo ya tlelaemete.
zul: kodwa, sisalahlekelwa ngamanzi amaningi ngenxa yamapayipi avuzayo kanye nengqalasizinda enganele.

tsn: mo aforika borwa re itlametse ntlhaphitlhelelo ya phokotsotsweletso e e rileng mme re ya go tswelela go dira ka natla malebana le maano a rona a tsereganyo ya phetogo ya leruri ya tlelaemete.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile,njengengxenye yemizamo yethu yokukhuthaza ukukhula komnotho okukhulu, sisebenzela ukunciphisa izindleko zokuxhumana.

tsn: re tla tshegetsa maiteko a go oketsa lebelo la go nyalanya dinaga tsa sadc malebana le polotiki le ikonomi, mmogo le go rotloetsa kgwebo le peeletso magareng a dinaga tse.
zul: umphakathi waseningizimu afrika ungalindela ngabomvu okunye ukuncishiswa kwemali yamagagasi obuhlakahlaka bokuxhumana ngomoya, omakhalekhukhwini, izingcingo zasendlini kanye nezingcingo zezigxobo.

tsn: aforika borwa e tswelela go nna moeteledipele mo maitekong a go natlafatsa kitlano ya aforika mmogo le makala a yona go direla kopano.
zul: sizosebenzela ukukhuphula isivinini samagagasi obuhlakahlaka bokuxhumana ngomoya kanye nokuqinisekisa izinga eliphezulu lokutholakala kwe-inthanethi, ngokuhambisana namazinga omhlaba.

tsn: re ya go tsepamisa maatla mo tsosolosong ya semphatho se se ntshwa sa tlhabololo ya aforika jaaka maano a tlhabololo ya ikonomi ya kontinente.
zul: zakhamizi zaseningizimu afrika,lo hulumeni uzoqinisekisa ukuthi izimpahla zethu zemvelo kanye nemithombo yemvelo ivikeleke kahle futhi ithuthukiswa ngokuqhubekayo.

tsn: maaforika borwa a gaetsho,bodiredipuso bo tshwanela ke go tsibogela kgoeletso e go dira gore paka e e nne ya tiro e e potlakileng le go tokafatsa tiragatso ya puso.
zul: ngokubambisana nezwe lasebrazil, elasendiya nelasechina sijoyinwa yizwe lasemelika, nebelimele amazwe omhlaba athuthukile, saba neqhaza elikhulu esivumelwaneni esamukelwa enqunqutheleni yokushintsha kwesimo sezulu ebisecopenhagen ngozibandlela kofile.

tsn: re tlhoka badiredipuso ba ba ineetseng, ba ba kgonang mme barekegela ditlhokwa tsa baagi.
zul: sizosebenza ngokuzikhandla kanye nozakwethu bomhlaba ukwenza isivumelwano esisemthwethweni esibophezelayo.

tsn: puso e setse e dira ka tlhabololo le go tsenya tirisong mananeo a tlhabololo ya badiredi puso a a yang go ala motheo wa badiredi puso mo mefameng yotlhe.
zul: njengeningizimu afrika, sizinikele ngokuzithandela kwethu ukuzibekela umkhawulo othile wokunciphisa intuthu engcolisayo, futhi sizoqhubeka ukusebenza ngeqhinga lethu lesikhathi eside ukwehlisa ukushintsha kwesimo sezulu.

tsn: maloko a a tlotlegang,re tsweletsa maiteko a rona a go fedisa bomenemene le botsietsi mo tsamaisong ya dithendara mmogo le mo dikopong tsa makwalokgweetso, madi a tlamelo a puso le makwalo ikitsiso gareng ga tse dingwe.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile,sizoqinisa imizamo yethu yokwazisa ngezintshisekelo zezwe laseningizimu afrika umhlaba wonke.

tsn: komiti ya rona ya ditona, e e lebileng bomenemene, e sekaseka tsela ya leruri ya go fenya bomenemene.
zul: iningizimu afrika iyaqhubeka ukudlala indima yokuhola emizameni yezwekazi yokuqinisa inhlangano yamazwe ase-afrika kanye nezikhungo zayo, kanye nokusebenzela ubunye.

tsn: bakaulengwe,jaaka lo lemogile, re itsisitse mogala o o kgethegileng wa moporesidente gore puso mmogo le kantoro ya moporesidente di fitlhelelwe bonolo ke setshaba le go thibolola thebolelo ya ditirelo.
zul: zakhamizi zaseningizimu afrika,abasebenzi bakahulumeni balinanele ikhwelo lokwenza lesi sikhathi sikahulumeni kube ngesokusebenza ngokushesha kanye nendlela yokusebenza kombuso eyenziwe ngcono.

tsn: ka tiriso ya mmusakgotla re laleditse boemedi jwa makokomantsi go tswa palamenteng go etela lefelo la mogala o gore ditokololo tsa palamente di itemogele bogolo jwa tiro e e dirwang koo.
zul: ikomidi lenkohlakalo elakhiwe ngongqongqoshe libheka izindlela zokuqeda nya inkohlakalo.

tsn: moporesidente nelson mandela o nnile pinagare mo go tshegetseng naga e go nna le tshono ya go nna mongae wa tiragalo e kgolo e. ka jalo re tshwanetse go netefatsa gore sejana se sa lefatshe se atlega thata go tlotlomatsa nelson mandela.
zul: bakwethu kanye nabangani,angiphinde ngithathe leli thuba ukuthumela umyalezo wokuzwelana nohulumeni kanye nabantu basehaiti mayelana nefu elimnyama elibagubuzele.

tsn: bakaulengwe a re nneng mowa mongwe go ema setlhopha sa naga bafana bafana nokeng.
zul: sinenjabulo ukuthi amaqembu ethu ezokutakula akwazile ukuya khona eyosiza.

tsn: 13 feb 2014mmusakgotla yo o tlotlegang wa kokoanotheomolao ya bosetšhaba,modulasetulo wa lekgotla la bosetšhaba la diporofense (ncop).
zul: 13 feb 2014somlomo ohloniphekile wesigungu sikazwelonke.

tsn: motlatsammusakgotla wa kokoanotheomolao ya bosetšhaba le motlatsamodulasetulo wa ncop.
zul: sihlalo womkhandlu kazwelonke wezifundazwe (i-ncop).

tsn: motlatsamoporesitente wa rephaboliki, motlotlegi kgalema motlanthe.
zul: iphini likasomlomo wesigungu sikazwelonke kanye nephini likasihlalo we-ncop.

tsn: motlatsamoporesitente wa maloba, baleka mbethe,motlotlegi moatlhodimogolo wa rephaboliki, le ditokololo tsotlhe tse di tlotlegang tsa bosiamisi.
zul: iphini likamongameli weriphabhulikhi, umhlonishwa kgalema motlanthe.

tsn: ditona le batlatsatona ba ba tlotlegang,ditonakgolo tse di tlotlegang le babusakgotla ba diporofense tsa rona.
zul: iphini likamongameli laphambilini, ubaleka mbethe.

tsn: modulasetulo wa mokgatlho wa dipusoselegae tsa aforika borwa, le boeteledipele jotlhe jwa pusoselegae.
zul: ondunankulu abahloniphekile kanye nosomlomo bezifundazwe zethu.

tsn: modulasetulo wa ntlo ya magosi.
zul: usihlalo we-salga, kanye nabo bonke abaholi bohulumeni basekhaya.

tsn: ditlhogo tsa ditheo tsa karolo ya bo 9 tsa puso tseo di tshegetsang temokerasi ya molaotheo.
zul: usihlalo wendlu kazwelonke yabaholi bendabuko.

tsn: mmusisi wa banka ya rasefe.
zul: umphathi webhangengodla.

tsn: baeteledipele go tswa kwa maphateng a kgwebo, metshameko, setso, bodumedi le a mangwe otlhe fela,ditokololo tsa ditheo tsa sedipolomate, baeng ba ba kgethegileng e bile ba tlotlega,ditokololo tse di tlotlegang,maaforika borwa ka nna,good evening, sanibonani, molweni, dumelang, riperile, ndimadekwana, goeienaand.
zul: abaholi bezamabhizinisi, ezemidlalo, ezendabuko, ezenkolo kanye nabo bonke abaholi beminye imikhakha.

tsn: re rata go gomotsa balelapa la gagwe, gammogo le moeteledipele wa ifp, shenge, le ditokololo tsotlhe tsa ifp.
zul: good evening, sanibonani, molweni, dumelang, riperile, ndimadekwana, goeie naand.

tsn: mmusakgotla yo o tlotlegang,modulasetilo yo o tlotlegang wa ncop,seno ke puo ya ntlha ya maemo a setšhaba e e diragalang re se na le moporesidente wa rona wa ntlha, motlotlegi nelson rolihlahla mandela.
zul: ngithanda ukubonga izikhulu ezengamele izindlu zephalamende ngokunginika leli thuba lokuba ngikhulume nabantu baseningizimu afrika, kulo mcimbi wokwethulwa kwenkulumo echaza isimo sezwe (i-sona) yokugcina kahulumeni wentando yeningi labantu wehlandla lesine.

tsn: go tlhokafala ga gagwe, pele fela ga ngwaga wa bo20 wa kgololesego le temokerasi ya rona, go utlwisitse batho ba rona le ba ba kwa ntle ga melelwane ya rona botlhoko jo bo seng kana ka sepe.
zul: ngithanda ukudlulisa amazwi enduduzo ngokudlula emhlabeni komhlonishwa umnu ben skhosana, ongomunye wamalungu asebe yingxenye yale ndlu ehloniphekile isikhathi eside futhi ubengelinye lamalungu asezikhundleni eziphezulu, futhi phambilini wayengungqongqoshe wezokuhlunyeleliswa kwezimilo.

tsn: re ikgomotsa ka kitso ya gore madiba o tla nna ka gale a le mo dipelong tsa rona, le gore re na le maikarabelo a go tsweletsa boswa jwa gagwe.
zul: sidabuka kakhulu ngokudlula kwakhe emhlabeni ngokuzuma.

tsn: ditokololo tse di tlotlegang,naga ya rona e tlhagisitse banna le basadi ba ba gaisang, ba ba tlametseng ka boeteledipele mo dinakong tse di thata.
zul: sidlulisa ukukhala kwethu emndenini wakhe, nakumholi we-ifp ushenge, kanye namalungu onke e-ifp.

tsn: mongwe wa baeteledipele bao e ne e le rre moses kotane, motsholamatlotlokakaretso wa maloba wa anc le mokwaledikakaretso wa maloba wa mokgatlho wa bokomonese wa aforika borwa.
zul: somlomo ohloniphekile,sihlalo we-ncop ohloniphekile,lena yinkulumo echaza isimo sezwe yokuqala eyenzeka engasekho emhlabeni umongameli wethu wokuqala, umhlonishwa nelson rolihlahla mandela.

tsn: re ikutlwa re tlotlegile tota go bo re na le mosadi wa gagwe yo o rategang, mama rebecca kotane, jaaka moeng wa rona yo o kgethegileng maitseboeng ano.
zul: ukudlula kwakhe emhlabeni, kungasensuku zatshwala kufike umgubho weminyaka engama-20 yenkululeko nentando yeningi yethu, kubazwise obukhulu ubuhlungu abantu bethu kanye nabakwamanye amazwe.

tsn: mama kotane o letse a fetsa dingwaga di le 102 maabane, mme re mo eleletsa tsotlhe tse dintle.
zul: sithola induduzo ngokwazi ukuthi umadiba uyohlala ngaso sonke isikhathi esezinhliziyweni zethu, futhi sinesibopho sokuqhubekisela phambili ukhondolo lwakhe.

tsn: gape re tlotla moporesidente wa maloba wa anc, rre oliver tambo, yo a neng a tsweletse go sedimosa lesedi la kgololesego mo gae le kwa moseja ka dinako tse di neng di le thata go gaisa tsa kgaratlho ya rona.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile,izwe lethu likhiqize abesilisa nabesifazane abanohlonze, abahlinzeke ngobuholi ngezikhathi ezinzima.

tsn: re tlotla solomon mahlangu, lekawana le le pelokgale le le neng la kalediwa le ntse le ititeile sefuba ka 1979 koo a bolailweng gona a na le dingwaga di le 23. o rile: "madi a me a tla nontsha setlhare se se tla ungwang maungo a kgololesego.
zul: sithanda futhi nokuhlonipha umongameli we-anc waphambilini u-oliver tambo, owagcina isibani senkululeko sivutha, lapha ngaphakathi ezweni lethu kanye nakwamanye amazwe, ngezikhathi ezinzima kakhulu zomzabalazo wethu.

tsn: gape ngwaga wa 2014 o supa segopotso sa bo40 sa polao ya bogatlapa ka sephuthelwana sa bomo, ya moeteledipele wa baithuti, abaram onkgopotse tiro ka 1974 kwa botswana.
zul: sithanda ukuthulela u-solomon mahlangu isigqoko, ibhungu elabe linesibindi esikhulu, okungadikizanga nqulu kulona ngenkathi lilengiswa ngowe-1979 lineminyaka yobudala engama-23.

tsn: mme jabu ndlovu, moemedi wa maloba wa badiri wa mokgatlho wa bosetšhaba wa badirakatshipi ba aforika borwa, o ne a thuntshiwa ka 1988 kwa pietermaritzburg mmogo le mogatse jabulani le morwa wa bona.
zul: kuyintokozo enkulu ukuthi lapha sivakashelwe ngumama wakhe, umartha mahlangu kanye nomzukulu wakhe ubathabile.

tsn: re amogela morwadie luhle le morwa, sanele, mme re tlotla malapa otlhe a a latlhegetsweng ke baratiwa ba ona, go ralala mekgatlho yotlhe ya sepolotiki.
zul: futhi unyaka wama-2014 uqopha iminyaka engama-40 kwenzeka isenzo sobugwala obukhulu sokubulawa komholi wabafundi, u-abram onkgopotse tiro ngebhomu elalifakwe ephaseleni, ngowe-1974, ebotswana.

tsn: mmusakgotla yo o tlotlegang,modulasetilo yo o tlotlegang wa ncop,re kgonne go fenya kutlobotlhoko eo yotlhe ya maloba le go aga setšhaba se sentšhwa.
zul: sithanda ukwamukela umfowabo, umogomotsi tiro onathi lapha kulo mcimbi.

tsn: re fitlhile mmuso o e neng e se wa temokerasi, o o neng o se na kemedi, o gatelela e bile o le bobodu o o neng o direla ba le mmalwa fela.
zul: sidlulisa ukubonga kwabantu, ngokuzinikela nokuzidela komfowabo.

tsn: re tlhamile mmuso wa temokerasi o o kopaneng, o o sa tlhaoleng go ya ka lotso le fa e le ka bong, o o ikarabelang mo baemeding ba maaforika borwa otlhe.
zul: siyabakhumbula labo abashona ngenxa yodlame olwabe luxhaswe ngumbuso ngeminyaka yama-1980s kanye nama-1990s emalokishini ethu kanye nasezindaweni zasemakhaya.

tsn: re na le temokerasi ya molaotheo e e tlhaga, e e nang le maphata a a dirang sentle a mmuso - kgotlapeomolao, bokhuduthamaga le boatlhodi.
zul: unkk jabu ndlovu, phambilini owayeyisikhulu esimele abasebenzi senyunyana yabasebenzi bensimbi baseningizimu afrika (i-numsa), wadutshulwa washona ngowe-1988 emgungundlovu kanye nomyeni wakhe nendodana yabo.

tsn: kgololesego le temokerasi gape di dirile gore go nne le baagi ba ba tlhabologileng mme ba le matlhagatlhaga mmogo le bobegakgang jo bo gololesegileng.
zul: somlomo ohloniphekile,sihlalo we-ncop ohloniphekile,saphumelela ukubudlulisa bonke lobo buhlungu besikhathi esedlule kanye nokwakha umphakathi omusha.

tsn: kemedi ya basadi mo ditheong tsa setšhaba e oketsegile thata fa e sa le go simologa kgololosego, mme le katoloso ya ditirelo tsa motheo e ungwela basadi.
zul: sasungula umbuso wentando yeningi owodwa onezinhlaka eziningi ngaphansi kwawo, ongacwasi ngokobuhlanga nangokokubulili, ophendula kubo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika futhi obamele bonke.

tsn: fela naga ya rona e sa ntse e lebanwe ke dikgwetlho tse tharo tsa lehuma, go tlhoka tekatekano le botlhokatiro, tse re tswelelang go samagana natso.
zul: sinezikhungo zesahluko sesi-9 ezeseka intando yeningi futhi ezivikela amalungelo ezakhamuzi.­futhi inkululeko kanye nentando yeningi seyivule nesikhala sokuthi kube nomphakathi wezinhlaka ezahlukene okhuthele, kanye nomkhakha wabezindaba okhululekile.

tsn: go samagana le dikgwetlho tseno e setse e le ntlha ya botlhokwa ya mebuso yotlhe ya temokerasi.
zul: konke lokhu sekwenze iningizimu afrika yaba yizwe elingcono kakhulu kunakuqala umuntu angaphila kulona.

tsn: thuto, boitekanelo, ntwa kgatlhanong le bosenyi le bobodu, tlhabololo ya metseselegae le ntšhwafatso ya naga mmogo le go tlhama ditiro tse di seriti.
zul: thina siqoke ukugxila ezintweni ezinhlanu esizibeke eqhulwini, ezemfundo, ezempilo, ukulwisana nobugebengu nenkohlakalo, ukuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemakhaya nezinguquko kwezomhlaba kanye nokuvulwa kwamathuba omsebenzi osesimweni esigculisayo.

tsn: gape re nopotse gore puso e tshwanetse go tokafatsa tiragatso.
zul: futhi siwuhlele kabusha umbuso ukuze senze ngcono ukusebenza kwawo.

tsn: re tlhamile khomišene ya maano ya bosetšhaba e e tlhagisitseng leano la tlhabololo la bosetšhaba (ndp), letlhomeso la naga la ikonomi ya loago mme gape e le nngwe ya diphitlhelelo tse dikgolo tsa puso ya bone.
zul: sisungule imikhakha emibili ebalulekile, umkhakha wokuhlelela isikhathi eside kanye nowokuqapha nokuhlola ukusebenza kukahulumeni.

tsn: leano le tlhagisa se re tshwanetseng go se dira go fedisa lehuma, go oketsa ditiro le gore re bo re fokoditse go tlhoka tekatekano ka 2030. tekolo le tshekatsheko ya rona e supa gore ditirelo di le dintsi di tswelela go tokafala.
zul: sisungule ikhomishana kazwelonke yokuhlela, ekhiqize uhlelo lokuthuthukiswa kwezwe oluyingqophamlando, oluwumhlahlandlela waleli lizwe wezenhlalo nezomnotho futhi lokhu ngenye yenzinto ezinkulu ezifezekiswe yilo hulumeni wehlandla lesine.

tsn: sekai, jaanong go tsaya nako e khutshwane go bona madi a tlamelo le makwaloitshupo.
zul: isibonelo, izicelo zezibonelelo zomphakathi kanye nezomazisi sezithatha isikhathi esifushane kunakuqala.

tsn: fela tse dingwe tse dintsi di sa ntse di tlhoka tiro ntsi.
zul: kodwa-ke miningi eminye imikhakha esadinga ukuthi kuqiniswe isandla.

tsn: ke tla bega ka ditlapele tse tlhano, ke simolola ka ikonomi.
zul: ngizokwethula umbiko wendlela okusetshenzwe ngayo ezintweni ezinhlanu ezibekwe eqhulwini futhi ngizoqala ngomnothongokwesilinganiso esimaphakathi, umnotho ukhule ngamaphesenti angu-3,2ngonyaka, kusukela ngowe-1994 kuya kowezi-2012, nakuba kubekhona ukufadalalakomnotho okuholele ekutheni kulahleke amathuba omsebenzi ayisigidi.

tsn: ka go dira mmogo jaaka puso, kgwebo, badiri le lephata la baagi, re tataisa ikonomi gore e itharabologelwe.
zul: ngokusebenzisana kwethu singuhulumeni, abamabhizinisi, abasebenzi kanye nomkhakha womphakathi, sikwazile ukuwuvusa umnotho.

tsn: khumo ya bosetšhaba, e e lekanyediwang go ya ka seelosotlhe sa ditlhagisiwa tsa naga (gdp), e godile go ya go feta madi a a kanaka r3.5 ditirilone.
zul: umcebo kazwelonke, uma ukalwa ngokwesamba somkhiqizo wezwe (i-gdp), ukhule wafinyelela ngaphezu kwezinkulungwane zezigidigidi zamarandi ezingu-3.5.

tsn: jaanong go tlhamiwa ditiro gape.
zul: aseqalile futhi ukuvuleka amathuba omsebenzi.

tsn: ga jaana go na le batho ba le dimilione di le 15 ba ba nang le ditiro mo nageng, e leng palo e e kwa godimo go gaisa mo hisetoring ya rona, mme ngogola go tlhamilwe ditiro di feta 650 000 go ya ka lefapha la mananepalo la aforika borwa.
zul: njengamanje sekunabantu abasebenzayo abayizigidi eziyi-15 kuleli lizwe, okuyinani eliphezulu kunawo onke emlandweni wethu, futhi ngokusho kwezezibalo eningizimu afrika, ngonyaka odlule kuvulwe amathuba omsebenzi ayizinkulungwane ezingama-650.

tsn: seno se sa ntse se sa kgotsofatse.
zul: kodwa-ke lokhu akwanele neze.

tsn: seelo sa botlhokatiro se sa ntse se le kwa godimo.
zul: izinga lokuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi lisephezulu kakhulu.

tsn: botlhokatiro jwa bašwa mo aforika borwa bo tswelapele go tshwenya, fela jaaka mo lefatsheng ka bophara.
zul: ukuntula kwentsha amathuba omsebenzi eningizimu afrika kuyaqhubeka nokuba yinto esikhathazayo, njengoba kunjalo nakwamanye amazwe emhlabeni jikelele.

tsn: re tsaya dikgato di le mmalwa, go akarediwa molao wa ditshiamelo tsa lekgetho la bothapi le le rotloetsang bathapi go thapa ba bašwa jaaka badiri.
zul: kunezinyathelo eziningana esizithathayo, kubandakanya nomthetho wesaphulelo sentela sokuvulwa kwamathuba omsebenzi, okhuthaza abaqashi ukuthi baqashe intsha.

tsn: go tla fetisiwa melawana e e tla netefatsang gore seno ga se ame badiri ba ba sa etleediweng gongwe badiri ba bagolwane bosula.
zul: kunezimiso eziphathelene nalo mthetho ezizophasiswa ukuqinisekisa ukuthi lokhu akubi nomthelela omubi kubasebenzi abangaxhasiwe noma abasebenzi abadala.

tsn: dikgato tse dingwe di mo teng ga tumelano ya bosetšhaba ya bašwa e e saenilweng kwa soweto ngogola ka kgwedi ya moranang.
zul: ezinye izinyathelo ziqukethwe kwisivumelwano sikazwelonke sentsha esasayindwa esoweto ngenyanga kambasa ngonyaka odlule.

tsn: lenaane le le atolositsweng la ditiro tsa setšhaba le lenaane la tiro ya baagi a tswelela go nna tshegetso e e bokgoni ya batlhoki le bašwa.
zul: uhlelo olunwetshiwe lwemisebenzi yomphakathi kanye nohlelo lwamathuba etoho omphakathi ziyaqhubeka nokuba yizinhlelo ezisebenza kahle ezivikela abantu abahlwempu nentsha ukuze bangakhahlamezeki kakhulu.

tsn: re tlhamile ditšhono tsa ditiro di le dimilione di le 3,7 mo dingwageng di le tlhano tse di fetileng.
zul: kule minyaka emihlanu edlule sivule amathuba etoho angaphezu kwezigidi ezingu-3,7.

tsn: batho ba rona ba amogela lotseno le bokgoni go tswa mo lenaaneng la ditiro tsa setšhaba, mme ba dirise tseo go batla tiro e e siameng.
zul: abantu bethu bazitholela imadlana kanye namakhono ohlelweni lwemisebenzi yomphakathi, abawasebenzisela ukufuna umsebenzi ohlelekile.

tsn: kabinete e ipeetse seelo sa ditšhono tsa ditiro di le dimilione di le 6 go tloga monongwaga go ya go 2019, go lebeletswe bašwa.
zul: ikhabhinethi izibekele umkhawulo wamathuba etoho ayizigidi eziyisithupha kusukela ngalo nyaka kuya kowezi-2019, futhi ngalokhu kuhloswe ikakhulu ukuqasha intsha.

tsn: lenaneo la rona la thuso ya loago le ga jaanong le fitlhelelang batho ba ka nna dimilione di le 16, le tlametsa dimilione ka pabalesego, bogolo thata bana ba ba mo matshosetsing.
zul: uhlelo lwethu lwezibonelelo zomphakathi manje selufinyelela kubantu abayizigidi eziyi-16, ikhakhulu izingane ezintulayo.

tsn: malapa a le mantsi a ungwelwa go tswa mo dithusong tsa puso tse e leng thuso ya tlamelo ya bana, phenšene gammogo le thuso ya bogole.
zul: imizi eminingi ithola ukusizakala ngenxa yezibonelelo zikahulumeni, imali yezingane, impesheni yabadala neyabakhubazekile.

tsn: puso e tla tswelela go duela dithuso tseno gonne bontsi jwa magae bo ikaegile ka tsona ka ntlha ya fa ditšhono tsa tiro di se kalo mo nakong eno e e thata ya kwelotlase ya ikonomi.
zul: lezi zibonelelo zizoqhubeka njalo ngoba imizi eminingi ithola ukusizakala ngoba amathuba emisebenzi ayivelakancane ngalesi sikhathi somnotho ontengantengayo.

tsn: ditšhono tseno tse di dirwang ke puso, di re kgontsha gore re bue ka boipelo gore ga jaana re nna mo nageng e e botoka thata fa e bapisiwa le e re neng re nna mo go yona pele ga 1994. bakaulengwe.
zul: la mathuba atholakala kuhulumeni, enza sisho ngeqholo ukuthi iningizimu afrika esiphila kuyo namhlanje ingcono kakhulu kunaleyo esasiphila kuyo ngaphambi kowe-1994.

tsn: re sa ntse re le mo pakeng e e boima.
zul: bantu bakithi,namanje sisabhekene nesikhathi esinzima.

tsn: ditiragalo tsa ikonomi ya amerika di bakile kwelotlase e e bonako mo mading a mebaraka e e sa ntseng e tlhagelela, go akarediwa le ranta.
zul: izinto ezenzeka emnothweni wasemelika seziholele ekutheni ehle ngesivinini amandla emali yamazwe asafufusa, kubandakanya nerandi.

tsn: mo tsamaong ya 2013, ranta e wetse tlase ka 17.6% kgatlhanong le dolara ya amerika.
zul: ngenkathi kuqhubeka unyaka wezi-2013, amandla erandi ehle ngamaphesenti angu-17,6 uma liqhathaniswa nedola lasemelika.

tsn: seelo se se bokoa sa thefosanyo se matshosetsi a a boitshegang mo infoleišeneng mme gape se tla dira gore lenaane la rona la mafaratlhatlha le nne tlhotlhwagodimo.
zul: ukwehla kwamandla emali kungenzeka kuholele ekutheni akhuphuke kakhulu amanani entengo yezimpahla futhi lokho kuzokwenza ukuthi uhlelo lwethu lokwakhiwa kwengqalasizinda lumbe eqolo.

tsn: le gale, ditlamo tse di romelang ntle, bogolo segolo mo maphateng a tlhagiso, di tshwanetse go dirisa ranta e e bokoa le itharabologelo e kgolo ya lefatshe lotlhe.
zul: kodwa-ke, izinkampani ezithumela izimpahla kwamanye amazwe, ikakhulu emkhakheni wezokukhiqizwa kwempahla, kumele zilisebenzise leli thuba elihlinzekwa yirandi elibuthakathaka kanye nokusimama komnotho womhlaba emva kokufadalala kwawo esikhathini esedlule.

tsn: le fa re na le mathata ano, re a itse gore re ka kgona mo pakeng eno ya dintelo.
zul: nakuba sibhekene nalobu bunzima, siyazi ukuthi sizokwazi ukumelana nalesi sikhathi senxushunxushu ebangelwa ukwehla kwamandla emali.

tsn: re setse re kile ra dira jalo mo dingwageng tse tlhano tse di fetileng.
zul: sikwazile ukukwenza lokho phambilini kule minyaka emihlanu edlule.

tsn: tota, re tla tlhagelela re maatlafetse le go feta fa re ka dira dilo tse di siameng.
zul: futhi, eqinisweni, sizophuma kule nxushunxushu sinamandla kakhulu kunakuqala uma senza izinto ezifanelekile.

tsn: re tshwanetse go dira mmogo jaaka puso, kgwebo le badiri go godisa ikomomi ka seelo se se kwa godimo ga 5% gore re kgone go tlhama ditiro tse re di tlhokang.
zul: kumele sisebenzisane njengohulumeni, abamabhizinisi kanye nabasebenzi ukukhulisa umnotho wethu ngezinga elingaphezu kwamaphesenti amahlanu ukuze sikwazi ukuvula amathuba omsebenzi esiwadingayo.

tsn: ka lesego, tirisanommogo eno e setse e ntse e tsweletse.
zul: ngenhlanhla lokhu kubambisana sekuqalile ukwenzeka.

tsn: e diragala kwa lekgotla la bosetšhaba la tlhabololo ya ikonomi le ya ditiro, e leng sengwe sa ditheo tsa botlhokwa tsa tirisanommogo mo temokerasing ya rona, magareng ga puso, kgwebo, badiri le baagi.
zul: ukubambisana kwenzeka kwi-nedlac okungesinye sezikhungo ezibalulekile zokubambisana zentando yeningi yethu, phakathi kukahulumeni, abamabhizinisi, abasebenzi kanye nomkhakha wezinhlaka zomphakathi.

tsn: e diragetse gape mo dipuisanong tse re nnileng natso le bagwebi.
zul: lokhu kwenzekile futhi nasekubonisaneni esibe nakho nomphakathi wosomabhizinisi.

tsn: mo ngwageng yo o fetileng ke ne ka simolola go buisana le bagwebi ka ga dikgato tse di rileng tse puso e ka di tsayang go nolofatsa go dira kgwebo mo nageng ya rona.
zul: ngonyaka odlule ngiqale ukubonisana nabamabhizinisi mayelana nezinyathelo ezingathathwa nguhulumeni ukuze kube lula ukwenza ibhizinisi ezweni lethu.

tsn: go tswa mo thulaganyong eo, jaanong re rulagantse dithebolo tsa taolo le dilaesense tsa tshekatsheko ya kamego ya tikologo, dilaesense tsa metsi mmogo le dilaesense tsa meepo.
zul: ngenxa yalolu hlelo lokubonisana nabamabhizinisi, manje sesikwenze lula ukulawulwa kanye nokunikezwa kwezimvume zokuhlolwa komthelela wokukhahlamezeka kwemvelo, nezimvume zamanzi kanye nezezimayini.

tsn: palamente e konosetsa dipaakanyo tsa bofelelo tsa molao gore ntlha eno e e siameng e dirisiwe, mme seo se tla fokotsa nako ya go simolola moepo go ya go malatsi a a ka fa tlase ga 300, go tloga ka go dira kopo go fitlha kwa go rebolweng.
zul: iphalamende liphothula izichibiyelo zomthetho ukuze kuqaliswe ukusebenza kwale nqubo ezoba nomthelela omuhle kakhulu, ezonciphisa ubude besikhathi sokusungula izimayini behle bufinyelele esikhathini esiyizinsuku ezingaphansi kwama-300, kusukela ekufakweni kwesicelo kuya ekwamukelweni kwaso.

tsn: motlatsamoporesidente wa rephaboliki o tswelela go gokaganya dipuisano magareng ga puso, ditlamo tsa meepo le badiri.
zul: iphini likamongameli weriphabhulikhi liyaqhubeka nokuhola izingxoxo eziphakathi kukahulumeni, izinkampani zezimayini kanye nabasebenzi.

tsn: maikemisetso ke go tsepamisa dikamano le badiri mo lephateng leno la botlhokwa la ikonomi ya rona.
zul: injongo yalokhu ukuletha uzinzo kubudlelwano phakathi kwabaqashi nabasebenzi kulo mkhakha obaluleke kakhulu emnothweni wethu.

tsn: seno se ungwa maungo.
zul: le nqubo seyibonakalise izithelo ezinhle.

tsn: dikhuduego mo lephateng leno di nnile mmalwa fela mme e bile ga di a tsaya sebaka.
zul: ngonyaka odlule sinciphile isibalo seziteleka kulo mkhakha futhi azidonsanga isikhathi eside kakhulu.

tsn: mme sa botlhokwa, dithulaganyo tsa dikamano tsa badiri di diragala ka tsela e e mo molaong.
zul: futhi into ebaluleke kakhulu ukuthi izinqubo zokubonisana phakathi kwabaqashi nabasebenzi zenzeka ngendlela ehambisana nokuthotshelwa komthetho.

tsn: re tseregantse mo meepong gonne e le mothapi yo mogolo.
zul: sibone kufanele singenelele kwezezimayini ngoba lo mkhakha ngomunye wemikhakha yethu ebalulekile evula amathuba omsebenzi amaningi.

tsn: re tlhoka lephata la meepo le le dirang sentle.
zul: sidinga umkhakha wezezimayini osebenzayo.

tsn: meepo e thapa batho ba feta halofo ya milione.
zul: izimayini ziqashe abantu abevile kwisigamu sesigidi.

tsn: ke moamogedi yo mogolo wa madi a dinaga tse di kwa ntle mo nageng ya rona.
zul: lona ngumkhakha ongenisa imali evela kwamanye amazwe enkulu kunayo yonke eminye imikhakha ezweni lethu.

tsn: gape e tsenya madi a ka nna r20 bilione ka tlhamalalo mo lotsenong lwa lekgetho.
zul: futhi lo mkhakha ufaka imali eyizigidigidi zamarandi ezibalelwa kuma-20 engena ngqo esikhwameni sentela saleli lizwe.

tsn: gape meepo e na le seabe se segolo jaaka moreki wa dithoto le ditirelo, mmogo le motlamedi wa ditshwaelo mo maphateng a mangwe a ikonomi ya rona mmogo le di-ikonomi tse dingwe lefatshe ka bophara.
zul: futhi izimayini zinegalelo elikhulu kakhulu njengomthengi wempahla nemisebenzi ehlinzekwayo, futhi zihlinzeka ngemikhiqizo kweminye imikhakha yomnotho wethu, nakwamanye amazwe emhlabeni jikelele.

tsn: re sekaseka tirisanommogo le baamegi go samagana le ntlha ya dintlo kwa ditoropong tse di nang le meepo.
zul: sicubungula izindlela zokubambisana nabo bonke abathintekayo ukuze kulungiswe udaba lwezezindlu emadolobheni akhelene nezimayini.

tsn: nte ke gakolole ditlamo tsa meepo gape gore 2014 ke letlha la bofelo la gore di tokafatse dintlo le seemo sa botshelo sa badiri ba meepo mmogo le go fitlhelela diphitlhelelo tsa bontsi jo bo rileng.
zul: ngithanda futhi nokukhumbuza izinkampani zezimayini ukuthi unyaka wezi-2014 yisikhathi esingumnqamulajuqu ezibekelwe wona ukuthi ziphucule ezezindlu kanye nezimo abaphila ngaphansi kwazo abasebenzi basezimayini nokuthi kufezekiswe imikhawulo eminingana ebekiwe okumele kufinyelelwe kuyona.

tsn: puso e tswelela go ela tlhoko le go netefatsa kobamelo ya diphitlhelelo tsa maano a ditlamo a loago le badiri mmogo le tšhata ya meepo.
zul: uhulumeni uyaqhubeka nokuqapha kanye nokuqinisekisa ukuqaliswa kwezinhlelo zezimayini eziphathelene nenhlalo nokunakekelwa kwabasebenzi kanye nokufezekiswa kwemikhawulo ebekwe ngokwemigomo kasomqulu wesivumelwano sezezimayini.

tsn: maaforika borwa ka nna,ditokololo tse di tlotlegang,kwa ntle ga meepo, re supile maphata a mangwe a matlhano a a ka susumetsang ditiro ka 2009. ona ke bojanala, temothuo, ikonomi e e tala, tlhabololo ya mafaratlhatlha le tlhagiso.
zul: bantu baseningizimu afrika,malungu ahloniphekile,ngaphandle komkhakha wezezimayini, ngonyaka wezi-2009 sahlonza eminye imikhakha emihlanu ezovula amathuba omsebenzi amaningi.

tsn: indaseteri ya bojanala e godile ka tsela e e gakgamatsang.
zul: le mikhakha ngowezokuvakasha, ezolimo, umnotho obhekelela imvelo, ukuthuthukiswa kwengqalasizinda kanye nowezokukhiqizwa kwempahla.

tsn: ka 1993, aforika borwa e amogetse baeng ba ba tswang kwa ntle ba le dimilione di le tharonyana fela.
zul: ngonyaka we-1993, iningizimu afrika yamukela abavakashi abavela kwamanye amazwe abayizigidi ezintathu kuphela.

tsn: ka 2012, palo eo e ne e godile go fitlha go baeng ba le dimilione di le 13. re tla tswelapele go godisa indaseteri eno, go lebeletswe bokgoni jwa yona jwa go tlhama ditiro.
zul: ngowezi-2012 lesi sibalo bese sikhule safinyelela kubavakashi abayizigidi eziyi-13.

tsn: ka 2012 re ribolotse leano la bosetšhaba la mafaratlhatlha, le le eteletsweng pele ke moporesidente ka khomišene ya moporesidente ya bogokaganyo jwa mafaratlhatlha.
zul: ngowezi-2012 sethula uhlelo lwengqalasizinda lukazwelonke, oluholwa ngumongameli ngokusebenzisa ikhomishana kamongameli yokuqondisa ukwakhiwa kwengqalasizinda.

tsn: morago ga moo re ne ra beeletsa r1 tirilione mo mafaratlhatlheng a setšhaba mo tsamaong ya dingwageng di le tlhano tse di fetileng.
zul: kule minyaka emihlanu edlule sitshale inkulungwane yezigidigidi zamarandi ohlelweni lokwakhiwa kwengqalasizinda yomphakathi.

tsn: bontsi jwa diporojeke bo setse bo konoseditswe kgotsa bo gaufi le go konosediwa.
zul: eminingi kule miklamo seyiphothuliwe noma sekusele kancane ukuthi iphothulwe.

tsn: ke tla nopola di se kae fela.
zul: ngizothi nje qaphu qaphu ngemiklamo embalwa.

tsn: tsamaiso ya rea vaya kwa johannesburg ga jaana e dirisiwa ke baagi ba gauteng ba feta 100 000. ditsamaiso tse di tshwanang le tseo di agiwa kwa motsekapa, tshwane, nelson mandela bay, buffalo city, ethekwini le rustenburg.
zul: egoli, uhlelo lwamabhasi asheshayo olubizwa nge-rea vaya manje selusetshenziswa ngabahlali basegauteng abangaphezu kwezi-100 000. kunezinhlelo ezifana nalolu ezakhiwayo ekapa, tshwane, nelson mandela bay, buffalo city, ethekwini kanye nase-rustenburg.

tsn: maemelakepe a naga a tokafaditswe.
zul: asenziwe ngcono amachweba akuleli lizwe kanye nezikhumulo zemikhumbi.

tsn: re agile mola wa peipi ya lookwane wa dikilomitara di le 700 o o tswang kwa durban go leba gauteng go tsamaisa dibilione di le 4 tsa dikhubiki tsa dilitara tsa peterolo, disele le lookwane la difofane ka ngwaga.
zul: sesakhe iphayiphi elithwala uphethiloli elingamakhilomitha angama-700 ubude elisuka ethekwini liye egauteng elithutha izigidigidi ezine ngonyaka zamakhubhikhi-litha kaphethiloli wezimoto, udizili kanye nophethiloli wamabhanoyi.

tsn: go agilwe dikilomitara di ka nna 1 500 tsa ditsela tse dintšhwa.
zul: sekwakhiwe imigwaqo nemizila emisha ecishe ibe ngamakhilomitha ayi-1 500. le nqubekelaphambili eseyenziwe ekwakhiweni kwemigwaqo isikhumbuza abantu ababeyingxenye yalo hulumeni esikhathini esedlule ababenesifiso sokubona leli lizwe linengqalasizinda kanokusho, abanjengongqongqoshe wezokuthutha waphambilini umnu dullar omar.

tsn: tswelelopele eno e e amanang le ditsela e re gakolola ka bangwe ba ba dirileng mo pusong eno ba ba neng ba eleletsa naga ya rona tse di gaisang, go tshwana le tona ya maloba ya dipalangwa rre dullar omar.
zul: unkosikazi wakhe u-farieda ungomunye wezimenywa zethu ezinathi lapha kusihlwa nje.

tsn: go simolotswe ka kago ya mela e mentšhwa ya seporo kwa mpumalanga, go fokotsa kgatelelo mo ditseleng.
zul: sekuqaliwe ukwakhiwa kojantshi besitimela abasha empumalanga, ukuze kuncishiswe ingcindezi emgwaqweni.

tsn: porojeke ya gautrain jaanong e dira ka botlalo mme e rora bapalami ba feta 1,2 milione ka kgwedi.
zul: umklamo we-gautrain manje ususebenza ngokuphelele futhi uthwala abagibeli abangu-1,2 wezigidi ngenyanga.

tsn: setlamo sa setheo sa diporo le banamedi sa aforika borwase tla dirisa madi a a fetang r120 bilione mo tsamaong ya dingwageng tse di latelang di le 10, go reka diterena tse dintšhwa.
zul: uphiko lwezokuthuthwa kwabantu ngezitimela lwaseningizimu afrika luzosebenzisa imali engaphezu kwezigidigidi eziyi-r120 ukuthenga izitimela ezintsha kule minyaka eyishumi ezayo.

tsn: transnet e diragatsa togamaano ya yona e e boitshegang e e lebeletseng tlhokego mo mmarakeng, ya r300 bilione, go aga mafaratlhatlha a a tlhokegang go gaisa a dipalangwa.
zul: abakwa-transnet sebeluqalisile uhlelo lwabo olukhulukazi lokubhekana nesidingo esikhuphukayo sokuhlinzeka amakhasimende abo ngalo lonke usizo aludingayo, oluzodla izigidigidi ezingama-r300, futhi lokhu kuzoholela ekwakhiweni kwengqalasizinda yezokuthutha edingeka kakhulu.

tsn: go fitlhelela bokgoni jwa ikonomi jwa kapabophirima le lebopo la bophirima, re tlhomile lefelo la tlhabololo ya diindasteri tsa saldanha mme re butse difeme tse dintšhwa di le pedi kwa atlantis.
zul: ngenhloso yokusimamisa umnotho wasentshonalanga kapa nowendawo esogwini olusentshonalanga, sesethule isifunda sokuthuthukiswa kwezimboni sase-saldanha futhi savula namafemu amabili e-atlantis.

tsn: go tokafatsa tlamelo ya metsi, go konoseditswe matamo a magolo a mantšhwa a le mabedi, de hoop kwa limpopo mmogo le spring grove kwa kwazulu-natal, fa legato la 2 la porojeke ya metsi ya lesotho highlands e tla tlhongwa mo bogautshwaneng.
zul: ukuze kwenziwe ngcono ukuphakelwa kwamanzi, sekuphothulwe amadamu amakhulu amabili amasha, okuyi-de hoop elimpopo kanye ne-spring grove kwazulu-natali, kanti futhi isigaba sesibili somklamo we-lesotho highlands water project sizokwethulwa khona maduze nje.

tsn: go tsweletswe ka kago ya diteišene tse dintšhwa tsa maatla, medupi kwa limpopo, kusile kwa mpumalanga le ingula gaufi le ladysmith, mme tsona di thapa badiri ba feta 30 000. re tswelela go sekaseka metswedi e mengwe ya maatla, go lepalepana le leano le le kopanetsweng la ditlamelo tsa maatla.
zul: uyaqhubeka umsebenzi wokwakhiwa kweziteshi ezintsha zamandla kagesi, imedupi elimpopo, ikusile empumalanga kanye ne-ingula bude buduze nasemnambithi, futhi kule miklamo kuqashwe abasebenzi abangaphezu kwezi-30 000. siyaqhubeka nemizamo yokuthola eminye imithombo kagesi, ngokohlelo oludidiyela imithombo ehlukahlukene yokuphehla ugesi.

tsn: go tlhagisiwa ga peteroliamo, bogolo segolo gase ya šale, go tla fetola selebo sa kgaolo ya karoo mmogo le ikonomi ya aforika borwa.
zul: ukuthuthukiswa kwephethroliyamu, ikakhulu igesi etholakala ngaphansi komhlaba, kuzoletha izinguquko ezinkulukazi esifundeni sase-karoo kanye nasemnothweni waseningizimu afrika.

tsn: morago ga go sekaseka matshosetsi le ditšhono, go tla gololwa melawana ya bofelo fa gautshwane mme yona e tla latelwa ke tsamaiso le thebolo ya dilaesense.
zul: njengoba sebuhlaziyiwe ubungozi kanye namathuba azovuleka, khona maduze nje kuzokhishwa izimiso zokugcina futhi lokhu kuzolandelwa wuhlelo lokucutshungulwa kwezicelo nokunikezwa kwezimvume.

tsn: re solofetse go konosetsa theko ya dimekawate di le 9 600 tsa maatla a nyutlilia.
zul: sibheke ukuthi siphothule ukuthengwa kwamamegawathi kagesi wenonzi ayizi-9 600. sebeqokiwe abakhiqizi beziphehlamandla zezitshalo futhi sebeqalile ukusebenza.

tsn: ditokololo tse di tlotlegangruri naga ya rona ke naga e e dirang mme ke lefelo le go leng botoka go nna mo go lona.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile,ngempela singasho kugcwale umlomo ukuthi izwe lethu liyizwe elimatasatasa, elisebenzayo futhi elingcono kakhulu kunakuqala umuntu angaphila kulona.

tsn: re tshwanetse go tsweletsa seo.
zul: kumele siqhubeke nalo mfutho.

tsn: ditokololo tse di tlotlegang,bontsi jwa lehumo la rona le dirwa mo inthaneteng gongwe ka tlhaeletsano ya megala.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile,umcebo wethu omningi wakheka ngokusebenzisa i-inthanethi noma ezokuxhumana ngezingcingo.

tsn: go adilwe mogala wa faeba opotiki wa dikilomitara di le 37 000 ke maphata a poraefete le a setšhaba mo dingwageng di le tlhano tse di fetileng.
zul: kule minyaka emihlanu edlule, umkhakha ozimele kanye nokahulumeni sewakhe futhi waxhuma amakhebuli efayibha athutha idatha nolwazi alinganiselwa kumakhilomitha ayizi-37 000 ubude.
