tsn: maaforika borwa ka nna,jaaka re itharabologelwa dikgwetlho tse re fetileng mo go tsone mo malobeng mmogo le fa re leka ka gotlhe go samagana le matsadi a tlhaolele a a neng a re aparetse mo dingwagakgolong tse di fetileng, go botlhokwa thata gore re dire jalo re lebile bokamoso jwa rona ka leitlho le le ntšhotšho.
zul: lapho kunobufakazi obuphathekayo obuvumela ukuba kuqaliswe inqubo yokushushisa, kumele ilandele ngokushesha futhi kubuyiswe ngokushesha imali kahulumeni entshontshiwe.

tsn: di fetola ka fao batho ba amanang ka gone, ka fao ditšhaba di dirang ka teng le ka fao di busiwang ka gone.
zul: ngokubanzi, lolu phiko, luzogxila ebufakazini osebuvelile kwikhomishana yophenyo kazondo ephenya isihlava sokubhozonyelwa kombuso, nakwamanye amakhomishana kanye nasophenyweni lwezigcawu zokuqondisa izigwegwe.

tsn: ditlamorago tse di setlhogo tsa mogote wa lefatshe ka bophara mo maemong a loapi lwa mo nageng ya rona di setse di simolotse go ikutlwatsa, ka maemo a bosa a a bogale a a senyang ditikologo tsa borona, ditšhaba tsa borona le maemo a ikonomi ya rona.
zul: luzohlonza amacala aseqhulwini okumele aphenywe futhi ashushiswe, futhi luzodla nempahla ehlonzwe njengempahla ethengwe ngemali etholakale ezenzweni zobugebengu.

tsn: re tla tshwanelwa ke go itlhophela gore re fedisa go tlhokatekatekano kgotsa re kgaogana khumo ya naga ka go diragatsa dikakanyo tsa boitshimololedi.
zul: lolu phiko luzohlanganisa ndawonye abaphenyi kanye nabashushisi abaningi futhi abahlukahlukene, abavela ngaphakathi emkhakheni kahulumeni kanye nalabo abavela emkhakheni ozimele abazoholwa ngumqondisi wezokuphenya osebenza ngaphansi kuka-ndpp.

tsn: fa re sa ikgolaganya le ditiragalo tse di tsweletseng, fa re sa tlhaloganye botlhokwa jwa diphetogo tse di bopang lefatshe la rona, le fa re sa rotloetse ditšhono tse di tlhagelelang, ditsholofetso tsa fa naga ya rona e ne e iponela kgololesego di tla nna di sa diragale go ya go ile.
zul: ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, sizosebenzisana ne-npa kanye nezinye izimpiko zokuphoqelela ukuthotshelwa komthetho ukuthuthukisa isixazululo sesikhathi eside esizoqinisa amandla okuqhuba umsebenzi ngempumelelo ohlelweni lobulungiswa nokulwisana nobugebengu ukuze lukwazi ukubhekana ngqo nenkohlakalo.

tsn: go agiwa ka katlego ga thelesekoupu ya meerkat kwa kapa bokone, e leng thelesekoupu ya seyalemowa e kgolo mo lefatsheng e gape e leng diphatsa go gaisa, mmogo le go agiwa ga arei ya sekwere khilomitara go kgontshitse naga ya aforika borwa go bokeleditse dikitso tse di diphatsa tse di jaaka dipatlisiso tsa kwa lefaufaung, boenjenere jo bo diphatsa mmogo le dikhomphiutara tse di diphatsa tsa maemo a kwa godimo.
zul: bantu baseningizimu afrika,njengoba sisazama ukuxazulula izinselele ezibangelwe yizinto ezenzeke kuleli esikhathini esifushane esedlule, futhi njengoba siqinisa imizamo yethu yokunqoba ububi bokungahanjiswa kwezinto ngobulungiswa, okwaqhubeka amakhulukhulu eminyaka, kusemqoka ukuthi ngenkathi sikwenza lokho amehlo ethu ahlale ethe njo esikhathini esizayo.

tsn: ke ka ga go aga thekenoloji le bokgoni jo bo tla agang ikonomi e e matlhagatlhaga mme e gaisana e e tlholang ditiro tse di seriti tse di somarelegang.
zul: intuthuko enkulukazi eyenzekayo kwezobuchwepheshe iguqula indlela abasebenza ngayo abantu futhi lokhu kushintsha nendlela abaphila ngayo.

tsn: ke ka ga tlamelo ya dijo e e lekaneng e e tlhabologileng, go samagana botoka le malwetse, mmogo le go nna le motlakase o o seng boturu, o o sa utlwiseng tikologo botlhoko mme gape o tsamaya sentle.
zul: le ntuthuko enkulukazi iguqula indlela abaxhumana ngayo abantu, indlela esebenza ngayo imiphakathi kanye nendlela ephathwa ngayo.

tsn: ke ka ga bodulo jwa batho jo bo nang le didiriswa tsa thekenoloji mmogo le ditharabololo tsa tlhabololo ya loago go ya ka ditlhokwa tsa batho le tseo ba di batlang.
zul: imiphumela emibi kakhulu yesivuvu sokushisa komhlaba, esiguqula isimo sezulu sethu esijwayelekile, isiyazwela impela njengoba izimo zezulu ezixakile zicekela phansi izindlela abaziphilisa ngazo abantu, futhi zicekela phansi imiphakathi kanye namazwe.

tsn: ke ka ga puso e e mosola, e e dirisang thekenoloji mme gape e tsibogela ditlhokwa tsa batho.
zul: njengesizwe esisha, okuyiminyaka engama-25 nje kuphela izwe libuswa ngentando yeningi labantu, sibhekene nezimo ezinzima futhi ezingagwemeki okumele sikhethe kuzona.

tsn: go netefatsa gore re tsibogela ka potlako diphetogo tsa thekenoloji mo go lateleng kgolo e e akaretsang batho botlhe mmogo le tlhabololo ya loago, ke tlhomile khomišene ya boporesitente e e tla samaganang le merero ya phetogo ya intaseteri e e ka ga thekenoloji.
zul: kumele sikhethe phakathi kokushiywa ngemuva wuguquko olwenzekayo kwezobuchwepheshe noma silubambe ngazo zombili, silusebenzisele ukufezekisa izifiso nezinjongo zethu zentuthuko.

tsn: khomišene eno, e e nang le ditokololo tse di botlhokwa thata mo makaleng a a farologaneng le mo ditšhabeng tse di farologaneng, e tla dira jaaka mokgwa wa keletso ya naga ka ga phetogo mo mererong ya dijithale.
zul: kumele sikhethe phakathi kokuqinisa nokugxilisa ukungaiingani kanye nokwakha isimo esizophumelelisa umuntu wonke ngokusebenzisa intuthuko yokuqanjwa nokusungulwa kwezinto zesimanjemanje.

tsn: e tla nopola le go tshwaela ka dipholisi, ditogamaano le maano a a ka bayang naga ya aforika borwa mo maemong a a kwa godimo mo go gaisaneng mo maemong a lefatshe mo lephateng la phetogo mo mererong ya dijithale.
zul: ngaphandle kokuthi nathi siguquke nalolu guquko olwenzekayo, ngaphandle kokuthi nathi siluqonde kahle uhlobo loguquko olunohlonze olushintsha isimo somhlaba wethu, nangaphandle kokuthi nathi siwabambe ngazo zombili amathuba ahlinzekwa yilolu guquko, izithembiso esazenza ngenkathi izwe lethu lithola inkululeko ziyohlala zinjalo, ziyithembiso ezingafezekisiwe.

tsn: go agelela mo tirong eo re neng re setse re e dirile mo ngwageng yo o fetileng, re tla tsepamisa mogopo mo go matlafatseng gape bokgoni jwa puso.
zul: namuhla, sikhetha ukuba yisizwe esihlabela phambili, esiphokophele esikhathini esizayo.

tsn: re gatetse kwa pele mo go lekoleng bogolo le sebopego sa puso, mme re tla konosetsa tiro eno kwa bokhutlhong jwa tsamaiso puso ya ga jaana.
zul: ngokwenza njalo, sakhela phezu kwesisekelo sempumelelo emangalisayo ezuziwe kwezesayensi.

tsn: re laletsa maaforika borwa otlhe go tlhagisa maikutlo a bona mabapi le ka fao re ka rulaganyang botoka puso gore e tle e kgone go tsibogela ditlhokwa tsa batho.
zul: ukwakhiwa ngempumelelo kwesibonakude i-meerkat enyakatho kapa, okuyisibonakude esikhulukazi emhlabeni futhi esisebenza ngamagagasi omoya esinamandla amakhulukazi okubona izinto ezikude emajukujukwini omkhathi, kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwe-square kilometre array (i-ska) sekwenze ukuthi iningizimu afrika ikwazi ukuqeqesha ongoti bemikhakha enjengokubukelwa komkhathi, ubunjiniyela obuseqophelweni eliphakeme kanye nabomkhakha wokusetshenziswa kwamakhompyutha asesingeni eliphakeme kakhulu, obizwa nge-supercomputing.

tsn: mo go tokafatseng bokgoni jwa badiredipuso, sekolokatiso sa bosetšhaba sa puso (nsg) se tsenya tirisong lethathama la dirutwa tse di tshwanetsweng go dirwa ke badiredipuso botlhe, tse di akaretsang dikarolo tsa thuto tse di jaaka maitsholo le dikgato tse di kgatlhanong le bonweenwee, botsamaisibogolo le botsamaisi jwa tlamelo ya taolo ya dithoto.
zul: labo ngoti bayasetshenziswa njengamanje ukwakha i-hera, isibonakude esisebenza ngemagagasi omoya esakhelwe ukuhlonza, okokuqala ngqa, isiginali yamagagasi omoya eyingqayizivele evela ezinkanyezini kanye nemithala (ama-galaxy) yasemandulo okungeyokuqala ngqa eyakheka ngenkathi kudaleka imvelo yonke.

tsn: re tla sekaseka go tsenngwatrisong ga karolo ya bo 8 ya molao wa taolo le tsamaiso ya puso e leng e e gagamatsang molao wa go kganetsa badiredipuso go tsena mo kgwebong le ditheo tsa puso mme seno se kgontsha puso go samagana ka tolamo le ditiragalo dingwe le dingwe tsa bonweenwee jwa mothale oo.
zul: lokho akuphathelene nje kuphela nokuqhubekisela phambili ukuqonda kwabantu ngokudaleka kwemvelo yonke – kepha kuphathelene nokubhekana nezinselele ezibhekene nabantu baseningizimu afrika esikhathini samanje kanye nalezo abazobhekana nazo esikhathini esizayo.

tsn: seno se tla dira gore go rebolwe dikatlholo tse di bogale, go akaretsa le tsa go duedisiwa le/ tsa go atlholelwa kgolegelong go badiredipuso bao ba o tlolang.
zul: lokhu kuphathelene nokuthuthukisa ubuchwepheshe kanye namandla namakhono okusebenza azokwakha umnotho okhulayo, oguquka nezikhathi nokwaziyo ukuncintisana neminye, futhi ovula amathuba omsebenzi asezingeni elamukelekile futhi asimeme.

tsn: yuniti ya thuso ya setegeniki ya maitsholo, seriti le dikgatokgalemelo e tla tlhomiwa gore e tshegetse taolo ya maitsholo le dikgato tse di kgatlhanong le bonweenwee mmogo le go netefatsa gore go nna le taolo ya ditlamorago fa go ka tshelwa tsamaiso mo pusong.
zul: lokhu kuphathelene nokuqinisekisa ukuthi kunokudla okwanele kuleli, ukulawulwa kwezifo kangcono, kanye namandla kagesi angambi eqolo, ahlanzekile futhi asebenza kahle.

tsn: re tla dirisa maemo ano go tsweletsa ditlhokwa tsa kontinente le tsa lefatshe ka bophara, ka go tsweletsa ponelopele ya ga nelson mandela ya go nna le lefatshe le le renang kagiso, le le sa etsaetsegeng e bile le rena le bosiamisi.
zul: lokhu kuphathelene nezindawo zokuhlalisa abantu zesimanjemanje kanye nezinsizakalo zokuthuthukiswa komphakathi ezakhelwe phezu kwezidingo zabantu kanye nezinto ezithandwa yibona.

tsn: re rata go lemosa maaforika borwa otlhe a a nang le tetlelelo ya go tsena mo ditlhophong mme ba ise ba ikwadise jaaka badiraditlhopho gore ba santse ba na le nako ya go ka dira jalo pele letlha la go tlhopha le ka rebolwa.
zul: lokhu kuzohlonza futhi kwenze izincomo mayelana nezinqubomgomo, amaqhingasu kanye nezinhlelo ezizobeka iningizimu afrika esimweni sokuba yizwe elikwaziyo ukuncintisana namanye amazwe emhlabeni jikelele emkhakheni wezoguquko lokusetshenziswa kobuxhakaxhaka besimanjemanje obusebenzisa izinhlelo-kusebenza zekhompyutha.

tsn: maaforika borwa ka nna,re batho ba letsopa la kgaratlho, la maikemisetso le matlhagatlhaga.
zul: ngokwakhela phezu komsebenzi esiwenze ngonyaka odlule, sizogxila ekuqiniseni kakhudlwana amandla nekhono lokusebenza lombuso.

tsn: le fa re ne re tshwerwe makgwakgwa motsing wa tlhaolele, fa re bona kgololesego ya rona ga re a ke ra tswa letsholo ra re jaanong re batla go ipusulosetsa.
zul: ikhona inqubekela phambili esesiyenzile ekucubunguleni ubukhulu kanye nohlaka lwezikhundla zombuso, futhi lo msebenzi sizowuphothula ngaphambi kokuphela kwehlandla lokuphatha likahulumeni ophethe njengamanje owavotelwa ngowezi-2014.

tsn: temokerasi ya rona e ne ya thunya le go phaphasela, ya tlhokomelwa ke botho jwa banna le basadi ba lefatshe leno le legolo, bao ba itseng sentle gore gore re fitlhe mo re leng fano go ikentshitswe setlhabelo go le kanakang.
zul: siyabanxusa bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika ukuthi benze iziphakamiso futhi bathumele imibono yabo mayelana nokuthi iyiphi indlela engcono yokwakha nokuhlanganisa uhlaka lwezikhundla zikahulumeni ukuze ukwazi ukusebenzela ukufezekisa izidingo nezimfuno zabantu.

tsn: le fa go le jalo, mmila o o lebileng kwa kgololesegong ya boammaruri e motsopodia, mme re setse re iponetse ka matlho a rona baagi ba rona ba simolola go kgaogana le go feta.
zul: ngenhloso yokwenza ngcono amakhono kanye namandla okusebenza ezisebenzi zikahulumeni, isikole sikazwelonke sikahulumeni (i-nsg) sethule iqoqwana lezifundo eziphoqelekile, emikhakheni enjengomkhakha wenkambiso yokuziphatha elungileyo nokulwisana nenkohlakalo, umkhakha wabaphathi abakhulu kanye nokuphathwa kwenqubo yokuthengwa kwempahla nezinsizakalo, kanye nokutshalwa kwabaphathi ezigabeni lapho bezozibambela bona mathupha futhi balekelele emsebenzini wokuhlinzeka umphakathi ngezinsizakalo ukuze kuqiniswe ukuhlinzekwa kwezinsizakalo emphakathini.

tsn: ba kgaogana ka gore rona re batho ba mmala wa sebilo rona re batho ba basweu, rona re bahumanegi rona re bahumi, rona re batho ba kwa metseselegae rona re batho ba kwa metseseteropong, rona re batho ba peo e e farologaneng, mmogo le ka gore rona re bua dipuo tse di farologaeng mme re na le ditso tse di farologaneng.
zul: kuzosungulwa uphiko lwezenkambiso yokuziphatha elungileyo, ubuqotho kanye nokuhlinzeka ngosizo lokuphathwa nokuqhutshwa kwenqubo yokuqondiswa kwezigwegwe ukuze kuqiniswe ukuphathwa nokulawula kwenkambiso yokuziphatha elungileyo nokulwisana nenkohlakalo futhi kuqinisekise ukuthi bayaphendula ngezenzo zabo futhi bathathelwa izinyathelo zokuqondiswa kwezigwegwe labo abaphule izinqubo-kusebenza ezibekiwe zikahulumeni.

tsn: ka dinako dingwe go bonagala ekete sediba seo re neng re nwa mo go sona botho jwa rona se se re kgontshitseng gore re boelane ka 1994 se tšhele.
zul: bantu baseningizimu afrika,kulo nyaka iningizimu afrika seyithathe isikhundla sobulungu besikhashana emkhandlwini wezokuvikela wenhlangano yezizwe (i-unsc).

tsn: le fa go le jalo, re ka se fekeediwe ke diphisegelo tsa batho ba ba itlhobogileng le ba ba ineetseng.
zul: lesi sikhundla sizosisebenzisela ukukhuthaza nokugqugquzela ukuthula kuleli zwekazi kanye nasemhlabeni wonke jikelele, ngalokho siqhubekisele phambili ihloso-mbono ka-nelson mandela yomhlaba onokuthula, uzinzo, ongachemile futhi onobulungiswa.

tsn: setšhaba sa rona se nwa metsi mo moeding wa go itshokelana le go phela mmogo, ka jalo re eme sejaro, e bile ga re etsaetsege mme re tshwaragane kgatlhanong le dikgato tsotlhe tse di ikaelelang go re kgaoganya kgotsa tse di tshosetsang go phatlhalatsa tsotlhe tse re di kgobokantseng ka thata.
zul: bantu baseningizimu afrika,ezinyangeni ezimbalwa ezizayo, abantu baseningizimu afrika bazovakashela ezikhungweni zokuvota beyovota, okuzobe kungokwesithupha ngaphansi kombuso wethu wentando yeningi labantu bevotela uhulumeni kazwelonke kanye nohulumeni bezifundazwe.

tsn: ba ne ba re nyefola ba re bolelela gore ke digaboi go aga aforika borwa e e senang letlhoo la bosemorafe, le gore re ijesa dijo tsa ditoro fa re nagana gore re tla feletsa re wetse matshwafo mabapi le bosula jo ba re dirileng jone mo nakong e e fetileng.
zul: leli yithuba lokuthi abantu bakuleli basebenzise ilungelo labo abalithola kanzima lokuthatha isinqumo mayelana nokuthi leli lizwe kumele lithathe indlela ebheke ngakuluphi uhlangothi.

tsn: ke tlhoafalo ya ponelopele e e tukang ka fa teng ga rona jaaka batho e e re boneseditseng gore re nne le tsholofelo mo dinakong tse re neng re aparetswe ke lefifi la mma ntshwarele ngwana.
zul: bantu baseningizimu afrika,thina singabantu abakwaziyo ukumelana nezimo ezinzima futhi emva kwalokho bavuke bazithathe, abaphikelelayo futhi abahlalela ethembeni lokuthi konke kuzolunga.

tsn: ke tlhoafalo yona eo e e tla re gapang gore re gate re gatoga go leba kwa bokamosong jwa rona jo bontšhwa.
zul: nakuba sabhekana nobubi obesabekayo bobandlululo, asizange sibe nomoya wokuziphindisela emva kokuthola inkululeko yethu.

tsn: jona ke aforika borwa oo monna, mosadi le ngwana mongwe le mongwe a tla nnang le bokamoso le bokgoni jwa go itirela bokamoso jo bo botoka.
zul: umbuso wethu wentando yeningi labantu usukhululile futhi waqhakaza, ukhuliswa ngumusa nezenzo ezinhle zamadoda nabesifazane baleli lizwe elihle kangaka, abakuqonda kahle kamhlophe ukuthi intando yeningi labantu yatholakala emva komzukuzuku nokulahlekelwa okungakanani.

tsn: ke aforika borwa yo o ipaakanyeditseng go gapa ditšhono tse di tlisiwang ke diphetogo tsa thekenoloji tse di gapileng lefatshe ka bophara go kgontsha ikonomi ya rona go gola le go tlholela batho ba yona ditiro.
zul: umgwaqo obheke enkululekweni yoqobo usemude impela, futhi sikubonile ukukhula koqhekeko ezweni lethu.

tsn: ke aforika borwa yoo batho ba yona ba nang le ponelopele, phisegelo le maikemisetso.
zul: phakathi kwabamnyama nabamhlophe, abacebile nabampofu, abahlala emadolobheni nabahlala ezindaweni zasemakhaya, phakathi kwabesilisa nabesifazane futhi phakathi kwabantu abakhuluma izilimi ezahlukene, abalandela amasiko ahlukene.

tsn: ke aforika borwa yoo a amogelang matsapa a a tlhodilweng ke ditiragalo tsa mo nakong e e fetileng, fela a sa ikobonye ka bokamoso jwa yona.
zul: kwezinye izikhathi bekubonakala sengathi waphephethwa ngumoya umusa owasenza sibuyisane ngowe-1994.

tsn: ke aforika borwa yo baeteledipele ba yona ba leng pelokgale, ba ba sa lebaleng gore ba tletse go direla batho – bao go diragatsa tiro ya bona e leng selo se le esi fela se sekgologadi e bile e le sona fela se ba se tletseng.
zul: kodwa-ke ngeke neze siyekelele konke ngenxa yokuphelelwa yithemba nokwamukela ukuthi sesihlulekile.

tsn: go feta tsotlhe tseno, ke aforika borwa yo botlhe re ikgantshang ka ene tebang le tseo re di fitlheletseng le fao re batlang go ipone re le teng mo nakong e e tlang.
zul: isizwe sethu sisekelwe yizimpande zokubekezelelana nokuphilisana ngokuthula futhi asijiki neze, asihlehli neze, futhi sibumbene ekubhekaneni ngqo nakho konke okuzama ukusihlukanisa phakathi, noma okuhlose ukucekela phansi izinzuzo nempumelelo esayithola kanzima.

tsn: go nne fa re atlega – e bile mo ntlheng eno re na le bonnete jwa gore re tla atlega – e tla bo e le naga yotlhe e e tla bong e atlega.
zul: kodwa nakuba kunjalo sakwazi ukuwela ngelibanzi, futhi siyanqoba.

tsn: jaaka puso, maphata a kgwebo, mekgatlo ya badiri le ya baagi, tla re tshwaraganeng go galaletsa bokamoso jwa rona.
zul: ngezikhathi ezinzima kakhulu kuleli, ngumoya ongapheliyo ongaphakathi kithina njengabantu owasikhuthaza ukuthi singapheli amandla futhi sihlalele ethembeni ngoba izinto zizolunga.

tsn: tla re tshwareng bokamoso jwa rona botlhe ka diatla tsoopedi, fa ke e baya ka mafoko a a sa sweng lentswe a lokwalotumelano lwa kgololesego: re tshegetsane, re na le matla le bopelokgale.
zul: yilo moya wokuba nethemba ozosithwala usise phambili lapho siyobhekana khona ngqo futhi ngesibindi nengomuso elisha.

tsn: tiro eno – ya go aga aforika borwa yo o botoka – re tshwanetse go e rwala mmogo rotlhe jaaka naga, jaaka re le baagi ba naga ya aforika borwa.
zul: leyo iningizimu afrika lapho yonke indoda, wonke umuntu wesifazane kanye nezingane behlinzekwa ngethuba kanye nezinsiza nezindlela zokuzenzela ingomuso elingcono.

tsn: jaaka re tla bo re samagana le tditiro tseno le dikgwetlho tsa teng, re tshwanetse re gakologelwa mafoko a ga theodore roosevelt, yo a rileng:“ga se banyefodi ba ba ka bonang.
zul: leyo iningizimu afrika esikulungele ukuwabamba ngazo zombili futhi iwasebenzise amathuba ahlinzekwa wuguquko lwezobuchwepheshe oluvunguza emhlabeni wonke jikelele, ukuze sikhulise umnotho wezwe futhi sivule amathuba omsebenzi azohlomulisa abantu bakuleli.

tsn: ga se monna yo a ka supang fa monna wa seganka a thekesela, kgotsa modiri wa ditiro a ka bo a dirile botoka fa go tla fa kae.“tlotla e tshwanetse e lebisiwe kwa monneng yo a leng ka fa areneng, yo sefatlhego sa gagwe se setlhefaditsweng ke dithole le sethitho le madi.
zul: leyo iningizimu afrika enabantu abanombono, ugqozi nenkuthalo kanye nokulangazelela ukufezekisa amaphupho nezifiso zabo.

tsn: mmusakgotla wa kokoanotheomolao ya bosetšhaba (na), mme thandi modise,modulasetulo wa lekgotla la bosetšhaba la diporofense (ncop), rre amos masondo,motlatsamoporesitente rre david mabuza,moatlhodimogolo rre mogoeng mogoeng le ditokololo tsotlhe tse di tlotlegang tsa bosiamisi,moporesitente wa maloba rre kgalema motlanthe,moporesitente wa maloba rre thabo mbeki,mmusakgotla wa maloba wa na, ngaka frene ginwala,mmusakgotla wa maloba wa na, rre max sisulu,mmusakgotla wa maloba wa na, mme baleka mbete,moporesitente wa palamente ya lekgotla la aforika, rre roger nkondo dang,bagale ba kgaratlhelo ya tokololo,ngaka dennis goldberg,ngaka andrew mlangeni,moatefokata priscilla jana,mme joyce dipale,mme lillian keagile,mme smally maqungo,ditona le batlatsatona,ditonakgolo le babusakgotla ba dikgotlapeomolao tsa diporofense,modulasetilo wa mokgatlho wa dipusoselegae wa aforika borwa (salga) le bomeyarabagolo,mmusisi wa banka ya risefe ya aforika borwa, rre lesetja kganyago,ditlhogo tsa ditheo tse di sireletsang molaotheo wa temokerasi,baeteledipele ba mekgatlho ya bodumedi,baeteledipele ba ditheo tsa thuto le tsa dipatlisiso,ditokololo tsa ditheo tsa sedipolomate,baeng ba ba laleditsweng,ditokololo tse di tlotlegang tsa na,ditokololo tse di tlotlegang tsa ncop,maaforika borwa a gaetsho,re kokoane fano mo tshimolong ya palamente ya temokerasi ya bo rataro, morago ga dingwaga di le 106 ka letsatsi la go tsenngwatirisong ga molao wa mafatshe a bathobatsho – e leng o mongwe wa melao e e tlhodileng matlhotlhapelo ka go amoga bathobatsho mafatshe a bona, wa tlhola kutlobotlhoko e e seng kana ka sepe le go sotla batho – ka go tsenngwa tirisong.
zul: somlomo wesigungu sikazwelonke, unkz thandi modise,sihlalo womkhandlu kazwelonke wezifundazwe, umnu amos masondo,iphini likamongameli, u-david mabuza,ijaji eliyinhloko, u-mogoeng mogoeng, kanye nawo wonke amalungu ahloniphekile ophiko lwezobulungiswa,umongameli waphambilini, umnu kgalema motlanthe,umongameli waphambilini, umnu thabo mbeki,usomlomo waphambilini wesigungu sikazwelonke, udkt frene ginwala,usomlomo waphambilini wesigungu sikazwelonke, umnu max sisulu,usomlomo waphambilini wesigungu sikazwelonke, unkz baleka mbete,umongameli wephalamende lamazwe ase-afrika, umnu roger nkodo dang,omakadebebona bomzabalazo wenkululeko,udkt dennis goldberg,udkt andrew mlangeni,u-advocate priscilla jana,unkz joyce dipale,unkz lillian keagile,unkz smally maqungo,ongqongqoshe kanye namaphini abo,ondunankulu kanye nosomlomo bezishayamthetho zezifundazwe,usihlalo wenhlangano yohulumeni basekhaya yaseningizimu afrika kanye nezimeya zemikhandludolobha,umphathi webhange lombuso laseningizimu afrika, umnu lesetja kganyago,izinhloko zezikhungo zikahulumeni ezeseka ukubusa ngentando yeningi labantu,abaholi bezinhlangano zezenkolo,abaholi bezikhungo zezemfundo nezocwaningo,amalungu ezindlu zamanxusa,izimenywa ezikhethekile,amalungu ahloniphekile esigungu sikazwelonke,amalungu ahloniphekile omkhandlu kazwelonke wezifundazwe,bantu baseningizimu afrika, njengoba sibuthene lapha, ekuqaleni kwephalamende lesithupha lentando yeningi yabantu, sibuthene ngosuku owaqala ngalo ukusebenza umthetho womhlaba wabomdabu, eminyakeni eyi-106 edlule – okungesinye sezigameko ezadala umonakalo omkhulu, sokuphucwa kwabantu umhlaba wabo, esashiya abantu behleli dengwane futhi esadala ukukhala nokugedla kwamazinyo, nosizi olwesabekayo.

tsn: re gopola mafoko a ga sol plaatje motsing oo o o dirileng gore batho ba rothise kgodu e khibidu, fa a ne a re:“re tsoga moso e le wa labotlhano, seetebosigo 20, 1913, mothomotsho wa naga ya aforika borwa o iphitlhela e se lekgoba, fela a apotswe naga e bile e le motlhokalegae mo nageng ya gaabo.”batho ba borona ba sotlegile e le ruri e bile ba bogile fa go utlwisang botlhoko ka ntlha ya go tsenngwa tirisong ga molao wa mafatshe a bathobatsho.
zul: siyawakhumbula amagama ashiwo ngu-sol plaatje, ephawula ngalesi sigameko esibuhlungu kangaka, uma ethi: “ngenkathi evuka ekuseni ngolwesihlanu, mhla zingama-20 kunhlaba ngowe-1913, umuntu omnyama wazithola, empeleni engesona isigqila, kepha eyisilahlwa, esingafuneki neze ezweni lakhe, azalelwa kulona, futhi lapho inkaba yakhe ikhona.” abantu bakithi bahlukumezeka kakhulu futhi bahlangabezana nobunzima obesabekayo ngenxa yokushaywa komthetho womhlaba wabomdabu.

tsn: matsadi a molao ono a a tsentsweng tirisong gompieno dingwaga di le 106 tse di fetileng le gompieno a santse a re aparetse.
zul: kuze kube namuhla, sisahleli nemithelela kanye nemiphumela emibi yalowo mthetho.

tsn: morago ga dingwaga di feta di le lekgolo tsa tshotlego eno, re romiwa go aga aforika borwa eo mo go yona go seng ope yo e tla tsogang e le lekgoba kgotsa motlhokalegae, moo botlhe ba tla nnang le kgololesego le go lekalekana mmogo le go tlotlana.
zul: njengoba sekuphele iminyaka eyevile ekhulwini kwenzeka lesi sigameko esiphambene kakhulu nobulungiswa, kumele sisukume sakhe iningizimu afrika lapho engekho noyedwa umuntu ozoba yisigqila noma isilahlwa, kepha kube khona kuphela abantu abakhululekile, abalinganayo futhi abahlonishwayo.

tsn: re kokoane fano mo nakong ya dipharagobe tse di bokete e bile go le dikgwetlho tse di seng kana ka sepe mo temokerasing ya rona e e santseng e le potlana.
zul: sibuthene lapha ngesikhathi esinzima kakhulu futhi esinezinselelo eziningi embusweni wethu wentando yeningi labantu osemusha.

tsn: le fa go le jalo, re mo motsing o mo hisetoring ya rona o re rwaletseng tsholofelo e e seng kana ka sepe.
zul: kepha-ke, nakuba kunjalo, sisesikhathini emlandweni wethu lapho kuvunguza khona umoya wethemba elikhulu, lokuthi konke sekuzolunga noma kanjani.

tsn: mo dingwageng di le 25 tsa temokerasi ya rona re gatetse pele go utlwagala mo go ageng setšhaba se se ntšhwa moo maaforika borwa otlhe a nang le ditshwanelo ka go lekalekana le ditšhono tse di oketsegang.
zul: eminyakeni engama-25 izwe libuswa ngentando yeningi labantu, sesenze inqubekelaphambili enkulu impela ekwakheni isizwe esisha lapho bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika benamalungelo alinganayo kanye namathuba angudeda ngendlale.

tsn: mo dingwageng di le 25 tse di fetileng re dirile go tlala seatla go ka fitlhelela ditlhokwa tse di botlhokwa tsa baagi, ka go fokotsa lehuma le go fetola taolo ya ikonomi e e neng e kgwetlha e e neng e tlhamilwe gore e thuse fela batho ba le mmalwa.
zul: eminyakeni engama-25, kuningi esesikwenzile ukuhlangabezana nezidingo zabantu eziyisisekelo, ukunciphisa ububha kanye nokuvuselela kabusha umnotho owabe usufadalele, owabe wenzelwe ukubhekana nezidingo zabayingcosana kuphela.

tsn: ka go dirisana, re tlhomile motheo o o tsetsepetseng o re ka agang naga mo go ona o mo go ona botlhe ba tla itharabologelwang kagiso le tigelo ya matswalo mmogo le go kgotsofala ka bojotlhe.
zul: ngokusebenzisana kanye nokubambisana, sikwazile ukubeka isisekelo esiqinile esingakhela phezu kwaso izwe lapho bonke abantu bezohlala ngokuthula, banethezeke, futhi bathokoze.

tsn: le fa go le jalo, re kokoane mo nakong eo naga ya rona e tobaneng le dikgwetlho tse di seng kana ka sepe.
zul: kepha-ke nakuba kunjalo, sibuthene ngesikhathi lapho izwe lethu libhekene nezinselelo ezinkulu.

tsn: maemo a ikonomi ya rona ga a tlhabologe le go gola ka fao go neng go solofetswe.
zul: umnotho wethu awukhuli.

tsn: ga re kgone go tlhola ditiro tse di lekaneng mo nageng ya rona.
zul: futhi aligculisi neze izinga lokwakhiwa kwamathuba omsebenzi.

tsn: eno ke tlhobaboroko e e di fetang tsotlhe.
zul: lokhu kuyinto esikhathaza ngaphezu kwakho konke okunye.

tsn: e ama mang le mang.
zul: kuyinto ethinta wonke umuntu.

tsn: e ama wena, lekau la kwa emzimhlope kwa soweto, fa o sale o konosetsa dithuto tsa gago dingwaga di le tlhano tse di fetileng le gompieno tiro ga o ise o e bone.
zul: kuthinta wena, nsizwa yasemzimhlophe, esoweto, njengoba sekuphele iminyaka emihlanu uqedile esikoleni, kodwa namanje awukawutholi umsebenzi, usahleli ekhaya.

tsn: e ama wena, mmemotsadi wa kwa delft yo o godisang bana kanosi, yo mogolo wa gago wa botsofe o go tlhokomelang mmogo le ditlogolo tsa gago.
zul: kunomthelela kuwena, mama wase-delft, ozikhulisela abantwana bakhe yedwana, njengoba ungagcini nje kuphela ngokuzondla wena ngesibonelelo-mali sakho osithola kuhulumeni kodwa kumele futhi wondle nabazukulu bakho imbala.

tsn: e ama gape le wena, modiredi yo o thapilweng kwa nelson mandela bay, yo le fa o amogela mogolo wa gago o santseng o sokolela go ka iphedisa.
zul: kubuhlungu futhi nakuwena, msebenzi wase-nelson mandela bay, ngoba phela nakuba ukhona umholo owutholayo, kunzima kakhulu ukwanelisa izidingo zakho zempilo.

tsn: go bokete thata mo go wena, wena mošwa yo a tsenang kwa yunibesiti ya sol plaatje e e kwa kapa bokone, yo a santseng a tlhoka bonnyane jo a ka bo amogelang mo batsading ba gagwe jwa madi go ka ithekela diyamaleng.
zul: kunzima kuwena, mfundi wenyuvesi i-sol plaatje, enyakatho kapa, othembele kwimadlana encane yokuzondla nokuziphilisa oyiphiwa ngabazali bakho.

tsn: maitemogelo a bagaetsho ke ona ao ke sa tswang go a tlhalosa ao ba itemogelang ona letsatsi le letsatsi.
zul: konke lokhu engisanda kukusho kuyichaza njengoba injalo impilo ephilwa ngabantu bakithi.

tsn: tseo ke dikgwetlho tseo baagi ba naga eno ba itemogelang tsonare utlwile dilelo tsa lona, mmogo le tsa ba bangwe ba lona ba bantsi.
zul: impilo yakho ifana ncamashi nobunzima bansukuzonke bokuphila kwabantu bakuleli.

tsn: bontsi jwa rona fano jaaka re le baemedi ba ba tlhophilweng mo ditlhophong go tla go emela batho ba borona fano, ba ne ba rebotse matsholo sebaka sa dikgwedi di le mmalwa ba sutlhana le naga ba reetsa maikutlo le seo baagi ba naga ya rona ba neng ba se bua.
zul: iningi lethu njengabameleli abaqokwe ngabantu ukuthi sibe lapha, sichithe isikhathi esiningi impela kulezi zinyanga ezimbalwa ezedlule sehla senyuka emiphakathini ezweni lonkana, silalela izimvo zabantu kanye nezimfuno nezifiso zabo.

tsn: sibezwile abantu bakithi, bekhuluma nathi, singena siphuma ezindlini zabo.. ro vha pfa hoṱhe hoṱhe he ra tshimbila hone.
zul: sibezwile abantu bakithi bekhuluma nathi ngenkathi singena siphuma ezindlini zabo.

tsn: ndi amba na he ha tshimbila vho maimane na vho julius malema.. lapho kuhambe khona umhlonishwa ubuthelezi naye uzwile ukuthi abantu bathini.
zul: ndi amba na he ha tshimbila vho maimane na vho julius malema.

tsn: le moo rre groenewald a fetileng jaaka re ne re mo bona le ene a putla naga, hey kan ook se dat hy het die mense gehoor.. sinizwile.
zul: lapho kuhambe khona umhlonishwa ubuthelezi naye uzwile ukuthi abantu bathini.

tsn: hi swi twile.
zul: hi swi twile.

tsn: ro ni pfa.
zul: ro ni pfa.

tsn: re le utlwile.
zul: re le utlwile.

tsn: mo ditlhophong tseo di neng di tshwerwe ka kgwedi ya motsheganong, batho ba borona ba re rwesitse maikarabelo a a sa potapoteng a kgolo le go ikaga sešwa.
zul: okhethweni obelubanjwe ngonhlaba, nisihlinzeke ngegunya elicacile lokukhula nokuvuselela kabusha.

tsn: rona rotlhe fano re le utlwile – nna, motlotlegi maimane, motlotlegi malema, motlotlegi buthelezi, motlotlegi groenewald, motlotlegi meshoe, motlotlegi holomisa, motlotlegi zungula, motlotlegi de lille, motlotlegi magwaza-msibi, motlotlegi galo, motlotlegi lekota, motlotlegi nyhontso le motlotlegi hendricks.
zul: sonke sinizwile – mina ngokwami nginizwile, nomhlonishwa umaimane unizwile, kanjalo nomhlonishwa umalema, nomhlonishwa ubuthelezi, nomhlonishwa u-groenewald, nomhlonishwa umeshoe, nomhlonishwa uholomisa, nomhlonishwa uzungula, nomhlonishwa u-de lille, nomhlonishwa ukamagwaza-msibi, nomhlonishwa ugalo, nomhlonishwa ulekota, nomhlonishwa unyhontso kanye nomhlonishwa u-hendricks.

tsn: leru leno le letsho la puso ya tlhaolele le le tsweletseng le gompieno le tlhodile matsapa a a seng kana ka sepe – mo mererong ya ikonomi le mo mererong ya loago.
zul: umonakalo ongapheli owashiywa ngumbuso wobandlululo, olokhu uqhubeke njalo.

tsn: mo godimo ga fao, re tshwanelwa ke go mekamekana le diphetogo tsa thekenoloji tse di potlakileng tse di tlang ka diphetogo mo mafelong a tirelo, tse di fetolang maemo a ikonomi ya lefatshe le tseo di fetolang dikgolagano tsa loago.
zul: sewudale izinkinga ezikhahlameza izwe lethu lonkana – okuyizinkinga zomnotho ngokunjalo nezinkinga zenhlalo yomphakathi.

tsn: naga ya rona mmogo le tse dingwe tsa boditšhaba, di tobane le diphetogo tse di seng kana ka sepe mo maemong a tlelaemete ya lefatshe fa e sale mo hisetoring ya phologolo motho.
zul: futhi kusenjalo, kumele sibhekane noguquko lwezobuchwepheshe olwenzeka ngesivinini esikhulu, oluletha izindlela ezintsha zokwenza umsebenzi ezindaweni okusetshenzelwa kuzona, olubumba kabusha umnotho womhlaba futhi olushintsha indlela abantu abaxhumana ngayo, futhi basebenzisane ngayo.

tsn: maemo a a tšhakgetseng a bosa a go tsewang e le a go ruthufala ga loapi a baya ikonomi ya rona mo matshosetsing a magolo, a baya matshelo a batho le seo motho e leng sona mo kotsing e bile gape – fa re sa tseye dikgato gona jaanong jaana – a ka feletsa ka go fedisa matshelo a batho go ya go ile mo lefatsheng.
zul: thina kanye nawo wonke amanye amazwe omhlaba, sizithola sibhekene nezinguquko zesimo sezulu esezidale imbubhiso kanye nomonakalo omkhulukazi emlandweni.

tsn: re utlwile bašwa ba rona fa ba ne ba gwantetse kwa union buildings mo bekeng e e fetileng ba ikuela gore re tseye dikgato go boloka lefatshe la rona.
zul: isimo sezulu esibi kakhulu esihlobene nesivuvu somkhathi sibeka umnotho wethu engcupheni, futhi siphinde sibeke engcupheni nezimpilo zabantu bakithi kanye nezindlela abaziphilisa ngazo, futhi uma singathathi izinyathelo njengamanje, kungenzeka sigcine sesishabalele sonke thina singabantu.

tsn: kana e ne e le ka ntlha ya dikgwetlho tseno tse kgolo fa re ne re swetsa go tsenya leano la tlhabololo la bosetšhaba (ndp) ka ngwaga wa 2012 mo legwafeng la rona gore le re fatlhose le go kaela matsapa a rona a re a tsayang a bosetšhaba a go fedisa lehuma, botlhokatiro le tlhokotekatekano.
zul: yisona-ke isidingo sokubhekana ngqo nalezi zinselelo ezisemqoka kakhulu esaholela ekutheni samukele uhlelo lokuthuthukiswa kwezwe (i-ndp) ngowezi-2012 ukuze luhole imizamo yethu ezweni lonkana yokunqoba ububha, ukuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi kanye nokungalingani.

tsn: le fa go le jalo, re saletswe fela ke dingwaga di le 10 pele re ka goroga mo ngwageng wa 2030, mme ga gona tema e le kalo e re setseng re e dirile go ka fitlhelela dipeelo tsa ndp.
zul: kodwa-ke, kuyacaca ukuthi njengoba sekusele iminyaka eyi-10 ngaphambi kokuthi sifike onyakeni wezi-2030, asikenzi inqubekelaphambili egculisayo ekuhlangabezaneni nemigomo okumele sifinyelele kuyona ebekwe yi-ndp.

tsn: fa re sa tseye dikgato tse di gagametseng, ga re ka ke ra fitlhelela ponelopele ya 2030. seno se raya gore re tlhoka go rulaganya dintlha tsa rona ka lenaneo la tatelano ya botlhokwa jwa tsona.
zul: ngaphandle uma sithatha izinyathelo ezinqala futhi ezinohlonze, ngeke neze sikwazi ukufezekisa inhlosombono yowezi-2030.

tsn: re tshwanetse go tsepamisa mogopolo mo dikgatong tse di tla nnang le mosola o mogolo, dikgato tse di tla potlakisang kgatelopele, mo pakakhutshweng le mo pakateleleng ya dingwaga tse re di lebileng di le 10. go botlhokwa go ela tlhoko gore letlhomeso la togamaano ya pakagare (mtsf) mo dingwageng di le tlhano tse di fetileng le nnile le ditlamorago di feta di le 1 100 tseo mo go tsona re neng re tshwanetse go ela tlhoko maemo a kgatelopele fa re tsenya tirisong ndp.
zul: lokhu kusho ukuthi kumele sizibeke eqhulwini lezo zinto ezisemqoka kakhulu.

tsn: jaanong ke nako ya go tsepamisa mogopolo mo go diragatseng.
zul: manje sekuyisikhathi sokuthi sibhukule sigxile ekwenzeni lokho esithe sizokwenza.

tsn: jaanong ke nako ya go tsaya ditshwetso.
zul: sekuyisikhathi sokuthi sithathe izinqumo mayelana nokuthi yikuphi esizokwenza.

tsn: tse dingwe tsa ditshwetso tseno di tla re kokonela mme tse dingwe di ka nne tsa se itumedise batho botlhe.
zul: ezinye zalelo zinqumo kungenzeka kube yizinqumo ezinzima impela futhi ezinye zazo kungenzeka zingehli kahle kwabanye abantu.

tsn: mo maemo a ikonomi a sa goleng, mo matlole a puso a sonagiwang, ga re kitla re kgona go diragatsa dilo tsotlhe ka nako e le nngwe.
zul: esimweni lapho umnotho ungakhuli, futhi esikhathini lapho uhulumeni enemali eyingcosana emgodlagodleni wakhe wezimali, ngeke neze sikwazi ukwenza konke ngesikhathi esisodwa.

tsn: jaaka re amogela tsamaiso eno e ntšhwa, re tla tsepamisa mogopolo mo dintlheng di le supa tse di botlhokwa:manaane otlhe a rona mmogo le dipholisi tsotlhe go ralala le mafapha otlhe le ditheo tsotlhe tsa rona di tla laelwa gore di samagane le tiro eno e kgologadi e re dumelang gore e tla kgona go abela maaforika borwa otlhe botshelo jo bo botoka.
zul: njengoba singena kuleli hlandla lokuphatha elisha, sizogxila ezintweni eziyisikhombisa eziseqhulwini: zonke izinhlelo nezinqubomgomo zethu, kuyo yonke iminyango nezimpiko zikahulumeni, zizoqondiswa ekufezeni le misebenzi ebanzi futhi ehlanganisa konke, esikholelwa ukuthi izokwazi ukuletha impilo engcono kubo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika.

tsn: mme go ntse go le jalo, re tshwanetse go busetsa serodumo sa ndp mo maemong a sona mo boteng jwa medi ya matsapa a naga ya rona, go e tsosa mo borokong, go dira gore e nne karolo ya matshelo a baagi ba aforika borwa.
zul: futhi kusenjalo, kumele sibuyisele i-ndp endaweni yayo, lapho ingumgogodla wakho konke esikwenzayo ezweni, ukuze siqinisekise ukuthi iyasebenza, futhi siyenze ibe yingxenye yempilo yansukuzonke kanye nezimo abahlangabezana nazo abantu baseningizimu afrika.

tsn: kwa moletlong wa go tlhomiwa mo setilong ga moporesitente, re buile gore eno ke nako ya diphetogo mo nageng ya rona e nnye.
zul: enkulumweni engayethula emcimbini wokugcotshwa kwami njengomongameli, ngathi lesi yisikhathi esibaluleke kakhulu esizweni sethu esisesisha.

tsn: naga e e tobaneng le dikgwetlho tse di seng kana ka sepe.
zul: okuyisizwe esibhekene nezinselelo ezinkulu.

tsn: naga e e nang le batho ba le dimilione di le 57 ba mo dingwageng tse di fetileng ba emeng kgatlhanong le go fenya tsamaiso e nngwe ya tse di busula go gaisa e e tlhodilweng ke batho, tlhaolele.
zul: isizwe esinabantu abayizigidi ezingama-57 abasukuma eminyakeni edlule banqoba enye yezinqubo-kuphatha ezimbi kunazo zonke ezisungulwe ngabantu, ubandlululo.

tsn: naga ya batho ba ba nang le sebete.
zul: isizwe sabantu abanesibindi.

tsn: re buile gape le gore ke ditiro tsa rona jaanong tse di tla re baakanyetsang bokamoso jwa rona.
zul: ngasho futhi ukuthi izinyathelo esizozithatha njengamanje yizona ezizocaba indlela eya phambili kwingomuso laleli lizwe.

tsn: jaaka aforika borwa e tsena mo dingwageng di le 25 e le mo temokerasing, mmogo le go tebelana le dipeelo tsa ndp, tla re totobatseng maikemisetso a magolo a a nang le seriti, maikemisetso a go tshwaragana, mo re tla dirisang matla le tsotlhe tse re nang le tsone.
zul: njengoba iningizimu afrika ingena eminyakeni elandelayo engama-25 ibuswa ngentando yeningi labantu, futhi ngenhloso yokufezekisa izinjongo ze-ndp, masizibekele injongo ebonisa isibindi neqholo, inhloso ezosibumbanisa sonke, esizozibophezela kuyona ngokuphelele futhi sifake kuyona wonke amandla nomfutho esinawo kanye nazo zonke izinsizaku-sebenza nezinsiza-sidingo zethu.

tsn: jaaka re tsena mo ngwagasomeng yo o setseng wa ponelopele ya 2030, tla re tlhaloseng ka tlhamalalo aforika borwa yo re o batlang mme re utlwanele dikgato tse di gagametseng tse re tshwanetseng go di tsaya gore re fitlhelele dipeelo tseno.
zul: njengoba singena kwiminyaka eyi-10 yokugcina yenhloso-mbono yowezi-2030, masikubeke kucace bha ukuthi ngenjani iningizimu afrika esiyifunayo futhi sivumelane ngezinyathelo eziphathekayo futhi ezinohlonze esizozithatha ukufinyelela kuleyo ningizimu afrika esiyifunayo.

tsn: go netefatsa gore matsapa a rona a a diragadiwa, ke tshitshinya gore, mo dintlheng tse di botlhokwa tsa tsamaiso eno, re dumelaneng ka dipeelo di le tlhano tse di botlhokwa tse re tshwanetseng go di fitlhelela mo ngwagasomeng yo re o lebileng, mme di tshwanetse go nna karolo ya dintlha tseno tsotlhe di le supa.
zul: ukuze siqinisekise ukuthi imizamo yethu iqondiswe ngqo kulokho esifuna ukukwenza, ngiphakamisa ukuthi, kulezi zinto ezibekwe eqhulwini yilo hulumeni ophetheyo njengamanje, sivumelane ngezinjongo eziyisisekelo ezinhlanu okumele sizifezekise kule minyaka eyi-10 ezayo, eziyingxenye yalezi zinto eziyisikhombisa ezibekwe eqhulwini.

tsn: jaaka naga tla re utlwaneng gore jaaka re le baagi ba re tshwaraganeng ka ntlha ya maikaelelo a rona, mo dingwageng di le 10 tse re di lebileng re tla bo re gatetse kwa pele mo go lwantsheng lehuma, tlhokotekatekano le botlhokatiro, mme:tla re direng maikano ano gona jaanong – re ikane ka borona le go ikana fa pele ga nna le wena – le fa re itse sentle gore dikgato tseno di tla nna bokete mo metsweding ya rona le mo bokgoning jwa rona, fela re tlhaloganya sentle gore fa re ka be ra kgona go fitlhelela dipeelo tseno di le tlhano, re tla bo re kgonne go fetola le go tokafatsa setšhaba sa borona.
zul: masivumelane, njengesizwe futhi njengabantu abanezinhloso ezifanayo, ukuthi ingakapheli le minyaka eyi-10 ezayo sizobe sesenze inqubekelaphambili ekuqedeni ububha, ukungalingani kanye nokuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi, lapho: masizenze njengamanje lezi zibophezelo – sizibhekise kithina uqobo futhi sizibhekise nakomunye nomunye wethu – sibe sazi kahle kamhlophe ukuthi zizodinga izinsiza-sidingo kanye namandla ethu angeziwe, kodwa futhi ngokuqonda ukuthi uma siphumelela ukufezekisa lezi zinjongo, sizobe siphumelelile ukuletha uguquko olunohlonze ezweni lethu.

tsn: re tlhomile dipeelo tseno tse kgolo, e seng gore re sa elelwe dikgwetlho tse kgolo tse re tobaneng le tsona, fela e le ka ntlha ya tsona.
zul: izinjongo ezinohlonze esizibekele zona asizibekanga ngoba sifuna ukushaya indiva noma ukubukela phansi ubunzima esibhekene nabo esikhathini samanje, kodwa-ke yibona impela lobu bunzima obenze ukuthi sizibekele lezi zinjongo.

tsn: re tlhomile dipeelo tseno gore ditshwetso tse re di tsayang gona jaanong e nne tse dikgolo mme e bile gape re tshwanetse go di tsaya ka lepotlapotla le le seng kana ka sepe.
zul: sizibekele lezi zinjongo ukuze siqinisekise ukuthi izinqumo esizithathayo njengamanje yizinqumo ezinohlonze, ezibonisa isibindi futhi ukuze sithathe izinyathelo eziphuthumayo.

tsn: maikemisetso a rona a gore pele dingwaga di le 10 di feta go tla bo go se ope mo nageng ya aforika borwa yo a bolawang ke tlala a botlhokwa thata mo matsapeng a rona a go fedisa lehuma le mo go fokotseng tlhokotekatekano.
zul: ukuzibophezela kwethu ekutheni kule minyaka eyi-10 ezayo asifuni ukubona noyedwa umuntu ebhuqabhuqwa yindlala eningizimu afrika, kuyisisekelo somzamo wethu wokuqeda ububha futhi sinciphise nokungalingani okukhona kuleli.

tsn: mo godimo ga go tlhola ditiro le ditšhono tse dingwe tsa ikonomi, seno se raya gore re tshwanetse gape gore re oketse mogolo wa loago mmogo le go fokotsa tlhwatlhwa ya madi a motho a a tlhokang go iphedisa.
zul: ngaphezu kokudala amathuba omsebenzi kanye namanye amathuba ezomnotho, lokhu kusho ukuthi kumele siqinise uhlelo lwezibonelelo nemixhaso yomphakathi ehlinzekwa nguhulumeni futhi sinciphise nezindleko zokuphila.

tsn: go raya gore re tshwanetse go tokafatsa madi a a duelelwang, maemo a pabalesego mmogo le go golaganya dipalangwa tsa setšhaba go ka tshegetsa malapa a a iponelang megolo e e kwa tlase.
zul: lokhu kusho ukuthi kumele siqinisekise ukuthi lawo makhaya athola umholo ophansi noma ingeniso-mali ephansi ahlinzekwa ngezithuthi zomphakathi ezingambi eqolo, eziphephile futhi ezididiyelwe.

tsn: le fa re nnile le kgatelopele e kgolo mo go tlameleng batho ka dintlo, maaforika borwa ka bontsi a santse a tlhoka dinaga gore ba iphedise ka tsona le gore ba ikagele dintlo.
zul: nakuba senze inqubekelaphambili enkulu ekuhlinzekweni kwabantu ngezindlu, baningi abantu baseningizimu afrika abasadinga umhlaba abazozakhela kuwona amakhaya abo kanye nezindawo zokuqhuba ibhizinisi ukuze bakwazi ukuziphilisa.

tsn: mo dingwageng di le tlhano tse re di lebileng, re tla potlakisa tlamelo ya dintlo le dinaga tse di leng mo mafelong a a siameng go di neela maaforika borwa a a humanegileng.
zul: kule minyaka emihlanu ezayo, sizokusheshisa ukuhlinzekwa kwabantu baseningizimu afrika abahlwempu ngezindlu ezakhiwe ezindaweni ezifanelekile futhi ezikulungele ukuhlaliswa kwabantu futhi sibahlinzeke nangomhlaba.

tsn: gore re tokafatse boleng jwa matshelo a maaforika borwa, go fokotsa bogale le mefuta ya bohuma le go matlafatsa ikonomi ya rona, re tla tshwanelwa ke go tokafatsa boitekanelo jwa batho ba borona.
zul: ukuze senze ngcono izinga lempilo ephilwa ngabantu baseningizimu afrika, siqede zonke izinhlobo zobubha futhi siqinise nomnotho wezwe, sizothatha izinyathelo zokubhekelela nokunakekela impilo yabantu bakithi ukuze bahlale bengumqemane.

tsn: re tshwanetse go samagana le dipetlele le ditleliniki tsa rona.
zul: kumele sithathe izinyathelo zokuqinisekisa ukuthi ezibhedlela kanye nasemitholampilo yethu zikhona zonke izinsiza-kusebenza kanye nezinsiza-sidingo ezidingekayo ukuze lezi zikhungo zikwazi ukusebenza kahle futhi ngobunyoninco.

tsn: go phoso e bile ga go a tshwanela gore koko wa dingwaga di le 80 a tlhole letsatsi lotlhe kwa sepetlele kgotsa kwa tleliniking a fodile mola wa gore a tle go tsaya melemo.
zul: kuyinto engalungile neze ukuthi ugogo oneminyaka yobudala engama-80 achithe usuku lonke emgqeni elinde imithi yakhe.

tsn: go phoso gore molwetse yo a bobolang a busediwe gae ka ntlha ya gore ga gona dingaka kgotsa baoki.
zul: kuyinto engalungile neze ukuthi umuntu ogula kakhulu ajikiswe, kuthiwe makabuyele ekhaya, ngenxa nje yokuntuleka kodokotela nabahlengikazi.

tsn: go phoso gore mme yo a leng gaufi le go belega, botshelo jwa leseanyana la gagwe bo bewe mo kotsing ka ntlha ya gore sejanaga sa pholoso se tsere nako e telele gore se goroge go tla go mo rwalela bookelong.
zul: kuyinto engalungile neze ukuthi impilo yengane engakazalwa, yowesifazane obelethayo, ibe sengcupheni ngenxa ye-ambulensi ethatha isikhathi eside ngaphambi kokuba ifike izomlanda.

tsn: jaaka karolo ya tiro e re tshwanetseng go semelela mo go yona go tokafatsa boleng jwa tsamaiso ya boitekanelo, re garela tokomane ya tumelano ya samiti ya boitekanelo ya ga moporesitente, e e tlhalosang maitemogelo a le mantsi mme e tla bokeletsa bannaleseabe botlhe mo lephateng leno go mekamekana le matsapa otlhe ano a re a bonang kwa ditleliniking le kwa dipetleleng tsa rona.
zul: njengengxenye yomsebenzi okumele siwenze ngokushesha ukuze senze ngcono izinga lohlelo lwezempilo, siphothula umsebenzi wokuhlanganiswa kwemininingwane yesivumelwano esingumphumela wengqungquthela kamongameli yezempilo, esakhelwe phezu kokuqonda okujulile kanye nemibono eyatholakala lapho, futhi okuyisivumelwano esizosebenzisa ongoti abavela kubo bonke ababambiqhaza abasemqoka ukuze kulungiswe izinkinga ezikhona emitholampilo yethu kanye nasezibhedlela.

tsn: re setse re gatetse pele go utlwagala mo go kwaloleng leano le le tseneletseng la inšorense ya bosetšhaba ya boitekanelo (nhi) le le ka ga go tsenya tirisong, go akaretsa le mo go potlakiseng matsholo a boleng jwa tlhokomelo ya boitekanelo mo maokelong a puso, mo go thapeng badiredi, mo go tlhomeng setheo sa letlole la nhi mmogo le go rulaganya madi a a tla tlhokegang mo tsamaisong ya letlole la nhi.
zul: mkhulu impela umsebenzi osuwenziwe ekubuyekezweni kohlelo oluqukethe imininingwane ebanzi lokuqaliswa komshwalense kazwelonke wezempilo (i-nhi), kubandakanya ukusheshiswa kwezinhlelo zokuqinisekisa ikhwalithi yosizo nokunakekelwa okutholakala ezikhungweni zikahulumeni, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi lezi zikhungo zinabasebenzi abanele, ukusungulwa kohlaka lwesikhwama se-nhi, kanye nokubala ukuthi kuzodinga imali engakanani ukuphathwa kwesikhwama se-nhi.

tsn: re santse re tshwenngwa ke bontsi jwa ditshwaetso tsa mogare wa lebolelamading (hiv), bogolosegolo tse re di bonang mo makgarebeng, mmogo le palo e e kwa tlase thata e re e bonang ya makau a a dirang diteko tsa hiv le ya bao ba simololang go tsaya kalafi.
zul: sisalokhu sikhathazekile ngesibalo esikhulayo sabantu abatheleleke ngesandulelangculazi (i-hiv), ikakhulukazi amantombazane nabesifazane abasebasha, futhi sikhathazekile nangesibalo esiphansi kakhulu samadoda ahlolelwa i-hiv bese eqala ukwelashwa uma ethelelekile.

tsn: re tla gagamatsa tiro ya rona gore ka 2020 re kgone go tsenya tirisong togamaano ya rona ya 90-90-90 (moo 90% ya batho ba ba tshelang ka hiv ba tla bong ba itse maemo a bona a boitekanelo ka ga hiv.
zul: sizowuqinisa umsebenzi esiwenzayo wokuqalisa iqhingasu lama-90-90-90 (okungukuthi, ngowezi-2020, abantu abane-hiv abangama-90% kumele basazi isimo sabo se-hiv, abangama-90% basebenzise imishanguzo yokudambisa i-hiv (ama-arv), futhi kwabangama-90% abadla ama-arv lingabe lisabonakala nakancane igciwane le-hiv) okuhloswe ngalo ukuqeda i-hiv njengobhubhane olubeka engcupheni impilo yomphakathi wonkana, okuyiqhingasu elibandakanya ukwengeza abanye abantu, okungenani abayizigidi ezimbili ngaphambi kukazibandlela wezi-2020, esibalweni sabantu abathola ukwelashwa njengamanje.

tsn: moo 90% ya batho ba ba tshelang ka hiv ba tla tlamelwang ka kalafi e e sa kgaotseng ya melemo ya dianthiretrobaerale mme gape moo, 90% ya batho ba ba tlamelwang ka kalafi ya melemo ya dianthiretrobaerale kokwanatlhoko ya bona e tla bong e fokotsegile bogale) gore re kgone go fedisa hiv jaaka e le seo se tshosetsang boitekanelo jwa setšhaba, mme seno se tla tsenyeletsa go okediwa ga palo ya batho ba ba nwang melemo ka palo e e ka nnang dimilione di le pedi pele kgwedi ya sedimonthole 2020 e goroga.
zul: ukuze sikwazi ukunqoba inselelo yobubha kubantu bonke ngokuhlukahlukana kwabo, kumele sihlinzeke ngamakhono futhi sakhe amathuba omsebenzi abhekiswe kubantu abakhubazekile.

tsn: fa e le gore re batla go samagana le dikgwetlho tsa lehuma ka katlego mo setšhabeng sa rona sotlhe, re tshwanelwa ke go tlamela batho ba ba nang le bogolofadi ka bokgoni le go ba bulela ditšhono tsa ikonomi.
zul: ngakho-ke kuyinto ekhathazayo kakhulu ukuthi kukhona izingane ezikhubazekile ezilinganiselwa kwisigamu sesigidi okufanele ngabe zisesikoleni, kodwa njengamanje ezingafundi, ezihleli emakhaya.

tsn: ka jalo, re tshwanetswe go tlhobiwa boroko ke ntlha ya gore go na le bana ba le halofo ya milione ba ba tshelang ka bogolofadi bao ba ka bong ba le kwa sekolong mme ba se kwa sekolong.
zul: ngenhloso yokubhekana nalezi zinselelo, umsebenzi wokuhlelwa nokulawulwa kwezinhlelo eziphathelene nokukhubazeka usufakwe ngaphansi kwehhovisi likamongameli.

tsn: mo go tsibogeleng dikgwetlho tseno, re isitse tirelo ya taolo ya matsholo a bogolofadi kwa lekaleng le le botlhokwa la puso, kwa kantorong ya moporesitente.
zul: sesilivuselelile ithimba likamongameli elengamele imisebenzi ephathelene nokukhubazeka, futhi kulo nyaka sizothumela ephalamende isivumelwano samalungelo abantu abakhubazekile kwelase-afrika, ukuze siqinisekiswe futhi samukelwe ngokusemthethweni.

tsn: re tsosolositse setlhophatiro sa moporesitente sa merero ya bogolofadi, mme re tla romela molao wa ditshwanelo tsa batho ba ba tshelang ka bogolofadi mo aforika kwa palamenteng monongwaga gore o sekasekiwe le go atlenegisiwa go nna molao.
zul: ngenhloso yokuxazulula izinkinga zabantu abasebenzayo abadla imbuya ngothi, sekuphele izinyanga eziyisithupha uqalile ukusebenza umholo ophansi kazwelonke, futhi izinkomba-kusebenza zalesi sikhashana esincane uqalile ukusebenza zibonisa ukuthi izinkampani eziningi ziyawuthobela.

tsn: go samagana le matsapa a batho ba ba dirang fela ba le mo khumanegong, molao wa mogolo o o kwa tlase wa bosetšhaba (nmw) o setse o tsentswe tirisong mme o na le dikgwedi di le thataro o le mo tirisong mme seo se bonagetseng go sa le gale ke gore ditlamo di le dintsi di a o obamela.
zul: ikhomishana yomholo ophansi kazwelonke kulindeleke ukuthi iluphothule ngaphambi kokuphela kwenyanga kamandulo 2019 ucwaningo mayelana nomthelela womholo ophansi kazwelonke ekuqashweni kwabantu, ububha, ukungalingani kanye nokuhluka kwemiholo.

tsn: go solofetswe gore khomišene ya nmw e tla konosetsa dipatlisiso tsa yona ka ga seabe sa nmw mo ditirong, mo go thibeleng lehuma, tlhokotekatekano mmogo le mo go se lekalekaneng ga megolo kwa bokhutlhong jwa kgwedi ya lwetse 2019. ga re kitla re kgona go fetola maemo a rona fa re sa tsepamise mogopolo mo kgolong ya ikonomi.
zul: ngeke neze sikwazi ukuguqula isimo sezwe uma singagxili kakhulu ekukhulisweni komnotho.

tsn: mo dingwageng di le 10 tse re di lebileng, maikemisetso a rona ke gore ikonomi ya rona e tshwanetse go gola ka lebelo le le fetang leo setšhaba sa rona se atang ka lona.
zul: kule minyaka eyi-10 ezayo, sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umnotho ukhula ngesivinini esingaphezulu kakhulu kwesivinini sokukhula kwesibalo sabantu ezweni.

tsn: fa kgolo ya ikonomi ya rona e ka fitlha ka tolamo kwa mankaleng, re tla kgona go baakanya diphoso tse di nnileng teng mo ikonoming ya rona tsa mo nakong e e fetileng.
zul: futhi uma sesifinyelele emazingeni aphakeme okukhula komnotho ngokuqhubekayo yilapho-ke siyokwazi ukuguqula umonakalo wezomnotho owenzeke kuleli esikhathini esedlule.

tsn: re bua jaana nako e le ya dipharagobe ka sebopego sa ikonomi se le bokoa tota.
zul: sikusho lokhu esikhathini lapho izibikezelo zesimo somnotho zibonisa isimo esibuthakathaka kakhulu.

tsn: go latela kgaratlho ya kgolo mo kgweditharong ya ntlha, bankakgolo ya aforika borwa e bonelapele kgolo e e tla gogang dinao thata mo ngwageng wa 2019 go feta ka fao go neng go solofetswe jaaka go ne go setse go tlhalositswe mo puong ya tekanyetsokabo e e rebotsweng ka kgwedi ya tlhakole monongwaga.
zul: kulandela ukwehla nokuncipha kakhulu komnotho ngekota yokuqala yonyaka, manje ibhangengodla selibikezela ukuthi ngowezi-2019 umnotho kungenzeka ukhule ngezinga elingaphansi kwalelo elashiwo kwisabelomali esethulwa ngonhlolanja.

tsn: a mangwe a mabaka a a tlhodileng kgolo eno ya ikonomi e e gogang maoto e nnile kgaolo ya motlakase kwa tshimologong ya monongwaga, mmogo le ketsaetsego e e neng e le teng ka ga tlamelo ya motlakase kwa eskom.
zul: esinye sezizathu ezabangela ukufadalala komnotho wumthelela wokucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga ngasekuqaleni kwalo nyaka, kuhlangene nongabazane olulokhu luqhubeke njalo mayelana nokuphakelwa kukagesi kanye nesimo sezinto ebesingesihle kwa-eskom.

tsn: se re se ithutileng mo ntlheng eno se totobetse: gore go nne le kgolo, re tlhoka motlakase o o tshepagalang o o sa kgaolweng.
zul: isifundo esisithola kulokhu sicace bha: ukuze sikwazi ukukhulisa umnotho, sidinga ukuphakelwa kukagesi okuqhubekayo, ngaso sonke isikhathi, futhi ngendlela esimeme.

tsn: eskom e tobane le dikgwetlho tse di masisi tsa matlole, tsa tirelo le tsa mafaratlhatlha.
zul: u-eskom ubhekene nezinkinga ezinkulu kwezezimali, ekuqhutshweni komsebenzi kanye nesimo sonkana ngaphakathi enkampanini.

tsn: fa e sale go nna le kgaolo ya motlakase kwa tshimologong ya monongwaga, eskom e nnile le kgatelopele mo go tsennyeng tirisong leano la yona la dintlharobongwe, mo go netefatseng gore go nna le tlhokomelo e e lekaneng ya dijenereitara tsa yona, mo go fokotseng madi a ditshenyegelo tsa yona le mo go netefatseng gore e nna le malatlha a a lekaneng a a emetsing motsing wa tlala.
zul: emva kokumiswa kohlelo lokucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga ngasekuqaleni kwalo nyaka, u-eskom usenze inqubekelaphambili enkulu impela ekuqalisweni kohlelo olunamaphuzu ayisishiyagalolunye, ekuqinisekiseni ukulungiswa nokugcinwa kweziphehla-mandla za-eskom zisebenza kahle, ekuncishisweni kwezindleko kanye nasekuqinisekiseni ukuthi kunamalahle agciniwe anele.

tsn: go latela ditshitshinyo tsa ditlhopha ka bobedi setlhophatiro sa tshomarelo ya eskom mmogo le setlhopha sa tshekatsheko ya botegeniki, eskom e tla romela badiredi ba yona ba ba diphatsa e bile ba na le maitemogelo a a seng kana ka sepe kwa dikarolong tseo ba tlhokegang thata kwa go tsona.
zul: ngokuhambisana nezincomo zethimba elengamele umsebenzi wokuqinisekisa ukusimama kuka-eskom kanjalo nethimba lokubuyekeza umsebenzi ka-eskom, u-eskom uzothumela labo basebenzi bakhe abanekhono kanye nolwazi lomsebenzi olunzulu namava ezindaweni lapho bedingeka khona kakhulu.

tsn: maemo a ditšhelete a setlamo seno e santse e le tlhobaboroko.
zul: isimo sezimali sale nkampani siyinto elokhu iqhubeke njalo nokudala ukukhathazeka okukhulu.

tsn: ka matlole a ga jaana a puso e ipofileng go a ntsha, jaaka go tlhalositswe mo puong ya tekanyetsokabo ya 2019, ga jaana eskom e santse e na le madinyana a e ka a dirisang go fitlha mo kgweding ya diphalane 2019. fa eskom e ka retelelwa ke go duela madi a e a adimileng seno se tla tshela peterole mo molelong ka se tla ama dikoloto tse dingwe tseo setheo seno se nang le tsona mme seno se tla tlhola mathata a magolo mo setheong seno se se tsweletseng go tsena ka tlhogo mo dikolotong ka ntlha ya fa madi a sona a se kalo.
zul: njengoba kukhona isamba semali ebekwe eceleni esivela kuhulumeni esamenyezelwa kwisabelomali sowezi-2019, u-eskom unemali eyanele ezokwenza akwazi ukuqhuba imisebenzi yakhe kanye nokukhokhela izikweletu kuze kube sekupheleni kukamfumfu 2019. uma u-eskom engahluleka ukukhokha imali ethile abolekwe yona lokho kungaholela ekutheni athathwe njengenkampani ehlulekile ukukhokhela zonke ezinye izikweletu zakhe futhi lokho kungaba nomthelela omkhulukazi emgodlagodleni wezimali zikahulumeni, kakade obhekene nesimo sokuntuleka nokushoda kwezimali.

tsn: ka jalo re tla tshwanelwa ke go samagana le ntlha eno ka go loga leano la go kwala molaotlhomo o o itlhophileng wa go thopa dithoto ka bonako gore re kgone go duela madi a tshegetso a le kanaka r230 bilione a eskom e tla a tlhokang mo dingwageng tse re di lebileng di le 10 tse di tlang.
zul: ngakho-ke, kumele sizame ukugwema le nkinga ngokuthi sethule ngokushesha umthethosivivinywa wesabelomali esikhethekile ukuze sinike u-eskom, eminyakeni yokuqala, ingxenye enkulu yalesi samba samabhiliyoni angama-230 amarandi oxhasomali azoludinga eminyakeni eyi-10 ezayo.

tsn: re tshwanetse go dira seno gonne eskom e botlhokwa thata mo ikonoming ya rona mo re ka e tlogelelang fela gore e phutlhame.
zul: lokhu sizokwenza ngoba phela u-eskom ubaluleke kakhulu emnothweni wezwe, ukuthi singavele simyeke nje afadalale, ahluleke nokwenza umsebenzi wakhe.

tsn: eskom e mo diatleng tsa rona rotlhe jaaka naga mme ke maikarabelo a rona rotlhe go netefatsa gore re e naya tshegetso e e e tlhokang.
zul: u-eskom ungumthwalo wethu sonke njengesizwe futhi kumele siqinisekise ukuthi siyameseka.

tsn: dintlha ka botlalo ka kgang eno di tla tla le tona ya matlole mo tsamaong ya nako.
zul: eminye imininingwane ephathelene nalokhu izohlinzekwa ngungqongqoshe wezezimali ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.

tsn: re tla boa gape re rebola leina la mokaedikhuduthamagamogolo (ceo) yo mošwa wa eskom go latela tsiboso ya ga rre phakamani hadebe ya go rola tiro.
zul: sizomemezela ukuqashwa komphathi omkhulu (i-ceo) omusha kulandela ukwesula emsebenzini kukamnu phakamani hadebe.

tsn: rre yono o gorogile kwa eskom dinta di fuduga mme ene le ditokololo tsa boto tse di neng di eteletswe kwa pele ke rre jabu mabuza ba dirile go tlala seatla go dira gore setlamo seno se se nwele.
zul: wathatha izintambo ngesikhathi esinzima kakhulu kwa-eskom futhi mkhulu umsebenzi awenzile ukuletha uzinzo kule nkampani, ebambisene nebhodi lakwa-eskom eliholwa ngumnu jabu mabuza.

tsn: re tla boa gape re tsibosa ka go thapiwa ga ga motlhankedikhuduthamaga wa phetolomaemo (cro), yo a tla fetolang maemo kwa matloleng a eskom a etse tlhoko lekala la matlole a lekgetho, lekala la matlole a dikoloto le lekala la matlole a madi a a tlhokagalang mo setlamong.
zul: khona maduze nje sizoqasha isikhulu esiyinhloko yokuhlelwa kabusha kwenkampani, okulindeleke ukuthi siguqule futhi siphucule isimo sezimali sakwa-eskom ngokuthi sicubungule ngokucophelela okukhulu uhlaka lwesimo sengeniso-mali, izikweletu kanye nezindleko zale nkampani.

tsn: eskom e dirisana gape le puso le bannaleseabe ba yona go samagana le leano la yona le legolo le le ka ga maemo a yona le a dikoloto tsotlhe tsa yona mmogo le dikoloto tseo dimasepala di di kolotang eskom mmogo le tseo batho ba ba dirisang motlakase ba di kolotang eskom.
zul: futhi u-eskom usebenzisana nohulumeni kanye nabanye ababambiqhaza ukuze kubhekisiswe indlela eyakheke ngayo le nkampani, kanye nezikweletu zonke zenkampani kanjalo nemali ekweletwa ngomasipala kanye nabo bonke abanye abasebenzisi bakagesi kule nkampani.

tsn: re le naga re tshwanetse go tlwaetsa batho gore fa ba dirisa motlakase ba tshwanetse go o duelela.
zul: njengezwe, kumele siwugcizelele umgomo wokuthi labo abasebenzisa ugesi kumele bawukhokhele.

tsn: fa ba sa duele seo se baya motlakase otlhe mo kotsing, go akaretsa le ikonomi le matsapa a rona a go tlhola ditiro.
zul: ukungawukhokheli ugesi kubeka engcupheni uhlelo lonkana lokuphakelwa kukagesi, futhi kubeka engcupheni nomnotho wezwe, kuphazamise nemizamo yethu yokwakha amathuba omsebenzi.

tsn: nako ya go rebola ditshupetso tsa go gana go duela motlakase e fedile.
zul: sezadlula izinsuku zokuduba kanye nokwenqaba ukukhokha.

tsn: jaanong ke nako ya go baakanya, ke nako ya gore yo mongwe le yo mongwe a nne le seabe.
zul: manje sekuyisikhathi sokuthi sakhe, sekuyisikhathi sokuthi sonke sifake isandla.

tsn: ka jalo, re ikuela mo baaging botlhe ba rona ba ba dirisang motlakase go o duelela gore eskom e kgone go dira tiro e e e romilweng.
zul: ngakho-ke, siyabanxusa bonke abantu bakithi abasebenzisa ugesi ukuthi bawukhokhele, ukuze u-eskom akwazi ukuqhuba umsebenzi wakhe wokuphakela izwe ngogesi.

tsn: maaforika borwa a gaetsho,gore re fitlhelele dipeelo tsa rona tsa kgolo, re tla aga sešwa motheo wa ikonomi ya rona ka go tsosolosa le go atolosa makala a tlhagisodikuno.
zul: bantu bakithi, ukuze sikwazi ukuhlangabezana nemigomo yokukhulisa umnotho esizibekele yona, sizokwakha kabusha izisekelo zomnotho wethu ngokuvuselela nokwelula imikhakha yethu ekhiqizayo.

tsn: seno se tlhoka gore re akanye sešwa leano la rona la diintaseteri, go rebola dipeeletso mo makaleng a poraefete mmogo le go tlhotlheletsa puso gore e tshegetse ikonomi e botlhe ba nang le seabe mo go yona.
zul: lokhu kudinga ukuthi siqhamuke nendlela ehlukile yokwakha kabusha iqhingasu lethu lezimboni, sigqugquzele ngamandla utshalomali oluvela emkhakheni ozimele futhi sifake umdlandla embusweni ukuze sikhuthaze ukubandakanywa komuntu wonke emnothweni.

tsn: seno se tlhoka gore puso e tshameke karolo ya yona e e botlhokwa ka go nna mobuladikgoro ka go tlamela ka ditirelo tsa motheo le mafaratlhatlha a a botlhokwa, go nna motlhamamelawanataolo ka go tlhama melawana e e laolang ditšhono ka go lekalekana mo bannaleseabeng botlhe, mmogo le go nna moabi yo a netefatsang gore bao ba leng mo tlalelong mo setšhabeng sa rona ba sireleditswe mmogo le go neelwa ditšhono tsa gore ba ntshe bokgoni jwa bona jotlhe.
zul: lokhu kudinga futhi ukuthi umbuso udlale indima yawo ngendlela efanele njengomvuli wamathuba nomphumelelisi wezinto ohlinzeka ngezidingongqangi kanye nengqalasizinda esemqoka, umlawuli oshaya imithetho eyakha futhi ivule amathuba ngokulinganayo kubo bonke ababambiqhaza, futhi njengomabi wezinto kabusha oqinisekisayo ukuthi bavikelekile futhi bayabhekelelwa labo ababuthakathaka futhi abasengcupheni ngoba bengakwazi ukuzinakekela kahle ngokwabo, abanikeze amathuba futhi abahlomise ukuze nabo bakwazi ukubonisa amakhono abo ngokuphelele futhi baphile impilo abayifunayo.

tsn: go na gape le karolo e nngwe e re batlang gore puso e e tshameke, yona ke ya go tlhama dikgwebo.
zul: kunenye futhi indima esifuna ukuthi idlalwe ngumbuso, okuyindima ephathelene nokuvulwa kwamabhizinisi.

tsn: karolo eo puso le yona e kgonang go iteka lesego mme e thuse ikonomi gore e kgone go gola.
zul: indima lapho umbuso ukwazi ukwenza izinto ezingaba wusizo olukhulu nakuba zinobungozi nobungcuphe obuthile, futhi ngalokho-ke alekelele umnotho ukuthi ukhule.

tsn: re tla lebelela thata makala a ikonomi a a nang le ditšhono tse dintsi tsa kgolo.
zul: sizogxila kakhudlwana futhi sibeke eqhulwini leyo mikhakha yomnotho ebonisa amathuba aphakeme okukhula.

tsn: ka ntlha ya katlego ya rona mo lekaleng la dijanaga, re tla tsenya tirisong maano a magolo a re a tlhagisitseng mmogo le makala a kgwebo le a badiri a a jaaka a diaparo le masela, a leokwane, dikhemikhale le dipolasetiki, a motlakase wa ntšhwafatso, mmogo le a tshipi le go betliwa ga yona.
zul: ngokusebenzela phezu kwempumelelo esiyizuzile emkhakheni wezimoto, sizoqalisa izinhlelo-ngqangi ezenziwe ngokubambisana nabamabhizinisi kanye nabasebenzi ezimbonini ezinjengemboni yomkhakha wezingubo zokugqoka, owendwangu, owegesi yemvelo, owamakhemikhali nemikhiqizo kacwazi, owemikhiqizo evuselelekayo, kanye nowokukhiqizwa kwensimbi nemikhiqizo esansimbi.

tsn: re tla atolosa thata lekala la temothuo le tlhagiso ya dijo ka go tshegetsa dithulaganyo tse di botlhokwa tsa tlhagiso mmogo le ditlhagisiwa tse di botlhokwa, ra tshegetsa dimaraka tse dintšhwa mmogo le go fokotsa palo ya ditlhagisiwa tsa temothuo tse re di rekang go tswa kwa dinageng tsa kwa ntle.
zul: sizowukhulisa futhi siwunwebe kakhulu umkhakha wezolimo nokulungiswa kwemikhiqizo yezolimo ngokuthi sisekele uchungechunge lokukhiqizwa kanye nokulungiswa kwemikhiqizo yezolimo, sibheke amazwe nezindawo ezintsha esizothengisa kuzona imikhiqizo yethu futhi sinciphise ukuthembela kwethu emikhiqizweni yezolimo evela emazweni angaphandle.

tsn: re tla gagamatsa intaseteri ya meepo ka go thuthusa mebaraka e e tla rekang dimenerale tsa aforika borwa ka go dirisa letsholo la go tota mebaraka e e rileng e e tla unngwelwang, ra fokotsa ditlhwatlha, mmogo le go oketsa dipatlisiso le thuthuso ya tsona.
zul: sizoyiqinisa futhi siyeseke imboni yezimayini ngokuthi sibheke amazwe nezindawo okuzothengiswa kuzona izimbiwa zaseningizimu afrika, ngokuthi silungise imikhiqizo yezimbiwa ethile, okuzokwenza ukuthi ikhuphuke ikhwalithi ngokunjalo nenanintengo laleyo mikhiqizo, sinciphise izindleko zokukhiqiza izimbiwa futhi sikhuphule nocwaningo kanye nokuthuthukiswa.

tsn: ka go rulaganya mafelo a tirelo go tshwana le mafelo a a itlhophileng a ikonomi, go tsosolosa mafelo a difeme tsa ka fa nageng, mafelo a dikgwebo, mafelo a didirisiwa tsa dijithale mmogo le dikgwebo tse dikgolo kwa makeišeneng le kwa metseselegaeng, re tla dira gore ikonomi ya mafelo ao e tlhabologe.
zul: ngokusebenzisa izinhlelo zokuhlinzeka ngendawo yokuqhuba ibhizinisi, njengezizinda zomnotho ezikhethekile, ukuvuselelwa kwamapaki ezimboni endawo, izizinda zebhizinisi, izizinda zobuxhakaxhaka nobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje kanye namabhizinisi asemalokishini kanye nawasezindaweni ezisemakhaya, sizoletha intuthuko yezomnotho eduze kwezindawo okuhlala kuzona abantu.

tsn: re tla tsepamisa mogopolo gape le mo dikgwebopotlaneng le mo dikgwebong tse di mo magareng tse di leng mo diteropong tsa rona tse dikgolo, le mo makeišeneng le kwa metseselegaeng mmogo le go thuthusa mafelo a dimaraka mo di tla gwebisanang gone.
zul: sizogxila emabhizinisini asafufusa emadolobheni ethu, emalokishini kanye nasezindaweni ezisemakhaya futhi sakhe nezindawo zemakethe yokuhweba lapho osomabhizinisi bezothengisa khona imikhiqizo yabo.

tsn: re tla diragatsa maikemisetso a rona a go oketsa palo ya bajanala ba boditšhabatšhaba ba ba tlang ka fa nageng gore e menagane gabedi go ka nna dimilione di le 21 ka ngwaga wa 2030. seno se tla kgonagala ka go aga sešwa serodumo sa naga, go tsenya tirisong visa ya maemo a a kwa godimo mo lefatsheng mmogo le go tsepamisa mogopolo mo bajanaleng ba ba tswang kwa nageng ya china le ya india mmogo le bao ba tlang ka difofane ka fa nageng ba tswa kwa dinageng tse di farologaneng tsa kontinente ya rona.
zul: sizoyifezekisa inhloso nesifiso sethu sokukhulisa ngokuphindwe kabili inani lezivakashi zakwamanye amazwe ezivakashela kuleli, liyifinyelele ezigidini ezingama-21 ngaphambi kowezi-2030.

tsn: re tla tlhabolola intaseteri ya rona ya thekenoloji ya maemo a a kwa godimo ka go netefatsa gore letlhomeso la rona la melao le melawanataolo le tlotlomatsa boitshimololedi, ka go atolosa tlhagiso ya bokgoni mo mererong ya thekenoloji e ntšhwa mo bašweng, mmogo le go fokotsa ditlhwatlhwa tsa datha.
zul: lokhu sizokwenza ngokuthi sivuselele isasasa lokuvakashela kuleli lizwe futhi senze leli lizwe libe yizwe elihehayo, sethule inqubo yokukhishwa kwezimvume zokungena nokuvakashela kuleli (ama-visa) ezisezingeni lomhlaba, futhi sigxile ikakhulukazi ekuheheni abavakashi abavela kwelase-china kanye nase-india, ngokunjalo nezivakashi ezifika kuleli ngendiza, ezivela emazweni aleli zwekazi lethu, i-afrika.

tsn: gotlhe mo re fetileng gone, bašwa ba ntse ba eme ka lefeko le le nosi mo aforika borwa gore madi a ba a duelelang go reka datha a boitshega.
zul: sizibophezele ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi izivakashi ezivakashela ezweni lethu ziphephile.

tsn: go tla ka tharabololo ya ntlha eno, pele kgwedi e e tlang e konosela, tona ya ditlhaeletsano o tla rebolela bothati jwa ditlhaeletsano jo bo ikemetseng jwa aforika borwa (icasa) taelo ya pholisi e e tshwanetsweng go latelwa gore go simololwe ka thulaganyo ya go rebola dilaesense tsa makhubu a a tlhokegang thata a kgaso.
zul: sizoyikhulisa imboni yezobuchwepheshe nobuxhakaxhaka besimanjemanje ngokuthi siqinisekise ukuthi imithetho kanye nemithethonqubo elawulayo igqugquzela ukuqanjwa kwezinto ezintsha, sithuthukise amakhono abantu abasha kwezobuchwepheshe obusha, futhi sinciphise nezindleko ze-data.

tsn: thulaganyo eno e tla akaretsa le dikgato tse di tla tlhotlheletsang dikgaisano, phetolothefosano, kgolo e e akaretsang botlhe mo lekaleng mmogo le phitlhelesego ya mang le mang.
zul: nomaphi lapho besihamba khona, abantu abasha bebelokhu bekhalaza ngenkinga yezindleko ze-data eziphakeme kakhulu eningizimu afrika.

tsn: eno ke karolo e e botlhokwa thata mo go fokotseng ditlhwatlhwa tsa datha, eo e leng botlhokwa mo go tlhabololeng ikonomi le mo go buleleng bašwa ditšhono.
zul: ukuze sifake umfutho kule nqubo, kule nyanga ezayo, ungqongqoshe wezokuxhumana uzokhipha umyalelo oqondiswe ophikweni oluzimele lwezokuxhumana lwaseningizimu afrika (i-icasa) ukuthi luqalise inqubo yokuhlinzekwa kwamalayisensi omthamo wamagagasi okusakaza nokuthunyelwa kolwazi ngomoya.

tsn: re ikuela gape le mo intasetering ya mafaratlhatlha a ditlhaeletsano gore le tsone di fokotse ditlhwatlhwa tsa datha gore di lekalekane le tsa dinaga tse dingwe mo lefatsheng.
zul: le nqubo izobandakanya izinyathelo zokukhuthaza ukuncintisana, uguquko, ukukhuliswa kwalo mkhakha ngendlela ebandakanya umuntu wonke kanye nokuqinisekisa ukufinyelela kwabantu bonke.

tsn: re gagamatsa letsholo la rona la dipeeletso.
zul: siyawuqinisa impela umkhankaso wethu wokuheha utshalomali.

tsn: mo go r300 bilione e e beeleditsweng e e tlhagisitsweng kwa tlhongosetilong ya khonferenseng ya dipeeletso ngogola, ke diporojeke di ka ja r250 bilione tse di setseng di rebotswe go ka diragadiwa.
zul: kutshalomali olungamabhiliyoni angama-300 amarandi olwamenyezelwa kwingqungquthela yotshalomali yokuqala ngqa eyabanjwa ngonyaka odlule, kunemiklamo esiqalisiwe yenani elingaphezulu nje kancane kwamabhiliyoni angama-250 amarandi.

tsn: re tsweletse go aga moedi wa dipeeletso, o o tla tlhagisiwang kwa khonferenseng ya bobedi ya dipeeletso tsa aforika borwa e e tla tshwarwang go simolola ka la bo 5 go fitlha ka la bo 7 ngwanaitseele 2019. mo naakong e go renang ketsaetsego, tiro e e rebotsweng ke barongwa ba le bane ba ba tsomanang le dipeeletso e dirile tiro e ntle e e golaganyang puso le dikgwebo.
zul: siyaqhubeka nokwakha umgudu wotshalomali olungenayo kuleli, futhi lokhu kuzoboniswa kwingqungquthela yesibili yotshalomali yaseningizimu afrika ezobanjwa kusukela mhla ziyisi-5 kuze kube ngumhla ziyisi-7 kulwezi.

tsn: go ya ka se ba re begetseng sona, go tlhamaletse gore go santse go le gontsi go re tshwanetseng go go dira go tokafatsa maemo a dipeeletso.
zul: esikhathini lapho sibhekene nongabazane, umsebenzi wamanxusa otshalomali sewuvule amaxhama okuxhumana nokusebenzisana asemqoka kakhulu phakathi kukahulumeni namabhizinisi.

tsn: seno se akaretsa go leba sešwa tsela eo puso e rarabololang ka yona dikgwetlho tseo ba beeletsi ba tobanang le tsona mmogo le go kwalola sešwa pholisi e e tsholetsang dipeeletso le go agiwa ga tsona.
zul: uma sibheka imbuyisambiko esiyithole kubona, kuyacaca ukuthi kusekuningi okusamele kwenziwe ngenhloso yokwenza ngcono isimo okusetshenzelwa ngaphansi kwaso esiphathelene nokutshalwa kwezimali.

tsn: mo dipuisanong le maphata a kgwebo, puso e solofeditse gore e tla fedisa dikgoreletsi tse di tlisiwang ke dipholisi mmogo le go potlakisa go tsenngwa tirisong ga diporojeke tseno.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya ukubuyekezwa kwendlela olawula ngayo umsebenzi wokuxazulula izinselelo abahlangabezana nazo abatshalizimali kanye nokuphucula nokuhlela kabusha inqubomgomo yokukhuthaza utshalomali kanye nohlaka lwesakhiwo sayo.

tsn: re semeletse ka dikgato tse di potlakileng tsa ntšhwafatso go nolofatsa dikgato tsa go dira kgwebo ka go golaganya le go lolamisa dithulaganyo tsa melawanataolo, go dira gore diphomete le dikopo tse dingwe di rebolwe ka bonako, mmogo le go fokotsa ditlhwatlhwa tse di duelelwang.
zul: mkhulu umsebenzi esesiwenzile ngaphansi kohlelo lokukhulisa umnotho ngobambiswano phakathi kukahulumeni nomkhakha ozimele oluholwa ngungqongqoshe unkosazana dlamini-zuma, umnu roelf meyer kanye nodkt johan van zyl slabbert.

tsn: mafaratlhatlha ke karolo e e botlhokwa e go beelediwang mo go yona e e tshegetsang phetolo ya meago, kgolo ya ikonomi mmogo le go tlhola ditiro.
zul: umkhakha ozimele usuthembise ukutshala imali engamabhiliyoni angama-840 amarandi emiklamweni engama-43 ngaphansi kwemikhakha eyi-19, futhi lokho kuzodala amathuba omsebenzi ayizi-155 000 kule minyaka emihlanu ezayo.

tsn: a botlhokwa mo go tlhabololeng ikonomi ya rona, mmogo le mo go neeleng matsholo a rona bokao le mosolo.
zul: ezingxoxweni ebezibanjwe nabamabhizinisi, uhulumeni usezwakalise ukuzibophezela ekususeni izithiyo nemigoqo ephathelene nezinqubomgomo nemithetho eyinkimbinkimbi futhi asheshise ukuqaliswa kwale miklamo.

tsn: tsela ya rona e ntšhwa tebang le tlhabololo ya mafaratlhatlha e ikaegile ka tirisanommogo e e tsetsepetseng magareng ga makala a puso le a poraefete mmogo le mo baaging.
zul: senza imizamo esheshayo yokuletha izinguquko ezisemqoka okuhloswe ngazo ukwenza kube lula ukwenza ibhizinisi kuleli, ngokuthi sihlanganise futhi sihlele kabusha imithethonqubo elawulayo, senze kube kula kakhulu ukuthola izimvume nokufaka izicelo ngobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje, futhi kuncishiswe nezindleko zokuthotshelwa kwenzinqubo ezibekiwe.

tsn: e tsenyeletsa mokotla o o itlhophileng wa ditirelo tsa matlole le dithebolelo tsa ditheo go ka thusa mo dikagong le go potlakisa tlamelo ya mafaratlhatlha a metsi, ditsela le bonno jwa baithuti ka go dirisa ka tshwanelo madi a a beetsweng ditirelo tseno.
zul: ingqalasizinda ingumkhakha osemqoka kakhulu okumele kutshalwe kuwona izimali, osekela ukulethwa koguquko ezikhungweni, ukukhula komnotho kanye nokuvulwa kwamathuba omsebenzi.

tsn: jaaka go rebotswe mo go sona e e fetileng, puso e beetse kwa thoko r100 bilione go ka tlamela letloletlamelo la mafaratlhatlha.
zul: ingqalasiizinda ibaluleke kakhulu futhi ekuvuselelweni komnotho wezwe, kanye nokuletha nokuqalisa isikhathi esisha sokuvuselela nokuthuthukisa izwe lethu.

tsn: re semeletse ka tiro ya go rulaganya gore letloletlamelo leno e nne setheo se se feletseng, se se tla laolwang ke bankatlhabololo ya dinaga tsa borwa jwa aforika, mme lefapha la ditiro tsa puso le mafaratlhatlha a setšhaba le le sa tswang go tlhabololwa le tla tshameka karolo ya go nna mookamedi mo go lona.
zul: indlela entsha esizoyilandela ekuthuthukisweni kwengqalasizinda isekelwe phezu kobambiswano oluqinile phakathi kukahulumeni nomkhakha ozimele, kanye nemiphakathi yendawo.

tsn: tiro eno e re semeletseng mo go yona re e tshwarisanemmogo le babeeletsi ba makala a poraefete, ba ba jaaka ba ba tsamaisang madi a go rola tiro, ba ba itumetseng thata gore ba nne le karolo e ba e tshamekang mo setheong seno sa letloletlamelo la mafaratlhatlha.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya inhlanganisela ekhethekile yezinyathelo eziphathelene nezimali kanye nalezo eziphathelene nokuphatha nokulawula okuhloswe ngazo ukukhuthaza umsebenzi wokwakha kanye nokubeka eqhulwini ukwakhiwa kwengqalasizinda yamanzi, imigwaqo kanye nezindlu zokuhlalisa abafundi, ngokuthi kusetshenziswe ngobunyoninco leyo mali eyabelwe le miklamo.

tsn: diphetogo tseno di tla dira gore re kgone go loga maano a diporojeke tsa mafaratlhatlha botoka, go nna le bokgoni jwa go diragatsa le go garela tiro bobebe le go ipaakanyetsa tiro ka manontlhotlho, re tla kgona go tokafatsa taolo ya go loga maano, ra diragatsa tiro ka bojotlhe le go nna le thulaganyo ya tsamaiso ya puso e e tokafetseng.
zul: njengoba kwamenyezelwa kwi-sona edlule, uhulumeni ubeke eceleni isamba esingamabhiliyoni ayi-100 amarandi ngenhloso yokuxhasa nokugqugquzela isikhwama sengqalasizinda.

tsn: re tla godisa theko ya ditlhagisiwa tsa mo nageng le go godisa batlhagisadikuno mo nageng ya aforika borwa ka go netefatsa gore letsholo la ‘reka ditlhagisiwa tsa ka fa nageng’ le gasagana le naga e bile ga le swe lentswe.
zul: senza imizamo yokuthi lesi sikhwama sibe yisikhungo, esizolawulwa yibhange lentuthuko laseningizimu afrika (i-dbsa), futhi umnyango wezemisebenzi yomphakathi kanye nengqalasizinda ohlelwe kabusha yiwona ozoqapha umsebenzi owenziwa yilesi sikhungo.

tsn: re ikuela mo go maaforika borwa otlhe gore ka gale ba reke ditlhagisiwa tse di tswang ka fa nageng.
zul: lokhu sikwenza ngokubonisana kanye nokubambisana nabatshalizimali abazimele, abafana nezikhungo ezilawula izikhwama zempesheni, ezingabatshalizimali abanentshisekelo ekubambeni iqhaza esikhwameni sengqalasizinda.

tsn: fa le mpona jaana, sutu, hempe le thae tseno tse ke di apereng gompieno di dirilwe gone mo gae mo aforika borwa ke badiri ba masela ba house of monatic, gone fano mo salt river mo motsekapa.
zul: lezi zinguquko zizoqinisekisa ukuhlelwa kangcono kwemiklamo yengqalasizinda, umsebenzi onohlonze wokuhlola ukuthi ingqalasizinda izokwenzeka ngempumelelo yini nokwenza amalungiselelo afanelekile, ukuphucula ukuphatha okukhethekile, ukuqaliswa ngobunyoninco kwemisebenzi yengqalasizinda kanye nokuphatha okuhle.

tsn: bagaetsho tla re rekeng dilo tse di dirilweng fa gae gore re kgone go oketsa palo ya bareki mo ikonoming ya rona.
zul: lokhu kuhlinzekwa ngokwesekwa okudingeka kakhulu emkhakheni wezokwakha osekuphele isikhathi eside impela ufadalele.

tsn: pele ngwaga ono o konosela, re batla go garela ditumelano le mabentlele a barekisi gore re reke ditlhagisiwa tse dintsi tsa aforika borwa tse ba di rekisang mmogo le go tlotlomatsa bontsi jwa ditlhagisiwa tseo tse di dirilweng ke maaforika borwa.
zul: sizogqugquzela futhi sikhuthaze abantu ukuthi bathenge imikhiqizo nezimpahla ezikhiqizwe kuleli futhi sikhulise umkhakha wezokukhiqiza waseningizimu afrika ngokuthi siqinisekise ukuthi umkhankaso ‘wokuthengwa kwezimpahla ezikhiqizwe kuleli’ (i-‘buy local’) ungundabuzekwayo futhi ubonakala yonke indawo.

tsn: re ikemiseditse go adima madi ka kelotlhoko le go nna le tsamaiso e e galefileng ya tirisomatlole gore re kgone go dira gore maemo a matlole a puso a ritibale le go fokotsa motseletsele wa dikoloto o re nang le ona.
zul: sonke masithenge izimpahla ezakhiwe kuleli ukuze sikhulise isibalo sabantu abathenga impahla ekhiqizwe kuleli.

tsn: bankakgolo ya aforika borwa ke se sengwe sa ditheo tse di botlhokwa tse re nang le tsona mo temokerasing ya rona, mme seriti sa yona se beilwe mo maemong a a kwa godimo mo nageng le kwa dinageng tsa boditšhabatšhaba.
zul: kulo nyaka esiwuphethe, sifuna ukwenza izivumelwano nezitolo ezithengisa impahla ukuthi ziqinisekise ukuthi zithenga izimpahla ezikhiqizwe eningizimu afrika futhi ziyikhangise ngenkuthalo imikhiqizo emihle kakhulu eyakhiwe ngabasebenzi baseningizimu afrika.

tsn: ditlhwatlhwa tse di tsweletseng go namelela tsa ditlhagisiwa le tsa ditirelo di dira gore maaforika borwa otlhe a retelelwe ke go reka, bogolosegolo ao a humanegileng.
zul: lezi zinyathelo zisekelwe phezu kwesibophezelo sethu esiqinile kwinqubomgomo yomnotho-jikelele kanye neyezezimali ezoqhubeka nokukhuthaza ukwethenjwa kwaleli lizwe futhi kukhuthaze nokutshalwa kwezimali.

tsn: kwelotlase ya maemo a ikonomi le yona e tswelela go fokotsa ditlhagisiwa tsa rona tse di rekisediwang dinaga tsa kwa ntle mmogo le difeme tsa rona tseo di rekang ditlhagisiwa tsa kwa ntle, mme seno se baya diintaseteri tseno mmogo le ditiro tsa batho mo kotsing ya go tswalwa kgotsa go kgaolwa.
zul: sizibophezele ekubolekeni izimali ngobuhlakani obukhulu ukuze singaboleki imali engaphezu kwamandla ethu okukhokha leyo mali esiyibolekile futhi sizibophezele ekusebenziseni imali ngokucophelela okukhulu ukuze siqinisekise uzinzo ezimalini zikahulumeni futhi sinciphise nesikweletu sezwe.
