tsn: ke ka ntlha ya lebaka leno molaotheo wa rona o rwesang bankakgolo ya aforika borwa maikarabelo a go femela boleng jwa ledi la naga ya rona go kgontsha tekatekano le kgolo e e nnelang ruri.
zul: ibhange lombuso laseningizimu afrika lisiyikhungo esisemqoka kakhulu ezweni lethu elibuswa ngentando yeningi labantu, esithenjwayo futhi esihlonishwa kakhulu kuleli nasemhlabeni wonke jikelele.

tsn: gompieno re gatelela maikarabelo ano a molaotheo, ao a rweleng ke bankakgolo e le nosi, gore e a diragatse ntle le poifo epe, ntle le go tsaya letlhakore lepe kgotsa go ka dira kgetololo epe.
zul: uzinzo lwamananintengo luyadingeka impela, kepha-ke alwanele ekuqinisekiseni ukukhula komnotho.

tsn: molaotheo wa rona gape o re go tshwanetse ga nna le dipuisano tsa ka gale magareng ga bankakgolo le tona ya matlole go totobatsa thulaganyo ya ikonomikgolo, mme tsotlhe tseo di diriwe go lebilwe go tlholela batho ditiro le go godisa ikonomi.
zul: amananintengo ezimpahla nezinsizakalo adlondlobalayo anciphisa amandla okuthenga abo bonke abantu baseningzimu afrika, ikakhulukazi labo abadla imbuya ngothi.

tsn: fa e le gore re batla go gaisana le dinaga tse dingwe mo maemong a boditšhabatšhaba, fa e le gore re batla go ngokela dipeeletso, re tla tshwanela ke go mekamekana le kgang ya go rarabolola ntlha ya dituelelo tse di boitshegang tse di duelelwang fa motho a batla go simolola kgwebo mo nageng ya aforika borwa, mmogo le go rarabolola dithulaganyo tsa melawanataolo tse di kopanyang tlhogo e bile di tsaya le nako e telele thata.
zul: ukwehla kwamandla emali kunciphisa amandla okuncintisana ezimpahla zakuleli ezithunyelwa emazweni angaphandle kanye namafemu akuleli akhiqiza izimpahla ezincintisana nezimpahla ezingena kuleli ezakhiwe kwamanye amazwe, futhi lokhu kubeka engcupheni izimboni zakuleli kanye nemisebenzi.

tsn: re tshwanetse re fitlhe moo re sa tlholeng re tlhoka gore setlamo se eme dikgwedi di le thataro gore se rebolelwe phomete kgotsa laesense mme ditlamo tse dintšhwa di tseye fela letsatsi gore di kwadisiwe.
zul: ngenxa yalesi sizathu-ke, umthethosisekelo wethu ugunyaza ibhange lombuso laseningizimu afrika ukuthi livikele isilinganisontengo semali yakuleli ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukukhula komnotho okulingene futhi okusimeme.

tsn: re tshwanetse go tswelela go fokotsa ditlhwatlhwa tsa go simolola kgwebo mo nageng ka go fokotsa metšhelo e e duelelwang kwa melelwaneng ya go tsena ka dithoto tsa kgwebo mo nageng, go dira gore dituelo tsa go tlhagisa motlakase di nne kwa tlase, mmogo le go dira gore diterene di nne mo maemong a go ka gaisana le tse dingwe le go tsamaisiwa sentle.
zul: namuhla, sithanda ukuligcizelela leli gunya elihlinzekwe ngokomthethosisekelo, okumele lifezekiswe yibhange lombuso ngokuzimela, ngaphandle kokuchema noma ukucwasa.

tsn: jaaka re kaela ke ndp, ke maikarabelo a rona go nna le tlhabololo e e sa feleng e e akaretsang botlhe e e sa feteng le phetogo ya maemo a loapi.
zul: umthethosisekelo wethu uyalela futhi ukuthi kube nokubonisana okuqhubekayo phakathi kwebhangengodla kanye nongqongqoshe wezezimali ukuze kugqugquzelwe ukusebenza ngendlela ehambelanayo emnothweni wezwe wonkana, ngenhloso yokuqinisekisa ukwakhiwa kwamathuba omsebenzi kanye nokukhulisa umnotho.

tsn: ka go dirisanammogo le makala a poraefete, mekgatlho ya badiri mmogo le mekgatlho ya boditšhabatšhaba re tla tokafatsa maitlhomo a rona a go tsamaya le dinako mmogo le matsapa a rona a go rarabolola dikgwetlho.
zul: uma sifuna ukuncintisana ngempumelelo namazwe omhlaba, futhi uma sifuna ukuheha utshalomali, kumele sithathe izinyathelo zokunciphisa izindleko eziphakeme kakhulu zokwenza ibhizinisi eningizimu afrika, futhi sixegise imithethonqubo nemidanti eyinkimbinkimbi futhi ewundendende okumele ilandelwe.

tsn: re na le tšhono ya go goga kwa pele ikonomi ya tshomarelo tlhago, e e ka ga go dira diintaseteri tse di sa dirising mesi le dikhemikhale tse dintsi tse di bolayang tlhago, tšhono ya go goga thekenoloji e ntšhwa kwa pele mmogo le go tlisa diphetogo mo ikonoming ya mo nakong e e tlang.
zul: sizoqhubeka nokunciphisa izindleko zokwenza ibhizinisi ngokuthi sinciphise intela yezimpahla ezithunyelwa emazweni angaphandle, sizame ukuthola nokusebenzisa izindlela zokuphehla ugesi ezishimbile, futhi senze umkhakha wokuthutha impahla ngezitimela ube sesimweni sokuncintisana neminye imikhakha yokuthuthwa kwempahla futhi usebenze ngobunyoninco.

tsn: re tshwanetse gore re oketse seabe seo motlakase wa ntšhwafatso o nang le sona mo metswakong ya metlakase e re nang le yona mo nageng mmogo le go lekelela ditšhono tseo ikonomi ya didirisiwa tsa haeterojene di tlang le yona.
zul: ngokuholwa yi-ndp, kungumthwalo nomsebenzi wethu ukuqinisekisa intuthuko ebandakanya umuntu wonke futhi esimeme, ezokwazi ukumelana nokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu.

tsn: kgolo e e potlakileng ya ikonomi le yona e tlhoka pusetso ya dinaga e e potlakileng kwa metseseteropong le kwa metseselegae mmogo le melao e e tlhamaletseng ka ga ditshwanelo tsa dithoto tsa dinaga.
zul: ngokubambisana nomkhakha ozimele, abasebenzi kanye namazwe omhlaba sizoqinisa futhi sikhuphule imizamo yethu yokumelana nokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu futhi sinciphise nomthelela omubi walokhu.

tsn: re setse re amogetse pegelo e e tlhagisitsweng ke phanele ya baeletsi ba moporesitente ka ga pusetso ya dinaga le temothuo, eo e neng e eteletswe kwa pele ke motlatsamoporesitente, e jaanong e tla isiwang kwa kabineteng gore e atlhaatlhiwe.
zul: sinethuba lokuqinisekisa ukuthi sihamba phambili emizamweni yokukhulisa umnotho ngendlela ebhekelela futhi inakekele imvelo, sibe nezimboni ezisebenzisa izindlela-kusebenza ezikhiqiza ikhabhoni encane kakhulu futhi ezingawuncolisi umkhathi nemvelo, sihambe phambili ekusetshenzisweni kobuchwepheshe obusha futhi sithathe amagxathu amakhulukazi aphokophele emnothweni wangomuso.

tsn: ditshtshinyo tsa phanele di tla garela tshwetso ya go konosetsa lenaane le le mosola, la dintlha tse dintsi la phetolothefosano le pusetso ya dinaga.
zul: kumele siwukhulise umthamo wamandla kagesi ovuselelekayo futhi ongayingcolisi imvelo, kwizinhlobo zemithombo kagesi ehlukahlukene esetshenziswa kule lizwe, futhi sizame ukucubungula nokubhekisisa ukuthi ngeke yini kube wusizo ukuthi siguqukele emnothweni ogxile kakhulu ekusetshenzisweni kwegesi ihayidrojini.

tsn: mo ntlheng ya ga jaana, puso e tla potlakisa matsapa a yona a go nopola le go rebolela batho dinaga tse di leng mo diatleng tsa puso tse di tla nnang matshwanedi gore batho ba ka nna mo go tsona mo metseseteropong le tseo di ka dirisediwang temothuo.
zul: ukukhula komnotho okusheshayo kudinga futhi ukuthi kusheshiswe izinguquko kwezomhlaba ezindaweni ezisemakhaya kanye nezosemadolobheni futhi kube khona inqubo-kusebenza ecacile ephathelene nokuphathwa kwamalungelo omhlaba.

tsn: mo sephuthelwaneng sa tsosoloso se se rebotsweng mo ngwageng yo o fetileng, re ne ra solofetsa gore re tla potlakisa tlamelo ya balemirui ba ba santseng ba supologa ka matlole.
zul: sesiwutholile umbiko wethimba elikhethekile lokweluleka umongameli mayelana nezinguquko kwezomhlaba nezolimo, elabe liholwa yiphini likamongameli, manje osuzokwethulwa phambi kwekhabhinethi ukuze ucutshungulwe.

tsn: mo pakeng ya tekanyetsokabo ya kgweditharo e e fetileng, r3.9 bilione e reboletswe banka ya lefatshe gore ka yona e tshegetse balemirui ba bagwebi ba bathobatsho.
zul: izincomo zaleli thimba elikhethekile yizona ezizosetshenziswa ukuhlanganisa nokuphothula uhlelo lwezinguquko kwezomhlaba olubanzi futhi oluzoletha uguquko olunohlonze.

tsn: ntlha ya botlhokwa mo leanong la kgolo ya ikonomi ya aforika borwa ke ntlha ya go golaganya ikonomi ya rona le ya dinaga tse dingwe tsa baagisane le tse tsotlhe tse di leng teng mo kontinenteng.
zul: kulesi sikhashana esifushane esizayo, uhulumeni uzosheshisa imizamo yokuhlonza kanye nokwaba umhlaba kahulumeni okulungele ukuhlaliswa kwabantu ezindaweni ezisemadolobheni, onazo izinsiza nezidingongqangi zesimanjemanje, futhi uhulumeni uzokwaba nomhlaba ozosetshenziselwa ukulima.

tsn: letsholo la mafelo a kgwebisano a a sa duediseweng lekgetho mo kontinenteng ya aforika le tla tokafatsa tsamaiso ya ditlhagisiwa le ditirelo tse di rekisiwang, mmogo le matlole le dikgato tsa tlhagiso ya dikuno mo kontinenteng.
zul: kwiphakheji yokukhuthaza nokuvuselela umnotho eyamenyezelwa ngonyaka odlule, sathembisa ukuthi sizokubeka eqhulwini ukuxhaswa ngezimali kwabalimi abasafufusa.

tsn: leano la rona le le ntšhwafaditsweng la diintaseteri le tsepamisa mogopolo mo go atoloseng dikgolagano tsa rona tsa kgwebisano le dipeeletso mo dinageng tsotlhe tse di leng teng mo kgaolong ya borwa jwa aforika mmogo le mo kontinenteng yotlhe.
zul: ingxenye esemqoka kakhulu yeqhingasu lokukhulisa umnotho leningizimu afrika wukudidiyelwa komnotho wakuleli neminotho yamazwe angomakhelwane kanye neminotho yamazwe aleli zwekazi lonkana.

tsn: mo dinageng tsa mokgatlho wa tlhabololo ya borwa jwa aforika (sadc), re tla baya kwa setlhoeng matsholo a go baakanya ntlha ya go tshela melelwane mo makaleng a a rileng a a botlhokwa a a jaaka la motlakase, meepo le dimenerale, tlhagiso ya dikuno, mafaratlhatlha mmogo le a tlhagiso ya dijomaaforika borwa a gaetsho,kgolo ya ikonomi ya rona ga e kitla e nna le mosola ntle le fa e le gore e tla kgona go tlhola ditiro tse dintsi.
zul: isizinda sokuhwebelana mahhala kwamazwe ezwekazi lase-afrika, (i-afcfta), sizothuthukisa futhi senze ngcono ukuhamba nokuthunyelwa kwezimpahla kanye nezinsizakalo, ingqala-bhizinisi kanye nezinsiza-kusebenza zokukhiqiza impahla kwizwekazi lonkana.

tsn: ka ntlha ya gore palo ya bašwa ba ba senang ditiro ba maaforika borwa e feta 50% ke sesupo sa gore naga e mo mathateng mme go tshwanetswe go logiwe maano a a ka rarabololang matsapa ano ka bonako gore botlhe ba nne le seabe mo go direng mmogo.
zul: iqhingasu leningizimu afrika elivuseleliwe futhi lafakwa nomfutho ligxile ekukhuliseni ubudlelwano bokuhwebelana nokutshalwa kwezimali phakathi kwelizwe lethu nesifunda sonkana samazwe aseningizimu ye-afrika kanye nezwekazi lonkana.

tsn: mme e bile gape ka ntlha ya gore re bona bašwa ba bantsi ba tsena mo ditirong ngwaga le ngwaga, ikonomi ya rona e tlhoka go tlholela bašwa ba rona ditiro tse dingwe gape tse dintsi go feta tse ga jaana e di tlholang.
zul: ngaphakathi kwenhlangano yokuthuthukiswa kwamazwe aseningizimu ye-afrika (i-sadc), sizobeka eqhulwini uchungechunge lokulungiswa kwemikhiqizo kanye nokuthunyelwa nokuhanjiswa kwayo phakathi kwamazwe angaphansi kwale nhlangano, okuyimikhiqizo yemikhakha enjengowezamandla, owezimayini nokuthuthukiswa kwekhwalithi yemikhiqizo yezimbiwa, owezokukhiqizwa kwempahla, owezengqalasizinda kanye nowokulungiswa kwemikhiqizo yezolimo.

tsn: ka jalo go botlhokwa gore re tseye dikgato ntle le go senya nako gore re diragatse leano le le feletseng – le le tla kgannwang le go tsamaisewa ke kantoro ya moporesitente – gore re tlhole ditiro tse dingwe gape tse di sa feteng dimilione di le pedi tse dintšhwa tsa bašwa mo ngwagasomeng yo re o lebileng.
zul: njengoba izinga lokuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi entsheni lingaphezu kwama-50% kusho ukuthi izwe libhekene nengwadla enkulukazi edinga ukuthi kutholakale izixazululo eziphuthumayo, ezihambisana nokusetshenziswa kwamaqhingasu amasha futhi ezihambelanayo, lapho wonke umuntu kumele akubone njengento edingekayo futhi esemqoka kakhulu ukuthi kusetshenzwe ngokubambisana.

tsn: re setse re simolotse ka go semelela mo makaleng a poraefete go tlholela bašwa meedi ya ditiro ka go oketsa meedi e e leng teng ga jaana ka go golagana le badirisanimmogo ba rona.
zul: futhi njengoba abantu abasha bengena ngobuningi minyaka yonke esigabeni sabantu abathungatha amathuba omsebenzi, umnotho wezwe kumele wakhe amathuba omsebenzi aqondiswe entsheni angaphezulu kakhulu kwamathuba avulekayo njengamanje.

tsn: bano ke badirisani ba rona ba ba thusang bašwa gore ba tswelele ka magetla, badirisani ba ba tshegetsang le go golaganya bašwa le ditšhono go ba itsise ka ditšhono tsa diphatlhatiro le tsa go ithapa mo dikgwebong tsa bona.
zul: ngenhloso nje yokuqinisekisa ukuthi alidlondlobali ngokweqile izinga lokuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi entsheni.

tsn: ba netefatsa gore bašwa ba ba tswang kwa malapeng a a humanegileng – bogolosegolo makgarebe – ba tshegediwa gore ba fitlhelele ditšhono tse dintšhwa.
zul: iqiniso elimsulwa wukuthi mayelana nenkinga yokuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi entsheni, kumele senze imizamo enohlonze futhi ephuthumayo, ngenhloso nje yokunciphisa amanani aphakeme kakhulu esibhekene nawo njengamanje entsha ehleli emakhaya engasebenzi, singakayibali intsha esazophuma ezikhungweni zemfundo, nayo ifune umsebenzi.

tsn: puso e tla tswelela go bulela ditšhono tsa ditiro ka lenaanekatoloso la ditiro tsa setšhaba (epwp), bogolosegolo mo ditirong tse di tlhokang batho mo go tsona tse di jaaka tlhokomelo le tsosoloso ya meago le dithoto, go tlhagola bojang, go thiba dipeipi le dipompo tse di dutlang mmogo le mo go baakanyeng sekontiri.
zul: ngakho-ke kusemqoka kakhulu ukuthi siluqalise ngokushesha okukhulu uhlelo olubanzi – oluqhutshwa futhi lulawulwe yihhovisi likamongameli – ukuze kwakhiwe amathuba amasha omsebenzi aqondiswe entsheni, angekho ngaphansi kwezigidi ezimbili kule minyaka eyi-10 ezayo.

tsn: re tla tswelela go tlhama manaane go netefatsa gore bašwa ba katisitswe go lekane go ka tsena mo ditirong le go ka thapega bonolo mo makaleng a e leng gore ‘a tlhoka go thapa batho’.
zul: lolu hlelo luzosebenza kuyo yonke iminyango kahulumeni futhi lusebenze kuzona zontathu izigaba zikahulumeni, ngokubambisana nabomkhakha ozimele.

tsn: makala ano a akaretsa ditikwatikwe tsa megala tsa ditirelo tsa go rulaganya kgwebo, tlhagiso le tsamaiso ya dikuno tsa temothuo, ditsamaiso tsa botegeniki, paakanyo, tlhokomelo le tsosoloso ya meago le dithoto mmogo le ditšhono tse dingwe tse di tlisiwang ke ikonomi ya didirisiwa tsa dijithale mmogo le diintaseteri tsa thekenoloji (4ir).
zul: lezi yizinhlelo ezivumela labo bantu abasha ababhalise ngaphansi kwazo ukuthi babonakale kalula, bathole ukwesekwa kanye namathuba azokwenza ukuthi bavele obala ukuze babonakale kalula ukuthi badinga amathuba omsebenzi noma amathuba okusungula amabhizinisi.

tsn: puso e tla netefatsa gape le gore bašwa ba thapilwe mo diphatlhatirong tsa ikonomi ya loago tse di jaaka tsa thuto ya bomapimpana (ecd) le tsa tirelo ya tlhokomelo ya boitekanelo.
zul: lezi zinhlelo ziyaqinisekisa ukuthi intsha evela emakhaya ahlwempu – futhi ikakhulukazi abesifazane abasebasha – iyahlonyiswa futhi icijwe ngendlela efanele ukuze ikwazi ukuwabamba ngazo zombili amathuba amasha avelayo.

tsn: re tla atolosa tirelo ya bašwa ya bosetšhaba (nys) go ka thusa bašwa ba le 50 000 ka ngwaga.
zul: uhulumeni uzoqhubeka nokuhlinzeka amathuba omsebenzi ngaphansi kohlelo olunwetshiwe lwemisebenzi yomphakathi (i-epwp), ikakhulukazi emikhakheni edinga abasebenzi abaningi njengomkhakha wokulungiswa kwengqalasizinda, ukuhlakulwa kokhula nokususwa kwezihlahla nezitshalo ezingadingekile, ukuvalwa kwamapayipi amanzi avuzayo kanye nokwakhiwa kwemigwaqo.

tsn: puso e tla tshegetsa dirala tsa thekenoloji gore bašwa ba ba leng kwa metseselegaeng le ba ba leng kwa makeišeneng ba kgone go ka itlhamela ditiro.
zul: sizoqhubeka nokuthuthukisa izinhlelo zokuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abasha abangasebenzi bakulungele ukusebenza futhi bayafakwa emsebenzini kuleyo mikhakha lapho kunamathuba omsebenzi akhulayo.

tsn: re tla atolosa manaane a rona go kgontsha bašwa gore ba iponele diphatlhatiro tse di ba duelang tsa go ba thusa go bokeletsa maitemogelo tse di bulelwang ke matsholo a a jaaka letsholo la tirelo ya go thapiwa ga bašwa (yes), mmogo le go netefatsa gore re bulela matsholo a go ithutela tiro kwa tirong.
zul: le mikhakha ibandakanya imikhakha enjengowezinsizakalo zamazwe ngamazwe zokuhlinzeka usizo ngocingo, uchungechunge lomsebenzi wokulungiswa kwemikhiqizo yezolimo, ukuxhunywa kwemishini yezobuchwepheshe, ukulungiswa nokugcinwa kwemishini isesimweni sokusebenza esihle kanye namathuba amasha ahlinzekwa ngumnotho wezobuxhakaxhaka nobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje kanye noguquko lwezimboni lwesine olugxile ekusetshenzisweni kobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje.

tsn: re tla thankgolola ditikwatikwe tsa tsosoloso ya dikgwebopotlana go tlamela bašwa ka ditšhono tsa go itshimololela dikgwebo ka go ba thusa ka matlole le dikeletso jaaka ba tla bo ba simolola leeto la bona la go nna bagwebi.
zul: uhulumeni uzoqhubeka futhi nokuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abasha bayaqashwa ezinhlanganweni nasezikhungweni zomphakathi ezinjengezikhungo zokuthuthukiswa kwezingane zisencane kanye nezinhlangano ezihlinzeka ngosizo lwezempilo nokunakekelwa.

tsn: maabane ke neeilwe tšhono e e seng kana ka sepe go kopana le go buisana le bašwa ba le mmalwa ba aforika borwa ba boammaruri ba dirang tiro e ntle tota mo go ageng naga ya rona le mo go tlhabololeng batho ba borona.
zul: sizolukhulisa uhlelo lukazwelonke lokuvulwa kwemisebenzi eqondiswe entsheni ukuze luqashe abantu abasha abayizi-50 000 njalo ngonyaka.

tsn: bangwe ba bona ke baitlhamedikgwebo fa ba bangwe e le baagasetšhaba, ba bangwe ke bakgaratlhelasetšhaba mme ba bangwe ke bataki ba mefutafuta.
zul: uhulumeni uzosekela futhi axhase izinhlelo-kusebenza zobuchwepheshe eziqondiswe kubantu abasha abangosomabhizinisi ezindaweni zasemakhaya kanye nasemalokishini.

tsn: fa go na le sengwe se se botlhokwa se re se nopotseng go tswa mo dipuisanong le bašwa bano ba ka fa nageng ke gore re ka se gapeletse ditharabololo tsa rona mo go bona: sengwe le sengwe se re tshwanetseng go se dira se tshwanetse gore se gogwe kwa pele ke bašwa ka bobona.
zul: sizozikhulisa izinhlelo zethu ukuze silekelele abantu abasha bakwazi ukuthola ulwazi nesipiliyoni somsebenzi lapho bezokwenza umsebenzi abazowuholela, ngaphansi kwezinhlelo ezinjengohlelo lophiko lokuqashwa kwentsha (i-yes), futhi silekelele intsha ekutholeni amathuba okuqeqeshelwa emsebenzini.

tsn: ba na le dikakanyo tse dintsi tse dintle, ba goga boitshimololedi kwa pele, e bile ba batla go itirela dilo ka bobona.
zul: sizohlinzeka ngezizinda zokulekelela nokuhlinzeka ngosizo emabhizinisini amancane ngenhloso yokunikeza abantu abasha izeluleko eziphathelene nezimali kanye nokuqhutshwa kwebhizinisi ngenkathi besungula amabhizinisi abo.

tsn: re tshwanetse go tshegetsa boitshimololedikgwebo go nne khumo ya naga eno e mo diatleng tsa bašwa ba rona ba ba matlhagatlhaga le ba ba renang ka ditalente tsa boitshimololedi.
zul: izolo, kube yintokozo enkulu kimina ukuhlangana nokuxoxisana neqenjana labantu abasha baseningizimu afrika abenza umsebenzi omuhle kakhulu ekwakheni izwe lethu kanye nokuthuthukisa abantu bakithi.

tsn: maaforika borwa a gaetsho,fa e le gore re batla go netefatsa gore mo ngwagasome yo re o lebileng, ngwana mongwe le mongwe yo a nang le dingwaga di le 10 o kgona go buisa le go tlhaloganya se a se buisang, re tla tlhoka gore setšhaba sotlhe sa rona se tshegetse letsholo le legolo la go buisa.
zul: enye yezinto ezisemqoka esizifundile kulezi zingxoxo ebesizibambe nentsha yaleli lizwe wukuthi akumele siqhamuke nezixazululo ezicatshangwa yithina bese sithi mabazisebenzise: konke esikwenzayo kumele kuholwe ngabantu abasha ngokwabo.

tsn: go ithuta go buisa e sale gale ke seo se kgonang go re bontsha bokgoni jwa ngwana jwa go ithuta e sa le gale, kwa sekolong, kwa sekolong se segolwane go fitlha a ya kwa mafelotirelong.
zul: baqhamuke nemiqondo-mbono eminingi futhi ehlukahlukene, bahamba phambili ekusetshenzisweni kwezindlela-kusebenza ezintsha, futhi bafuna ukuzenzela izinto ngokwabo.

tsn: ditsereganyo tsotlhe tse dingwe – go simolola ka tiro e e diriwang go tokafatsa boleng jwa thuto ya motheo go fitlha mo tlamelong ya baithuti ba ba humanegileng ka thuto e kgolwane, go tloga mo dipeeletsong tse di diriwang mo dikholetšheng tsa thuto le katiso ya tiro ya matsogo le ya setegeniki (tvet) go fitlha mo maemong a katoloso ya katiso kwa tirong – ga di kitla di tlhagisa dipoelo tse re di tlhokang ntle le fa re ka netefatsa gore bana ba rona ba kgona go buisa.
zul: kumele siyeseke le ntshisekelo yentsha ekusunguleni amabhizinisi ngoba phela impumelelo yaleli lizwe incike emdlandleni wabantu abasha kanye nasethalenteni labo lokuqhamuka nemiqondo emisha kanye nezindlela-kusebenza ezintsha.

tsn: ke matsholo a a jaaka letsholo leno la naga la tirisanommogo ya go buisa a a tla re kgontshang go rulaganya sentle letsholo leno la naga.
zul: bantu bakithi, ukuze sikwazi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi kule minyaka eyi-10 ezayo zonke izingane ezineminyaka eyi-10 ziyakwazi ukufunda futhi zikuqonda kahle lokho ezikufundayo, kumele sigqugquzele isizwe sonke ukuthi siweseke umkhankaso omkhulukazi wokufunda.

tsn: barutabana botlhe ba kgato ya motheo le ya magare ba tla katisediwa go ruta go buisa sejatlhapi le dipuo tsa bathobatsho tsa ka fa nageng, mme re setse re simolotse ka go katisa le go romela bakatisi ba ba nang le maitemogelo ba ba tla tlamelang barutabana ka tshegetso ya maemo a a kwa godimo.
zul: ukufunda kwengane isencane kuyinto eyisisekelo, futhi ukuphumelela nokuqhubekela phambili kwengane emfundweni yayo kuncike kulokhu.

tsn: re thankgolotse lenaane la go buisa mo dikereiting tsa kwa tlase, mme lona le tsenyeleditswe gape le mananeo a dirutwa, dibuka tse dingwe gape tsa tlaleletso tsa go buisa mmogo le tshegetso e e tswileng diatla ya barutabana ba kgato ya motheo.
zul: kusukela esikoleni kuqhubeke njalo kuyongena emfundweni ephakeme kuze kuyofinyelela nasemsebenzini imbala.

tsn: seno ke karolo ya matsapa a magolo a go matlafatsa thulaganyo ya thuto ya motheo ka go matlafatsa ditlhopha tsa baeteledipele kwa dikolong, ka go tokafatsa bokgoni jwa barutabana mmogo le go netefatsa gore go na le dikgato tse di lolameng tsa kgatelopele mo kereiting ya boraro, ya borataro le ya borobongwe.
zul: zonke ezinye izinhlelo zethu – kusukela emsebenzini owenziwayo ukwenza ngcono izinga lemfundo eyisisekelo kuyofinyelela ekuhlinzekweni kwemfundo ephakeme yamahhala kubantu abahlwempu, kusukela kutshalomali nokwesekwa esikunikeza amakolishi ezobuchwepheshe nemisebenzi yobungoti bezandla kuyofinyelela ekukhulisweni kwezinhlelo zokuqeqeshelwa emsebenzini – ngeke neze zikhiqize imiphumela emihle uma singaqali ngokuqinisekisa ukuthi izingane ziyakwazi ukufunda.

tsn: re tshwanetse gape go baakanyetsa bašwa ba rona ditiro tse di tla nnang teng tsa kamoso.
zul: yizinhlelo ezinjengomkhankaso wokufunda kazwelonke ezizokwenza sikwazi ukuqhuba ngempumelelo lo mzamo owenziwa ezweni lonkana.

tsn: ke ka ntlha ya seno re rutang barutwana dirutwa di tshwana le go kwala dikhoutu tsa dikhomphiutha le dirutwa tsa go sekaseka tshedimosetso ya dikhomphiutha ba santse ba le kwa dikolong tse di potlana.
zul: bonke othisha bezinga eliyisisekelo kanye nelimaphakathi bazoqeqeshelwa ukufundisa isingisi kanye nezilimi zabomdabu, futhi njengamanje siqeqesha amaqembu abaqeqeshi esizobathumela ezikoleni ukuthi bayohlinzeka ngosizo olusezingeni eliphezulu kothisha ngaphakathi esikoleni.

tsn: ditokololo tse di tlotlegang,aforika borwa yo re mo batlang ke yoo mo nageng ya gagwe batho botlhe ba babalesegileng e bile ba ikutlwa ba babalesegile.
zul: siqalisa uhlelo lokufunda emabangeni aphansi, olubandakanya izinhlelo zesifundo ezinako konke, izincwadi zokufunda ezengeziwe kanye nosizo longoti kothisha bezinga eliyisisekelo.

tsn: ka jalo, tla re dirisaneng mmogo go netefatsa gore re fokotsa bosenyi jo bo tsenyeletsang tirisodikgoka ka halofo mo dingwageng tse di tlang di le 10. sa ntlha ke go oketsa iponagatso ya mapodisi mo mafelong ao baagi ba phelang mo go ona ka go thapa mapodisi a mangwe gape a mantsinyana a basadi le a banna, mmogo le go tlhotlheletsa baagi gore ba nne le seabe se se botlhokwa ka go nna ditokololo tsa foramo ya komiti ya sepodisi sa mo motseng.
zul: lokhu kuyingxenye yemizamo ebanzi yokuqinisa uhlelo lwemfundo eyisisekelo ngokucija nokuhlomisa amathimba abaphathi bezikole, siphucule amakhono othisha futhi siqinisekise ukusetshenziswa kwendlela ethembakele yokukala inqubekelaphambili yabafundi ebangeni lesithathu, elesithupha kanye nelesishiyagalolunye.

tsn: re samagane le ntlha ya go tokafatsa katlego mo dipatlisisong tsa sepodisi le mo go tšhotšhiseng bao ba tlolang molao le go tlamela ka katiso e e botoka le tirelo ya manontlhotlho mo ditheong tsa bosiamisi.
zul: yingakho, ezikoleni zamabanga aphansi, sethula izifundo enjengomsebenzi wokwakhiwa kwamakhodi ezinhlelo-kusebenza zamakhompyutha (izifundo ze-coding) kanye nomsebenzi wokuhlola nokuhlaziya i-data (i-data analytics).

tsn: bosenyi jo bo tsenyeletsang tirisodikgoka bo tlhola matsapa mo setšhabeng mme bo tlhoka gore setšhaba se eme ka dinao kgatlhanong le bona.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile, iningizimu afrika esiyifunayo iyizwe lapho bonke bantu bengazizwa nje bephephile, kepha bephephile impela.

tsn: re dirisana mmogo le mekgatlho ya baagi mabapi le go loga maano a go fedisa tirisodikgoka e e totileng batho ba bong jo bo rileng (gbv) mmogo le dipolao tsa basadi.
zul: ngakho-ke, masisebenze ngokubambisana ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ubugebengu obuhambisana nodlame buncishiswa okungenani ngesigamu kule minyaka eyi-10 ezayo.

tsn: go latela dipuisano tse di tseneletseng, re samagane le kgang ya go tlhoma lekgotla la gbv le dipolao tsa basadi mmogo le togamaano ya leano la naga le le re supetsang tsela, gore re tsamaya fa kae ka matsapa e re setseng re a tsere, a go fedisa leru leno le le re aparetseng.
zul: isinyathelo sokuqala wukukhulisa inani lamaphoyisa abonakala ehamba hamba emphakathini, ngokuthi kuqashwe amaphoyisa angeziwe, kanye nokwenza isimo esizoholela ekutheni izakhamuzi zibambe iqhaza ngenkuthalo ngaphansi kwamaqenjana omphakathi asebenzisana namaphoyisa (ama-cpf) asebenza kahle.

tsn: re semeletse go tlhatlhela sepodisi le dikgotlatshekelo tsa rona gore di kgone go tshegetsa batswasetlhabelo ba gbv ka botlalo.
zul: njengamanje, bangaphezu kwezi-5 000 abafundi ababhaliselwe ukuqeqeshwa okuyisisekelo emakolishi ethu okuqeqesha amaphoyisa futhi sibheke ukuthi leli nani likhuphuke liyofinyelela kwizi-7 000 ngomjikelezo ngamunye kumahlandla okuqeqeshwa kwamaphoyisa amabili ezayo.

tsn: re tlhotlha ntwa ya go lwantshana le barekisi ba diritibatsi ka go tsenya tirisong leano la naga le le lwantshanang le digongwana mmogo le leano le le kgolo la naga le le kwalolotsweng sešwa le le lwantshanang le diritibatsi.
zul: senza imizamo yokwenza ngcono amazinga empumelelo yokuphenywa nokushushiswa kwamacala, kanye nokuqiniseka ukuqeqeshwa okungcono kanye nokusebenza ngobungoti nobunyoninco ohlelweni lwezobulungiswa nokulwisana nobugebengu.

tsn: bagaetshobaeng ba ba tlotlegang,gore re fitlhelele dipeelo tsotlhe tseno re tlhoka go nna le puso e e tlhabologang e bile e na le bokgoni.
zul: ubugebengu obuhambisana nodlame buyinkinga yezwe lonkana, futhi edinga ukuthi kuthathwe izinyathelo ezibandakanya abantu bonke.

tsn: e ke puso e e senang fela ditheo le mafaratlhatlha a a kgontshang ikonomi le setšhaba go dira sentle, mme e kgona gape le go diragatsa phetogo.
zul: sizebenzisana nezinhlangano zomphakathi ukuthola amaqhingasu okunqanda nokuqeda udlame olubhekiswe obulilini obuthile kanye nokubulawa kwabantu besifazane.

tsn: kgwedi eno fa e roga, re ne ra tsibosa diphetogo mo mafapheng a puso go a kgontsha gore a fitlhelele maikarabelo a ona.
zul: kulandela ukubonisana okunohlonze, senza imizamo yokusungula umkhandlu wokulwisana nodlame olubhekiswe obulilini obuthile nokubulawa kwabantu besifazane kanye nohlelo lukazwelonke olukhethekile oluzoba ngumhlahlandlela wethu sonke, kungakhathalekile ukuthi sikuphi, emizamweni yethu yokuqeda lesi sihlava esisabalele ezweni lonkana.

tsn: tshwetso ya rona e ne e itshegeditse ka tolamo, go fokotsa ditshenyegelo tsa madi, pusotshwaraganelo mmogo le go lepalepanya maano a puso le ditheo tsa yona.
zul: simatasa sicija futhi sihlomise amaphoyisa kanye nezinkantolo ekusekeleni izisulu zodlame olubhekiswe obulilini obuthile.

tsn: eno ke kgato ya ntlha ya go kgaotsa kwelotlase ya serodumo sa puso le bokgoni jwa yona gore re fetole mokgwatirelo wa rona gore o kgone go direla ka botlalo batho ba borona.
zul: siyayiqinisa impi yokulwisana namaqembu ezigelekeqe eziqhuba ibhizinisi lokuthengisa izidakamizwa, ngokuqalisa iqhingasu likazwelonke lokulwisana namaqembu emigulukudu kanye nohlelo-ngqangi lukazwelonke lokulwisana nezidakamizwa.

tsn: re tla tsaya kgato ya go lepalepana le dikgaolo – mo re tla tsepamisang megopolo ya rona bogolosegolo mo dikgaolong di le 44 le mo diteropokgolong di le robedi – gore re kgone go potlakisa ditirelo, ka go netefatsa gore dimasepala di tlamelwa ka tshegetso e e lekaneng le go tlamelwa ka dithuso tse di tshwanetseng.
zul: manene namanenekazi, zimenywa ezikhethekile, ukufezekiswa kwazo zonke lezi zinjongo kudinga umbuso onamandla nekhono lokusebenza kanye nezinsiza-kusebenza ezidingekayo, futhi othuthukisayo.

tsn: go netefatsa gore puso e kgona go diragatsa tlhabololo ya ikonomi le ya loago ka tolamo, go botlhokwa gore re matlafatse dikgwebo tsa puso (di-soe).
zul: lowo akuwona nje umbuso ohlinzeka kuphela ngezikhungo kanye nengqalasizinda ezokwenza ukuthi umnotho wezwe kanye nomphakathi usebenze, kodwa ngumbuso onezindlela-kusebenza zokuletha uguquko.

tsn: ka lekgotla la moporesitente la di-soe, puso e ikaeletse go rulaganya dikgwebo tsotlhe tsa puso mmogo le go rulaganya botoka maikarabelo a tsona a a botlhokwa.
zul: ngasekuqaleni kwale nyanga, samemezela ukuhlelwa kabusha kweminyango kahulumeni eminingana ukuze ikwazi ukwenza kahle imisebenzi ethweswe yona.

tsn: ka lekgotla leno, re tla kgona go dirisana le boeteledipele jwa di-soe go tlhoma lefelo le le nang le melao le melawanataolo le le tshegetsang boitshimololedi le tiro e e tswileng diatla mmogo le go dira gore di kgone go gaisana le tse dingwe.
zul: isinqumo sethu besisekelwe phezu komzamo wokuqiniseksa ukusebenza ngobunyoninco, ukunciphisa izindleko, ukuphatha ngokubambisana kanye nokuhambelanisa imisebenzi eyenziwa yiminyango kahulumeni ehlukahlukene.

tsn: re tla rokelela mo godimo ga tiro e re setseng re e dirile ya go samagana le matsapa a tsamaiso e e sa lolamang, tiragatso e e bokoa ya ditirelo le tlhokomelo ya matlole.
zul: lokhu kuyisiqalo senqubo ebanzi yokunqanda ukufadalala kwamandla okusebenza ombuso kanye nokuhlela kabusha uhlelo-kusebenza lwethu lokuhlinzeka ngezidingo-ngqangi ukuze lukwazi ukuzisebenzela kahle kakhulu izakhamuzi zezwe lethu.

tsn: re ikemiseditse go aga naga e e nang le maitshwaro a mantle e mo go yona go senang sebaka sa go ka dira bonweenwee, go ka tshosetsa batho ba bangwe, go ka ikhumisa ka ditirelo tsa puso tse di kabong di rebolelwa baagi ba ba humanegileng le go ka utswa madi a puso.
zul: sizosebenzisa inqubo-kusebenza ezogxila ezifundeni ezingama-44 nemikhandlu-dolobha eyisishiyagalombili ngenhloso yokusheshisa ukuhlinzekwa kwezidingo-ngqangi, futhi kuqinisekiswe ukuthi omasipala bahlinzekwa ngokwesekwa okufanelekile futhi banikezwe nezinsiza-kusebenza ezanele.

tsn: re batla setlhopha sa badiredipuso ba ba manontlhotlho ba ba nang le maitshwaro a mantle – mme e bile ba na le maikemisetso a go direla setšhaba.
zul: ngenhloso yokuqinisekisa ukuthi umbuso uyakwazi ukuletha kahle intuthuko kwezomnotho kanye nakwezenhlalo yomphakathi, kusemqoka kakhulu ukuthi siqinise amabhizinisi ombuso (ama-soe).

tsn: dikgato tse re di tsereng tsa go samagana le merero ya go goga puso ka nko le go lwantshana le bonweenwee, mmogo le dikgato tsa go matlafatsa bothati jwa bosekisi jwa bosetšhaba (npa), uniti e e itlhophileng ya dipatlisiso (siu), tirelo ya lekgetho la aforika borwa (sars) mmogo le setheo sa tshireletso ya puso (ssa) di utulola dipoelo tse di botlhokwa.
zul: ngokusebenzisa umkhandlu kamongameli wama-soe, uhulumeni uhlose ukuqinisekisa ukusebenza ngendlela ehambelanayo phakathi kwazo zonke izinkampani zombuso futhi kucaciswe kahle namagunya nemisebenzi ezethweswe yona ngokuhlukahlukana kwazo.

tsn: re kopile mokaidimogolo wa bothati jwa bosekisi jwa bosetšhaba (ndpp) go tla ka leano le le tla oketsang maatla le bokgoni jwa npa gore e nne le mosola, go akaretsa le go netefatsa gore e nne le bokgoni jwa go thopa dithoto fa go tlhokegang.
zul: ngaphansi kwalo mkhandlu, sizosebenzisana nabaholi bama-soe ukuthuthukisa imithetho nemithethonqubo ezogqugquzela ukusetshenziswa kwezindlela ezintsha zesimanjemanje ezihambisana nokukhalipha okukhulu futhi kwenziwe ngcono nekhono namandla okuncintisana kwalezi zinkampani nezimbangi zazo kwezebhizinisi.

tsn: re tshwanetse go netefatsa gore madi a puso a a utswitsweng go na le tsela e re a busang ka yona gore a dirisediwe se a neng a tshwanetse go se dira mo kabong ya ditirelo le mo go tlhomeng mafaratlhatlha a a tlhokegang thata mo baaging ba ba humanegileng.
zul: sizokwakhela phezu komsebenzi osuqalisiwe kakade okuhloswe ngawo ukuxazulula izinkinga zokungaphathi ngendlela efanele, nokuhluleka ukusebenza ngobunyoninco kanye nezinkinga eziphathelene nokusimama ngakwezezimali.

tsn: re solofetse gape gore bothati jo bo itlhophileng jwa siu bo tla simolola ka tiro ya jona mo dikgweding di se kae tse di tlang go lebelela ditopotuelo tse di tlhatlhetsweng ke baagi go latela dipatlisiso tse siu e di rebotseng, tseo ga jaana di balelwang go ka nna r14.7 bilione.
zul: sizibophezele ekwakheni umbuso olandela izinkambiso zokusebenza ngobuqotho lapho ingekho nakancane inkohlakalo, ukwenzelela, ukuzicebisa ngokungemthetho, kanye nokweba imali kahulumeni.

tsn: aforika borwa e tla tswelela go tshameka karolo e e botlhokwa mo maemong a boditšhabatšhaba mo matsholong a go tshegetsa kagiso le tshireletsego ya batho, le mo tlhabololong le khumong ya batho botlhe.
zul: sifuna ukuba neqembu labasebenzi bakahulumeni abanekhono, abasebenza ngobungoti futhi abenza umsebenzi wabo ngobuqotho obukhulu futhi abazinikele emsebenzini wabo wokusebenzela umphakathi.

tsn: re tsosolosa maikemisetso a rona a go dira mmogo le dinaga tsa boditšhabatšhaba go somarele le go sireletsa melao e e ikaegileng ka thulaganyotsamaiso ya dinaga tse dintsi tse di farologaneng moo mokgatlho wa dinagakopano (un) o di gogang kwa pele.
zul: seziqalile ukukhiqiza imiphumela emihle futhi esemqoka izinyathelo esizithathile zokuqeda ukubanjwa ngobhongwane kombuso kanye nokulwisana nenkohlakalo, kubandakanya nezinyathelo zokuqinisa uphiko lukazwelonke lwezokushushisa (i-npa), uphiko lokuphenywa kwamacala akhethekile (i-siu), uphiko lokuqoqwa kwentela lwaseningizimu afrika (i-sars) kanye nenhlangano kahulumeni yezokuvikela.

tsn: re tla dirisa maemo a rona a go nna tokololo mo lekgotleng la pabalesego la un go rotloetsa dikgato tsa go rarabolola dikgotlang ka kagiso, bogolosegolo mo kontinenteng ya rona.
zul: sesinxuse umqondisi kazwelonke wezokushushiswa komphakathi (i-ndpp) ukuthi athuthukise uhlelo oluzophucula futhi luthuthukise kakhudlwana amandla okusebenza kanye nobunyoninco be-npa, kubandakanya nokuqinisekisa ukuthi uqhutshwa kahle futhi ngobunono umsebenzi wokudliwa kwempahla etholakale ezenzweni zobugebengu nenkohlakalo.

tsn: maaforika borwa a gaetsho,fa e le gore tota re batla go nna le aforika borwa yo re mo lakatsang, re tlhoka tumelano ya loago e ntšhwa.
zul: kumele siqinisekise ukuthi iyabuyiswa imali kahulumeni entshontshiwe ukuze isetshenziselwe ukuhlinzeka izidingo-ngqangi kanye nengqalasizinda eyisisekelo edingeka kakhulu emiphakathini edla imbuya ngothi.

tsn: re tlhoka go nna le botsalano jo bo tshwarelelang magareng ga puso, dikgwebo, mekgatlho ya badiri, mekgatlho ya baagi le ditšhaba tsa rona.
zul: iningizimu afrika izoqhubeka nokudlala indima esemqoka kwezobudlelwane bamazwe omhlaba emizamweni yokuqinisekisa ukuthula nokuvikeleka emhlabeni, intuthuko egxile kubantu kanye nokuchuma nokuphumelela kwabantu bonke.

tsn: puso e tshwanetse go tlhola tikologo e e bulelang batho dikgoro, go dirisa metswedi ya puso ka tshwanelo mmogo le go beeletsa mo go tlhabololeng bokgoni jwa batho ba naga eno.
zul: siyakuvuselela ukuzibophezela kwethu ekusebenzisaneni okuhle namazwe omhlaba ngenhloso yokugcina nokuvikela uhlelo lokubambisana nokusebenzisana kwamazwe ngamazwe olusekelwe phezu kwemithetho ebekiwe, oluholwa yinhlangano yezizwe (i-un).

tsn: re ka rata gore fa puso e tsaya ditshwetso le dikgato tsa yona e tseetsia dipeelo tsa bosetšhaba tsa togamaano ya naga mmogo le matsapa a loago a a leng teng.
zul: sizosebenzisa isikhundla sethu njengelungu lomkhandlu wezokuvikela we-un, (i-unsc), ukugqugquzela imizamo yokuxazulula izingxabano ngokuthula, ikakhulukazi kwizwekazi lase-afrika bantu bakithi, ukuze sikwazi ukufinyelela kuhlobo lweningizimu afrika esiyifisayo, sidinga isivumelwano sokusebenzisana nokubambisana esisha.

tsn: re a dumelana gore mekgatlho ya badiri e tshwanetse go tseela kwa tlhogong dikgatlhegelo tsa badiri fa mo letlhakoreng le leng, e tshwanetse go tlhokomela dikgwebo mmogo le go tlhola diphatlhatiro.
zul: kudingeka ukuthi sakhe ubambiswano oluqinile phakathi kukahulumeni, abasebenzi, imiphakathi kanye nezinhlangano zomphakathi.

tsn: mekgatlho ya baagi e tshwanetse go tswelela go rwesa puso maikarabelo fela le yona e tshwanetse go re ema nokeng ka go tsaya dikgato tse di bonagalang gore re kgone go fitlhelela seo botlhe re se batlang.
zul: uhulumeni kumele akhe isimo esifanelekile, azisebenzise ngobuhlakani izinsiza nezimali zakhe futhi atshale izimali ekuthuthukiseni abasebenzi baleli lizwe.

tsn: re tlhoka tirisanommogo e e nonofileng mo makokong a dipolotiki a re nang le ona ka fa palamenteng eno, re tlhoka tshegetso ya lona, go re tlhaba botlhale fa re sa boneng sentle gona le go re neela ditharabololo tse di utlwagalang mmogo le go tsaya matsapa gore re tsholetse dikgatlhegelo tsa naga eno ya borona.
zul: kungaba yinto enhle impela uma abamabhizinisi bengazibhekelela izinjongo zezwe ezisemqoka kanye nezidingo zomphakathi ngenkathi bethatha izinqumo kanye nezinyathelo zabo.

tsn: re batla aforika borwa yo mo go ene batho botlhe ba jang ba namile le go keteka khumo ya bona.
zul: sinethemba lokuthi amaqembu amelwe kuleli phalamende azoba yingxenye esemqoka kulolu bambiswano, futhi alekelele, ahlinzeke ngemibono enohlonze nemiqondo ebonisa ubuhlakani obukhulu futhi aqhamuke nezixazululo kanye nemizamo ephathekayo ngenhloso yokuhlomulisa izwe lonkana.

tsn: re batla gape aforika borwa yo mo go one re tla kgonang go atolosa bokgoni jwa rona jotlhe jaaka re gatelapele.
zul: lesi sivumelwano sokubambisana komphakathi wonkana sidinga ukuthi wonke umuntu afake isandla.

tsn: re batla aforika borwa yo a beetseng kwa setlhoeng mafaratlhatlha a gagwe a diterene, yo a nang le diterene tse di nang le lebelo le le kwa godimo tse di golaganyang diteropokgolo tsa rona le mafelo a a kwa kgakalakgala mo nageng.
zul: futhi sidinga ukuzidela kanye nokuhlangabezana phakathi, ukuze kube khona ukuvumelana nokusebenzisana okuhle.

tsn: re batla aforika borwa yo a nang le thekenoloji ya ikonomi ya maemo a a kwa godimo mo go nang le ditlhabologo mo go nang le didirisiwa tsa eleketeroniki mo maphateng a boitekanelo, mo go nang le diroboto mme tirelo ya boitekanelo mo bathong ba ba nnang kwa kgakalakgakala mo nageng e kgonang go diragadiwa jaaka re tla bo re thankgolola nhi.
zul: ukuze sikwazi ukuvuselela nokufaka ugqozi nofuqufuqu ekuqalisweni kwe-ndp, kumele siqinisekise ukuthi amehlo ethu ahlala ethe njo phambili lapho siphokophele khona.

tsn: re batla aforika borwa yo tiro ya gagwe e seng fela go rekisetsa dinaga tsa kwantle dikuno tse di iseng di tlhotlhiwe mme yo gape a nang le bodutelo jwa tlhagisodikuno tse di botlhokwa tse di dirisiwang mo didirisiweng tsa eleketeroniki le mo dijanageng mmogo le mo dikhumphiutheng.
zul: sifuna iningizimu afrika lapho wonke muntu ezophila kamnandi futhi ahlale ngokunethezeka, akhombe ngophakathi.

tsn: re tshwanetse go nna naga e e kgonang go iphepa mmogo le go dirisa thekenoloji ya gompieno e e dirisiwang mo temothuong.
zul: kodwa-ke futhi sifuna iningizimu afrika lapho sizokwazi ukusebenzisa ngokuphelele amandla namakhono ethu ngenkathi siqhubeka endleleni ephokophele phambili.

tsn: ke akanya ka aforika borwa yo teropo yotlhe ya ntlhantlha e ntšhwa mo pusong ya temokerasi e nang le meago e e kwa godimodimodimo, dikolo, diyunibesiti, dipetlele le difeme.
zul: sifuna iningizimu afrika ebeke eqhulwini izinhlelo zayo zokuthutha ngesitimela futhi okuyizinhlelo ezikhiziqa izitimela ezihamba ngesivinini esikhulu ezizoxhumanisa amadolobhakazi ethu nezindawo zasemakhaya ezisemajukujukwini ezwe lethu.

tsn: toro eno e ke nang le yona e tlhotlheleditswe ke puisano ya me le batho ba le bane ba ba botlhokwa: ngaka nkosazana dlamini zuma, ngaka naledi pandor, mme jessie duarte mmogo le moporesitente xi jinping wa kwa nageng ya china, yo kgang ya gagwe ya fa a bua ka ka fao china e agang teropokgolo e ntšhwa dikhilomitara di le 100 go tswa mo beijing e tlhotlheleditseng toro e ke nang le yona.
zul: kumele sizibone ngamehlo engqondo sesiphila ezweni lapho izitimela ezihamba ngesivinini esikhulu zidlula egoli ziphokophele e-musina, futhi lapho zifika e-buffalo city zithi ukuma kancane, zivela ethekwini, sezibuyela emuva lapha edolobheni lasekapa.

tsn: diteropokgolo tsa johannesburg, tshwane, motsekapa le ethekwini di a tlala mme di tla bo di sa tlhole di kgona go amogela batho botlhe ba ba fisegelang go nna kwa diteropong.
zul: sifuna iningizimu afrika engagcini nje kuphela ngokuthumela kwamanye amazwe imikhiqizo engakalungiswa, kepha eyisizinda esisezingeni lomhlaba sokukhiqizwa kwezingxenye ezisemqoka ezisetshenziswa kuma-elekthronikhi, ezimotweni kanye nakumakhompyutha.

tsn: a ga se one motsi yo re ntseng re o letile yo re tshwanetseng go kuka mafatlha mme re samagane le namane e tona ya tiro mme re dire seo batho ba bangwe ba akanyang gore ga se kitla se kgonega?
zul: kumele sibe yizwe elikwaziyo ukuzondla futhi lokhu sikwenze ngokusebenzisa ubuchwepheshe besimanjemanje kwezolimo.

tsn: re setšhaba sa aforika borwa seo molaotheo wa sona o rotloetsang le bao ba neng ba latlhegetswe ke tshepo, o apesang ditshwanelo go batho bao ba neng ba di amogilwe le bao ba neng ba kgapetswe kwa thoko, le o o digelang matswalo le go babalela banna, basadi le bana ba naga ya ona.
zul: kuyiphupho lami ukubona iningizimu afrika lapho kwakhiwa idolobha elisha sha esikhathini sombuso wentando yeningi labantu, elinamabhilidi amade, izikole, amanyuvesi, izibhedlela kanye namafemu.

tsn: ke na le tsholofelo gonne ke dirile mmogo le baagi ba naga eno – baoki le badiredi ba tlhokomelo ya boitekanelo, banna le basadi ba rona ba ba aparang seaparo sa puso, barutabana kwa dikolong tsa rona, baithuti ba rona ba ba nang le maikemisetso a go atlega mo botshelong go sa kgathalesege gore malapa a ba tswang kwa go ona a rwele joko e e bokete go le kae, mmogo le bašwa ba rona ba ba lekang ka natla go itshimololela dikgwebo, go itlhamela le go itshimololela le go sutlhelela mo maemong ao ba leng mo go ona.
zul: amadolobha anjengegoli, i-tshwane, ikapa kanye netheku aseqala ukuphelelwa yindawo yokuhlalisa bonke abantu abafudukela ngobuningi emadolobheni.

tsn: fa re tshwaraganetse tiro ga go sepe se re ka retelelwang ke go nna sona, se se ka re retelelang, e bile ga go sepe se re ka retelelwang ke go se fitlhelela.
zul: ingabe asikafiki yini isikhathi sokuthi sibonise isibindi futhi senze lokho ebesingacabangi neze ukuthi singaba namandla okukwenza?

tsn: badiragatsi ba ba kgonang go nna le maikemisetso a a sa potapoteng ka ga se se tshwanetseng go diragadiwa mme ba dire gore se diragale.
zul: nakuba kukhona lapho sihlulekile ukwenza izinto ngendlela efanele kanye nalapho siphelelwe khona wugqozi nofuqufuqu, asikazikhohlwa ukuthi singobani futhi asikakhohlwa ukuthi simeleni.

tsn: go jalo, ke bona batho bao ba ba re kgotlhokgotsang re le baagi ba aforika borwa.
zul: siseyisona leso sizwe esishiwo ngenhla.

tsn: i vanhu lava va hlayisaka volavo va kotaka ku languta emahlweni na ku vona afrika-dzonga leri humeleleke.. ndi vhenevho vhane vha ri afrika tshipembe heḽi ḽashu vha ṱoḓa ḽi tshi ya phanḓa, ḽi vhe na mvelaphanḓa ine ya ḓo vhonwa nga vhathu vhoṱhe.. yo ke aforika borwa yo a tshwanetseng go re naya mafolofolo.
zul: nginethemba ngoba sengihambe ibanga elide nabantu baleli lizwe – abahlengikazi kanye nabasebenzi bezempilo, amaphoyisa namasosha, othisha ezikoleni zethu abafundi abazimisele ukuphumelela nakuba bebhekene nobunzima nenhlupheko emakhaya, kanye nentsha ezama ukuzisungulela amabhizinisi, ezama ukuqamba nokwakha izinto ezitsha, futhi eyenza konke okusemandleni ayo ukuphumelela ngaphansi kwezimo ezinzima ehlangabezana nazo.

tsn: fa re tshwaraganetse tiro ga go sepe se se ka re retelelang, e bile ga go sepe se re ka retelelwang ke go se fitlhelela.
zul: uma sisebenza ngokubambisana akukho okungasehlula.

tsn: puo ya maemo a setšhaba ka moporesitente cyril ramaphosammusakgotla wa kokoanotheomolao ya bosetšhaba (na), mme thandi modise,modulasetulo wa lekgotla la bosetšhaba la diporofense (ncop), rre amos masondo,motlatsamoporesitente rre david mabuza,moatlhodimogolo mogoeng mogoeng le ditokololo tsotlhe tse di tlotlegang tsa bosiamisi,moporesitente wa mo malobeng rre thabo mbeki le mme mbeki,moporesitente wa mo malobeng rre kgalema motlanthe le mme motlanthe,motlatsamoporesitente wa mo malobeng rre fw de klerk le mme de klerk,mmusakgotla wa mo malobeng wa na mme baleka mbete le rre khomo,moporesitente wa palamente ya lekgotla la aforika, motlotlegi rre roger nkondo dang,mosadi yo a emetseng naga ya aforika borwa kwa dinagakopanong (un) mme anne githuku-shongwe,moamogedi wa tlotla ya seaparankwe, rre andrew mlangeni,ditona le batlatsatona,ditonakgolo le babusakgotla ba dikgotlapeomolao tsa diporofense,modulasetilo wa mokgatlho wa dipusoselegae wa aforika borwa (salga) le bomeyarabagolo,mmusisi wa banka ya risefe ya aforika borwa (sarb), rre lesetja kganyago,ditlhogo tsa ditheo tse di sireletsang molaotheo wa temokerasi,baeteledipele ba mekgatlho ya bodumedi,baeteledipele ba ditheo tsa thuto le tsa dipatlisiso,ditokololo tsa ditheo tsa sedipolomate,baeng ba ba laleditsweng,ditokololo tse di tlotlegang tsa na,ditokololo tse di tlotlegang tsa ncop,maaforika borwa a gaetsho,ndi tama u lumelisa vhathu vhoṱhe vhane vha vha fhano na hayani.
zul: somlomo wesigungu sikazwelonke, nks thandi modise,sihlalo womkhandlu kazwelonke wezifundazwe, umnu amos masondo,iphini likamongameli, u-david mabuza,ijaji eliyinhloko, u-mogoeng mogoeng, kanye nawo wonke amalungu ahloniphekile ophiko lwezobulungiswa,umongameli waphambilini, umnu thabo mbeki nonkk mbeki,umongameli waphambilini, umnu kgalema motlanthe nonkk motlanthe,iphini likamongameli laphambilini u-fw de klerk no nkk de klerk,somlomo waphambilini unks baleka mbete nomnu khomo,umongameli wephalamende lamazwe ase-afrika, umnu roger nkodo dang, omele abesifazane baseningizimu afrika kunhlangano yezizwe, nks anne githuku-shongwe,isithwalandwe, umnu andrew mlangeni,ongqongqoshe kanye namaphini abo,ondunankulu kanye nosomlomo bezishayamthetho zezifundazwe,umongameli wenhlangano yohulumeni basekhaya yaseningizimu afrika kanye nezimeya zemikhandludolobha,umphathi webhange lombuso laseningizimu afrika, umnu lesetja kganyago,izinhloko zezikhungo zikahulumeni ezeseka ukubusa ngentando yeningi labantu,abaholi bezinhlangano zezenkolo,abaholi bezikhungo zezemfundo nezocwaningo,amalungu ezindlu zamanxusa,izimenywa ezikhethekile,amalungu ahloniphekile esigungu sikazwelonke,amalungu ahloniphekile omkhandlu kazwelonke wezifundazwe,bantu baseningizimu afrika,ndi tama u lumelisa vhathu vhoṱhe vhane vha vha fhano na hayani.

zul: ngibingelela bonke abantu abasekhaya nabalapha.

zul: ke dumedisa batho ka moka bao ba leng gae le bao ba leng mo.

tsn: go setse go fetile dingwaga di le 30 fa e sale rre nelson rolihlahla mandela a gololwa kwa kgolegelong ya victor verster, e leng sesupo mo hisetoring ya rona se se totobaditseng gore boammaruri kgololesego e setse e le gaufi le go re aparela.
zul: sekuyiminyaka engama-30 selokhu u-nelson rolihlala mandela akhululwa ejele i-victor verster, okungumzuzu emlandweni wethu ogqame kakhulu kuneminye inkululeko eke yaba nawo njengamanje.

tsn: fa a ne a eme mo mathuding a cape town city hall go ema matšhwititšhwiti ka lefoko a a neng a gorogile ka makatlanamane go tla go mo amogela, o ne a re:“mogwanto wa rona go lwela kgololesego ga o kitla o gatela morago.
zul: ngesikhathi eme kuvulandi ophezulu ehholo ledolobha lasekapa ukuzokhuluma nezinkumbi zabantu ababefike ngezinkulungwane ngezinkulungwane ukuzomamukela, wathi:'indlela yethu eya enkululekweni ayijiki.

tsn: ga re a tshwanela go letla letshogo go re ema ka fa pele.”gompieno, morago ga dingwaga di le 30, jaaka re gatela pele ka mogwanto wa rona wa go tokafatsa matshelo a batho ba borona, jaaka re tobana le dikgwetlho tse ditonagadi, jaaka re tsubutlwa ke ditsuatsue tsa botshelo, le rona ga re a tshwanela go letla letshogo go re ema ka fa pele.
zul: akumele sivumele ukusaba kume endleleni yethu.

tsn: re tshwanetse re gatele pele, re se letlelele ditsuatsue tsa botshelo kgotsa boikobonyo jwa rona mo go rona go re faposa.
zul: 'njengamanje, emva kweminyaka engama-30, sisaqhubeka nokuya phambili ukwenza ngcono izimpilo zabantu bakithi, sisabhekana nezingqinamba, sisabekezelela izikhathi ezinzima, nathi-ke angeke sivumele ukusaba kume endleleni yethu.

tsn: jaaka re kgobokane go buisana ka seemo sa naga ya rona, re etetswe ke ba lelapa la ga basil february, molwelakgololesego yo o sebete yo a latlhegetsweng ke botshelo jwa gagwe kwa zimbabwe mo letsholong la wankie campaign ka ngwaga wa 1967. e setse e le sebaka se se ka dirang halofo ya ngwagakgolo, mme fela jaaka ba bangwe ba le bantsinyana ba a neng a lwela tokologo mmogo le bona, go fitlha ga jaana, ga go ope yo a itseng gore mebele ya bona e fitlhilwe kae.
zul: njengoba sihlangane ukuzobuka isimo sezwe lethu, sihlanganyele nomndeni ka-basil february, iqhawe lenkululeko elinesibindi elashona ezimbabwe emkhankasweni i-wankie ngonyaka we-1967.

tsn: seabe se a nnileng le sona, go ikentsheng setlhabelo ga gagwe, ke seo ka se tsogeng se lebetswe.
zul: eminyakeni engama-50 indawo lapho elele khona, njengamanye amaqabane, kuze kube manje, ayaziwa.

tsn: maitseboeng ano re kgobokane fano ka boikobo re gopola banna le basadi bao ba ikentshitseng setlhabelo gore re bone kgololesego, mme ka ntlha ya seno re itse le go tlhaloganya sentle maikarabelo a magolo a re a rweleng gore re fitlhelele ditoro tsa bona.
zul: kusihlwa nje, sihlangene lapha sithotshwe izinkumbulo zalawo madoda nabafazi abanikelela ngezimpilo zabo enkululekweni yethu, sisazi kahle isibophezelo esikhulu esisiphethe sokufezekisa amaphupho abo.

tsn: go na le dinako tseo re iphitlhelang re sa dira go go lekaneng, go na le dinako tseo re iphitlhelang re dirile diphoso, fela re tswelela go nna re tsetsepetse mo maikaelelong a rona a go aga setšhaba se se gololesegileng, se se lekalekanang le se se renang kagiso.
zul: kunezikhathi la siphelelwa khona, kunezikhathi lapho senza amaphutha, kodwa siyaqhubeka nokungashukumiseki empokophelweni yethu yokwakha umphakathi okhululekile, olinganayo nonokuthula.

tsn: fa o ka ela tlhoko hisetori ya rona o tla lemoga gore fa re le ngatana e le nngwe e e renang kagiso le tumelo, re kgona go sutisa dikgoreletsi tsa mefuta yotlhe mo tseleng le go dira gore naga ya rona e nne lefelo leo rona rotlhe re ikutlwang re gololesegile, re babalesegile e bile re sena sepe se se re kokonang mo go lona.
zul: umlando wethu usitshela ukuthi uma sibumbene ngokuthula nangokukholwa, singanqoba zonke izithiyo futhi siguqule izwe lethu libe indawo lapho sonke sizizwa sikhululekile, siphephile futhi sizizwe sintofontofo.

tsn: ke mogopolo ono o re tshwanetseng go o dirisa go mekamekana le seemo sa ga jaana.
zul: kungaloyo moya njengamanje sizobhekana nesimo samanje.

tsn: naga ya rona e tobane le dikgwetlho tse di boima.
zul: izwe lethu libhekene neqiniso elibabayo.

tsn: ikonomi ya rona e reteletswe ke go gola ka lebelo le le bonagalang mo pakeng e e fetang dingwaga di le lesome.
zul: umnotho wethu awukakhuli ngezinga elifanelekile eminyakeni engaphezu kweyishumi.

tsn: le fa go na le diphatlhatiro tse di dirilweng, palo ya botlhokatiro e tsweletse go oketsega.
zul: noma imisebenzi yakhiwa, izinga lokungasebenzi liyaqhubeka nokukhuphuka.

tsn: poelosekeng ya ikonomi ya rona e goga ka bonya ka ntlha ya tlhaelo ya motlakase e e tsweletseng go kgoreletsa dikgwebo le matshelo a baagi ba naga ya rona.
zul: ukusimama komnotho wethu kumile ngenxa yokuthi ukushoda kwamandla ogesi okubelesele kuphazamisa amabhizinisi kanye nezimpilo zabantu.

tsn: dikgwebo tsa puso (di-soe) di se kae di aparetswe ke mathata, mme gape le ditheo tsa rona tsa matlole a setšhaba le tsona di mo tlalelong e e seng kana ka sepe.
zul: amabhizinisi amaningana kahulumeni asosizini, nezimali zikahulumeni wethu zingaphansi kwengcindezi enkulu.

tsn: ke lona, baagi ba naga ya aforika borwa, ba le tswelelang go rwalela mmutla le setlhako, ka go sugana le ditlhwatlhwa tsa ditheko tse di tlhatlhogetseng ruri, botlhokatiro, go retelelwa ke go tšhwamoga mo diatleng tsa lehuma le go retelelwa ke go diragatsa bokgoni jo le nang le bona.
zul: yinina, abantu baseningizimu afrika, enithwele lomthwalo, enibhekene nezindleko zokuphila ezikhuphukayo, ukungabikho kwemisebenzi, ukungakwazi ukubalekela inhlupheko, ukungakwazi ukubonisa okwazi ukukwenza.

tsn: le fa go le jalo, mo letlhakoreng le lengwe go na le ditiragalo tse dingwe tse re ka ipelang ka tsona.
zul: okwamanje, ngasikhathi sinye, kunenye ingxenye eqinisweni lethu.

tsn: ke ditiragalo tse di re kaelang ka bašwa ba rona ba ba nang le ditšhono tse dintsi tsa go ka ya sekolong go feta tse re kileng ra bo re na le tsona mme tsona di tokafatsa le go fitlhelela tse re ipeetseng tsona.
zul: iqiniso lenani labantu abasha abafinyelela kalula kwezemfundo ukudlula phambilini futhi abathola imiphumela elokhu iba ngcono.

tsn: ke ditiragalo tse di diragalelang bana ba le 2.4 milione ba ba tsenang dikolo tsa thuto ya bomapimpana (ecd) le dikolo tse di potlana.
zul: iqiniso lezingane eziyisigidi ezi-2.4 ezisezindaweni zokukhulisa izingane ezincane nasezinkulisa.

tsn: ke ditiragalo tsa barutwana ba ka dira 81% ba ba falotseng materiki ngogola, moo re boneng koketsego ya bona e tswang kwa dikolong tsa kwa metseselegae le kwa makeišeneng.
zul: balinganiselwa kumaphesenti angama-81 abafundi abaphase umatikuletsheni ngonyaka odlule, nenani elandayo eliqhamuka ezikoleni zasemakhaya naselokishini.

tsn: re batla go akgola barutwana ba ngwaga wa 2019 go bo ba dirile bontle jaana.
zul: ngale mpumelelo enkulu, sishayela ihlombe abafundi bangowezi-2019.

tsn: ditiragalo tse dingwe gape tsa rona ke tsa baithuti ba le 720 000 ba ba tlametsweng ka matlole go tswa kwa pusong gore ba tsweletse dithuto tsa bona kwa dikholejeng tsa katiso le thuto ya ditiro tsa diatla le tsa setegenik (di-tvet) le kwa diyunibesiting.
zul: iqiniso futhi ukuthi kunabafundi abayizi-720 000 abathole ukuxhaswa nguhulumeni ukufunda emakolishi amakhono nobuchwepheshe kanye nasemanyuvesi ngonyaka owedlule.

tsn: ke ditiragalo tsa maaforika borwa a ka dira 6.8 milione a a itseng maemo a bona a boitekanelo tebang le hiv, ba ka nna 5 milione ba setse ba simolotswe ka kalafi ya melemo ya thibelaketegelo ya kokwanatlhoko lebolelateng (art) mmogo le ba bangwe ba le 4.2 milione bao mogare wa lebolelateng wa bona o iseng o bonwe.
zul: sikhuluma ngabantu baseningizimu afrika abangaba yizigidi eziyi-6.8 abasaziyo isimo sabo sesandulelangculazi, bangaba izigidi ezi-5 abantu asebeqaliswe imishanguzo yokudambisa isandulelangculazi kanye nabayizigidi ezi-4.2 abantu ngenxa yalokhu, ubungako begciwane egazini labo, abubonakali.

tsn: tseno ga se fela dipalopalo.
zul: lezi akuzona izibalo nje.

tsn: ke matshelo a baagi ba naga ya rona a a tokafadiwang.
zul: lezi izimpilo zabantu bakuleli ezenziwe ngcono.

tsn: ke dikgato tse di re bontshang gore go na le kgatelopele.
zul: kuyizimpawu zenqubekelaphambili.

tsn: ditiragalo tsa rona gape di supa gore re na le bokgoni jo bo sa kgaleng.
zul: iqiniso esinalo futhi kungokunye esinamandla okukwenza ngokungenamkhawulo.

tsn: tsa lefatshe le le nang le dintletsentletse tsa diminerale le mefutafuta ya dimela le diphologolo tse e leng fela dinaga di le mmalwa fela mo lefatsheng tse di nang le seo re nang le sona.
zul: umhlaba onothe ngokumbiwa phansi kanye nokuhlukahlukana kwempilo yezitshalo nezilwane esingawulinganisa nengcosana emhlabeni.

tsn: ke tsa sekgwama se segolo sa madi, mafaratlhatlha a mantsi, melao e e utlwalang le ditheo tse di matlhagatlhaga.
zul: isizinda esijulile somnotho, izingqalasizinda ezibanzi, imithetho enengqondo kanye nezikhungo eziqinileyo.

tsn: ke tsa naga ya bašwa le batho ba ba farologaneng ba ba humileng le ba ba phophomang ka ditalente.
zul: abantu abanothile, abahlukahlukene, abasebasha futhi abanamakhono.

tsn: bosigong jono re etetswe ke lekgarebe mme zozibini tunzi, yo tlhatlhogo ya gagwe mo go thopeng maemo a mmabontlenyana wa lefatshe ka bophara e leng segakolodi sa bokgoni jo re nang le bona mo nageng jo bo ka re dirang gore re fitlhelele dilo tse dikgolo tota go sa kgathalesege dikgwetlho tse re tobanang le tsona.
zul: ngalo busuku, sihlanganyele kanye nozozibini tunzi, ukwethwesa kwakhe isicoco sikazime womhlaba kuyisikhumbuzo kwamandla esinawo ukuzuza okukhulu simelene nezingqinamba.

tsn: re amogela gape le lekau la mokapotene wa di-springbok siya kolisi, yo a neng a eteletse kwa pele setlhopha se se neng se bela ka maikemisetso e bile se tshwaragane sa naga ya aforika borwa gore se nne bafenyi ba sejana sa lefatshe sa motshameko wa rakabi sa 2019. maitseboeng ano re etetswe gape le ke mošwa yo mongwe gape yo o gagamatsang, mme sinoyolo qumba, moithuti wa mophato wa bo 11 go tswa kwa lenasia south, yo a neng a nthusa maabane otlhe go kwala puo eno ya maemo a setšhaba (sona).
zul: samukela futhi ukaputeni wamabhokobhoko (springbok) u-siya kolisi, owahola iqembu elinempokophelo nelibumbene laseningizimu afrika ukuba abanqobi bomhlaba bebhola lombhoxo ngowezi-2019.

tsn: botlhale jwa gagwe, kitso ya gagwe ka merero ya loago, lerato le a nang le lona le kelotlhoko e a nang le yona di nnaya tshepo mo bokamosong jwa naga eno.
zul: kulobu busuku sihlanganyele nomunye umuntu osemncane omangalisayo, unksz sinoyolo qumba, umfundi webanga le-11 wase-lenasia south, ochithe isikhathi esiningi sayizolo engisiza ukubhala lenkulumo ngesimo sezwe.

tsn: mo dipuong tsa me tsa ntlha tsa maemo a naga ke buile thata ka botlhokwa jwa go dirisana mmogo, mmogo le maikarabelo a magolo a re a jereng mo magetleng a rona jaaka puso gore re tlise tirisanommogo le kutlwano.
zul: ubuhlakani bakhe, ulwazi lwakhe ngomphakathi, intshisekelo yakhe kanye nenkuthalo yakhe kunginika ukuziqhenya okukhulu ngekusasa lale lizwe.

tsn: ka ngwaga wa 1994 re utlwane gore re tla buisana, ra itomeletsa mo dintlheng tse dingwe mmogo le go utlwanela kagiso mo legatong la gore re tlhoane le go lwela go ipusulosetsa.
zul: ezinkulumweni zami zokuqala ezimbili ezibhekiswe esizweni ngakhuluma kabanzi ngesidingo sokuhlangana komphakathi, kanye nesibophezelo esikhulu esisemahlombe ethu njengohulumeni ukuqhubela phambili ukusebenzisana kanye nokuvumelana.

tsn: hisetori ya rona le ditiragalo tsa sešweng di re ruta gore fa e le gore re batla go fitlhelela seo re rileng re batla go se fitlhelela, re tshwanetse go tsepamisa mogopolo mo go seo se tla dirang gore re nne ngatana e le nngwe go na le go tsepamisa mogopolo mo go seo se tla tlhotlheletsang gore re se utlwane.
zul: ngonyaka we-1994 sakhetha indlela yokuxoxisana, ukuzehlisa nokuvumelana okunokuthula, kunenzondo nokubuyisela.

tsn: maatla a temokerasi ya rona ya molaotheo, mmogo le lebaka la gore go tlile jang gore e nne teng sebaka seo e se ntseng, ke ka ntlha ya gore re kgonne go golagana ka bontsi go nna ngatana e le nngwe mmogo le go dirisana mmogo, e ka tswa e le ka mo letlhakoreng la kgwebo, la mekgatlho ya badiri, la mekgatlho e e nang le dikgatlhegelo tse di itlhophileng kgotsa ka mo letlhakoreng la mekgatlho e mentsi ya baagi.
zul: umlando wethu kanye nesidlula kukho njengamanje kusifundise ukuthi uma sifuna ukuphumelela kulokhu esizibekele ukukwenza, kumele sibheke kulokhu okuhlanganisayo kunalokho okuhlukanisayo.

tsn: go utlwana le go tlhoma ditirisanommogo ga se kgato ya go ipontsha makoa.
zul: ukufika esivumelwaneni nokwakha izivumelwano zomphakathi akukona ukutshengisa ubuthaka.

tsn: ke go supa botlhokwa jwa seo re leng sona.
zul: kuyingqikithi yokuthi singobani, njengabantu baseningizimu afrika.

tsn: ke ka ntlha ya seno mo dingwageng tse di fetileng di le pedi re ntse re semeletse re leka go tlisa kutlwano mabapi le leano la rona la go busetsa maemo a ikonomi sekeng.
zul: yingakho eminyakeni emibili edlule besisebenza kanzima sifuna ukuqhubela phambili futhi sakhe isivumelwano ngohlelo lwethu lokutakula umnotho.

tsn: fa a ne a eme batho ka lefoko mo puong ya gagwe ya kamogelo ka la bo 10 motsheganong 1994, moporesitente nelson mandela o rile:“gompieno re a dumelana gore re tla tlhoma setšhaba seo maaforika borwa otlhe, a bana ba mmala wa sebilo le a basweu, ba tla kgonang go tsholetsa magetla le difuba tsa bona, go se boikobonyo bope mo dipelong tsa bona, mme ba netefaleditswe tshwanelo ya bona ya go neelwa seriti jaaka batho go ya bosakhutlheng.”puso eno e santse e eme ka lefoko leo ka go tswelela go tsholetsa tumelano eo.
zul: enkulumweni yokugcotshwa kwakhe mhla ziyi-10 kunhlaba ngonyaka we-1994, umongameli u-nelson mandela wathi:“namuhla singena esivumelwaneni sokuthi kumele sakhe umphakathi wonke umuntu waseningizimu afrika, abansundu nabamhlophe, bazokwazi ukuhamba ngokuziqhenya, ngaphandle kokwesaba ezinhliziyweni zabo, baqinisekiswe ngelungelo labo abangeke baphucwe lona lesithunzi somuntu.”lo hulumeni usalokhu uzinikele ngokungephikiswe ukweseka leso sivumelwano.

tsn: ke tumelano e moodi wa yona o gokeletsweng kwa pelong ya dipeelo tsa ditogamaano tsa leano la tlhabololo la bosetšhaba, leo maitlhomo a lona e leng go fedisa lehuma le go fokotsa go tlhoka tekatekano mo ngwageng wa 2030. boammaruri rotlhe re tshwanetse go amogela gore puso ka nosi ga e kitla e kgona go rarabolola marara a a aparetseng ikonomi.
zul: isivumelwano esimiswe enhlosweni yamasu ohlelo lokuthuthukisa izwelonke, okuhloswe ngalo ukuqeda inhlupheko nokunciphisa ukungalingani ngonyaka wezi-2030.

tsn: le fa e le gore re ka tsaya metswedi yotlhe e re nang le yona, le go dirisa madi a mantsi a setšhaba, re ka se kgone go ka solofetsa gore seo tota se tla tlhola ditiro mo baaging ba le dimilionemilione ba ba tlhokang ditiro.
zul: noma besingahlanganisa zonke izinsiza esinazo, siphinde sizifake ezindlekweni ezinkulu zemali yomphakathi, angeke sisodwa sakwazi ukuqinisekisa umsebenzi kubantu abayizigidi abangasebenzi.

tsn: se re nang le sona re se fitlheletse ka go dirisana mmogo.
zul: esesikuzuzile, sikuzuze sisonke.

tsn: go tloga mo sebakeng sa dingwaga di le pedi tse di fetileng – fa ke ne ke eme fano ke neelana ka sona – re ntse re semeletse go dira gore maaforika borwa ba dirisane mmogo go samagana le thothobolo ya dikgwetlho tse re tobaneng le tsona.
zul: eminyakeni emibili edlule - selokhu ngaqala ukuma lapha ukuzokwethula inkulumo ngesimo sezwe - sesisebenzile ukwakha izivumelwano phakathi kwabantu baseningizimu afrika ukubhekana nezinselelo eziphambi kwethu.

tsn: ka samiti ya ditiro re kgonne go golaganya mekgatlho ya badiri, dikgwebo, puso le baagi go tšhotlha ditharabololo tse di mabapi le matsapa a botlhokatiro, mme nna le motlatsamoporesitente re tsweletse go kopana kgafetsakgafetsa fa kgwedi e nngwe le e nngwe e simolola, go kgora dikgoreletsi le go goga kwa pele ditharabololo tse di tla thusang gore re boloke ditiro.
zul: ngezingqungquthela zemisebenzi, silethe umsebenzi, ibhizinisi, uhulumeni nemiphakathi bendawonye ukuthola izisombululo kulolu sizi lokuswelakala kwemisebenzi, futhi siyaqhubeka ukuhlangana ekuqaleni kwanyangazonke, iphini likamongameli kanye nami ukususa izithiyo nokuqhuba phambili izingenelelo ezizokonga futhi zakhe imisebenzi.

tsn: jaaka puso le mekgatlho ya setšhaba re kopantse ditlhogo jaaka re le baagi le mekgatlho ya sedumedi, go tobana le tirisodikgoka e e fetlhiwang ke banna mo basading.
zul: sesihlangane ndawonye, njengohulumeni nomphakathi, imiphakathi nezinhlangano zezenkolo, ukubhekana ngqo nenye inselelo enkulu ewudlame olwenziwa amadoda kwabesifazane.

tsn: re gogetse le dikgwebo, mekgatlho ya badiri le puso gore go thadiwe leano le legolo mo diintasetering tseo di nang le bokgoni jo bogolo jo bo bontshang kgolo.
zul: sesihlanganise abezamabhizinisi, ezabasebenzi nohulumeni ukuza namasu amahle alezi zimboni ezinamandla amakhulu okukhula.

tsn: re kopane jaaka maphata a a farologaneng a puso, jaaka ditheo tse di farologaneng tsa puso, jaaka mekgatlho e e farologaneng a dikgwebo mmogo le jaaka ditlhopha tse di farologaneng tsa setšhaba ka ntlha ya leano le lentšhwa la tiragatso ya kabo ya ditirelo le le ikaegileng ka ditikologo (ddm) leo bogolo le tla fetolang tsela eo re tlhabololang dipusoselegae.
zul: sihlanganyele ndawonye njengemikhakha eyehlukene kahulumeni, njengezinhlaka ezehlukene zombuso, njengezinhlangano zamabhizinisi kanye namaqembu omphakathi ngaphansi kohlelo olusha lokuthuthukiswa kwesifunda oluyisisekelo sokushintsha indlela esibhekana ngayo nokuthuthukiswa kwasekhaya.

tsn: re ntse re tlhola ditirisanommogo tseno go nne ke fela fa go na le tirisanommogo mo re kgonang go nna le tswelopele.
zul: besilokhu sakha izivumelwano zomphakathi ngoba kungokubambisana nokusebenzisana ukuthi singaqhubekela phambili.

tsn: mmogo, mo dingwageng tse pedi tse di fetileng, re ntse re samagane le go ritibatsa maemo a ikonomi le go aga motheo oo kgolo ya rona e tla itsetsepelang ka ona.
zul: sindawonye, eminyakeni emibili edlule, sisebenze ukuletha uzinzo emnothweni wethu nokwakha isisekelo sokukhula.

tsn: re ntse re dira ka bomo go aga sešwa ditheo tsa mo malobeng le go tlosa fa tseleng dikgoreletsi tse di kgoreletsang dipeeletso.
zul: sesibenenhloso ukuphinda sakhe izikhungo sibuye sisuse izithiyo kutshalomali.

tsn: re tsere dikgato tse di maleba tebang le ditiragalo tsa go goga puso ka nko.
zul: sibhekane ngendlela efanele ukumelana nokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane nokulwa nenkohlakalo.

tsn: ka iketlo re kgonne go tokafatsa dikgato tsa phitlhelelo ya thuto, ra tokafatsa boleng jwa tlhokomelo ya boitekanelo le go samagana le ditlhokwa tsa motheo tseo batho ba ba humanegileng ba di tlhokang.
zul: siqhubekile sathuthukisa ukufinyelela emfundweni, sathuthukisa izinga kwezokunakekelwa kwempilo labhekana nezidingo zabantu abampofu.

tsn: le fa go le jalo, seno ga se a lekana.
zul: njengamanje, lokho akukeneli.

tsn: dikgato tseno di santse di sa lekana go ka supolola ikonomi ya rona mo dinaleng tsa phage tseo di tlhodilweng ke diphoso tsa puso ya mo malobeng, kana diphoso tseo di dirilweng ke rona.
zul: akukaze kwenela ukukhulula umnotho wethu efeni elibi lomlando wethu, nasemaphutheni thina ngokwethu esiwenzile.

tsn: ga re a dira go utlwagala go ka efoga matsadi a a tlhodilweng ke kgaolo ya motlakase kgotsa go ka efoka le ona maemo a a bokoa a ekonomi ya lefatshe a a sa itsetsepelang le a a gatelegileng.
zul: akukaze kwenela ukuzisindisa emiphumelweni emibi yokucishwa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga, nasemnothweni ontengantengayo nowehlayo emhlabeni jikelele.

tsn: ke ka ntlha ya seo gompieno re iphitlhelang re le mo maemong ano a re tshwanetseng go tsaya ditshwetso.
zul: ngakho-ke sizithola namuhla sikumzuzu wokuzinqumela.

tsn: go na le se re santseng re ka se dirang.
zul: singazikhethela.

tsn: re ka itlhophela gore go retetse mme ra ineela mo dikgwetlhong tse dintsi tse di boima tsa matsapa a a re busetsang morago ao re tobaneng le ona, kgotsa re ka tobana le tsona mo matlhong, re tsholeditse ditharabololo re tlhometse le ka maikemisetso le ka dikgato tse re tshwanetseng go ka di tsaya.
zul: zinganqotshwa izinkinga ezingapheli eziningi nezinzima ezibhekana nathi, noma singabhekana ngqo nazo, ngezixazululo nokuzimisela kanye nokwenza.

tsn: ka ntlha ya gore rona re itlhophela go tobana le dikgwetlho tsa rona mo matlhong, kgato ya rona ya ntlha, e e botlhokwa le e e tlhamaletseng ke go busetsa maemo a ikonomi ya rona mo thulaganyong ya go o godisa moo botlhe ba tla nnang le seabe.
zul: njengoba sikhetha ukubhekana ngqo nezinselelo zethu, umsebenzi wethu osheshayo, obalulekile nophelele ukubeka umnotho wethu emgudwini wokukhula komnotho okubandakanya wonke umuntu.

tsn: ntle le kgolo ya ikonomi ga go kitla go kgonagala gore re tlhole ditiro, mme fa go sa kgonagale gore re tlhole ditiro ga go kitla go nna le tlhabololo ya boammaruri mo matshelong a batho ba borona.
zul: ngaphandle kokukhula angeke kube khona imisebenzi, ngaphandle kwemisebenzi angeke kube khona ukuthuthukiswa okunenjongo ezimpilweni zabantu bethu.

tsn: ka jalo, sona eno e ka ga kgolo ya ikonomi ya rona, moo botlhe ba tla nnang le seabe.
zul: ngakho-ke lenkulumo echaza isimo sezwe imayelana nokukhula komnotho okubandakanya umuntu wonke.

tsn: e ka ga dikgato tse di botlhokwa tse re tla di tsayang monongwaga go aga puso e e nang le bokgoni le go tsenya tirisong dikgato tse di tla busetsang maemo a ikonomi ya rona sekeng.
zul: imayelana nezinqubo ezibucayi esizozithatha kulo nyaka ukwakha umbuso onekhono nokubeka umnotho wethu endleleni yokululama.

tsn: monongwaga re baakanya tsotlhe tse di botlhokwa.
zul: kulo nyaka, silungisa izisekelo.

tsn: re samagana le dikgaolo tse di botlhokwa go ka kgontsha ikonomi ya rona go gola.
zul: siqhubekisa izindawo ezibucayi zokukhula.

tsn: e bile re tla netefatsa gore togomaano le tiragatso ya go tsaya dikgato mo pusong e nna e e duleng diatla.
zul: futhi siqinisekisa ukwenza kahle kakhulu ekuhleleni nasekusebenzeni kuhulumeni.

tsn: maaforika borwa a gaetsho,e setse e le dingwaga di feta di le lesome maaforika borwa a ntse a pitikisana mo seretseng le matsadi a tlhaelo ya motlakase.
zul: bantu baseningizimu afrika,ngaphezu kweminyaka eyishumi, abantu baseningizimu afrika bekumele babhekane nemiphumela yobunzima bokulethwa kukagesi.

tsn: ke buile go tlala seatla ka karolo e e botlhokwa eo e jarilweng ke eskom mo mererong ya ikonomi ya naga ya rona le mo matshelong a moaforika borwa yo mongwe le yo mongwe.
zul: sengikhulume kabanzi ngendima ebalulekile edlalwa u-eskom emnothweni wezwe lethu nasezimpilweni zabo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika.

tsn: kgaolo ya motlakase e e ntseng e tsweletse mo dikgweding di le mmalwa tse di fetileng e nnile le seabe se se koafaditseng naga ya rona.
zul: ukucishwa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga kwezinyanga ezimbalwa ezedlule kube nomthelela ebuthakathakeni bezwe lethu.

tsn: e re buseditse morago thata mo dikgatong tse re ntseng re di tsaya go ka busetsa sekeng maemo a ikonomi ya rona le mo go tlholeng ditiro.
zul: kuvele kwabuyisela emuva yonke imizamo yethu yokuphinde sakhe umnotho nokukwakha imisebenzi.

tsn: gangwe le gape fa go na le kgaolo ya motlakase, matshelo a batho a a tlhakatlhakana, seno se tlhola gore batho ba tlalelane, ba setisege le go itemogela mathata.
zul: ngaso sonke isikhathi uma kwenzeka, kuphazamisa izimpilo zabantu, idala ukukhungatheka, ukubambezeleka, nobunzima.

tsn: setlhodi se se kwa botengteng jwa kgaolo ya motlakase ke ditlamorago tse di ka se efogiweng tsa eskom go bo e reteletswe mo dingwagangwageng di feta palo – ka ntlha ya go kolotiwa madi a a boitshegang, go tlhoka batho ba ba nang le bokgoni mmogo le dikgato tsa go goga puso ka nko – go tlhokomela madutelo a yona a motlakase.
zul: kumnyombo wayo, ukucishwa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga kungumphumela ongenakugwenywa wokuhluleka kuka-eskom eminyakeni eminingi - ngenxa yesikweletu, ukuntuleka kwamandla kanye nokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane - ukunakekela iziphehlimandla zawo.

tsn: boammaruri ke gore re rata re sa rate re tshwanetse go amogela gore gore eskom e kgone go mekamekana le tlhokomelo le tsosoloso e e botlhokwa mo go tokafatseng tlamelo ya motlakase e e ikaegang, kgaolo ya motlakase e tla tswelela go nna seo se tla tlhokagalang go diriwa go simolola ka ona motsotso oo go leba kwa bokamosong jwa rona.
zul: iqiniso okuzomele silamukele ukuthi ukuze u-eskom akwazi ukulungisa okubalulekile okudingekayo ukwenza ngcono ukuthembeka kokuthunyelwa kogesi, ukucishwa kogesi ngenhloso yokuwonga kuzohlala kuyinto engenzeka esikhathini esizayo.

tsn: moo go sa kgonagaleng gore kgaolo ya motlakase e ka tlodisiwa matlho, go tshwanetswe gore e diragadiwa ka tsela e e tla lemosang batho ka yona nako e santse e le teng go ka fokotsa ditshitiso le ditshenyegelo tsa matlole mo mafelong a tirelo le kwa malapeng.
zul: lapho ukucishwa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga kungenakugwenywa, kumele sikuthathe ngendlela engaqageleka futhi kunciphise ukuphazamiseka nezindleko ezimbonini nasemakhaya.

tsn: mo dikgweding di le mmalwa tse di tlang, jaaka eskom e tla bo e samagane le go tsosolosa tirelo ya yona, re tla tsenya tirisong dikgato tse di tla fetolang tsela e re ntseng re e tshwere ya tlhagiso ya motlakase ka fa nageng ya rona.
zul: ezinyangeni ezimbalwa ezizayo, njengoba u-eskom usebenza ukubuyisa amakhona akhe okusebenza, sizobe sisebenzisa izindlela ezizoguqula ngendlela ebaluleke kakhulu umgudu wokuphehlwa kogesi ezweni lethu.

tsn: re samagane le dikgato tse di latelang go ka oketsa ka bontsi le ka lebelo tlhagiso ya motlakase kwa ntle ga eskom:le tshwanetse go ela tlhoko gore go tloga jaanong ga go sa na magora a a beilweng fa go tsentswe motlakase o o fetang mekawate o le mongwe.
zul: sithatha lezi zinyathelo ezilandelayo ukukhuphula ngokushesha okukhulu umthamo wokuphehlwa kukagesi ngaphandle kwakwa-eskom.

tsn: go ya ka leano la mosupetsatsela le le rebotsweng ngogola, eskom e setse e simolotse ka dithulaganyo tsa yona tsa go kgaoganya ditirelo tsa yona tse tharo – e leng lekala la tlhagiso ya motlakase, tsamaiso ya motlakase le la kabelano ya motlakase – mme lekala le lengwe le le lengwe le tla nna le boto ya lona mmogo le botsamais jwa lona.
zul: okuhambisana namasu ashiwo ngonyaka odlule, u-eskom usuqalile ukuhlukanisa izinhla ezintathu zemisebenzi yakhe - ukukhiqizwa, ukudluliswa kanye nokusatshalaliswa - umsebenzi ngamunye uzoba nebhodi kanye nezinhlaka zawo zokuphatha.

tsn: balekane ba merero ya loago ba ba gokeletsweng ka lenaane la lakgotla la naga la tlhabololo ya ikonomi le ditiro (nedlac) ba ntse ba kopana go samagana le ditshitshinyo di le dintsinyana tse di tlhagisitsweng mo dibekeng di le pedi tse di fetileng gore ba dumelane gore dithulaganyo tsa tirisanommogo mabapi le motlakase go tla samaganwa le tsona jang.
zul: esisebenzisana nabo emphakathini abahlelwa ngaphansi komkhandlu wezwe wokuthuthukisa ezomnotho nezabasebenzi (nedlac) babe nemihlangano lapho bebedingida iziphakamiso eziningana emavikini amabili adlule ukuvuma izimiso zesivumelwano somphakathi ngogesi.

tsn: eno ke kgato e e leng gore ga e ise e tsewe mo hisetoring ya rona e bile ke kgato e e sa tlwaelegang ka ntlha ya gore e supa maikemisetso a matlhakore otlhe a loago a nang le ona mo go tseyeng dikgato tse di tlhokegang le go ikentsha setlhabelo ka moo go tlhokagalang go netefatsa gore ditlhokwa tsa rona tsa motlakase di a fitlhelelwa.
zul: lokhu kungukuthuthuka okuqophe umlando futhi okuqalayo njengoba kubonisa ukuzibophezela kwabobonke esisebenzisana nabo emphakathini ukuthatha izinyathelo ezidingekayo nokunikelela ngokufanele ukubhekana nezidingo zethu zogesi.

tsn: ka tirisanommogo eno badirisanimmogo mo mererong ya loago ba leka go ka tlhagisa eskom e dithulaganyo tsa yona di tsamayang sentle, e e tlhagisang dikuno tsa yona ka tshwanelo e bile e na le matshwanedi a go ka diragatsa tiro e e tlhokegang go ka diriwa, mo go ka tlhagiseng motlakase o o rekegang o baagi ba naga ya rona mmogo le diintaseteri ba ka kgonang go ka o reka.
zul: ngalesi sivumelwano okusetshenziswana nabo emphakathini bafuna u-eskom osebenza kahle, onemiphumela kanye nolungele ukusebenza okhiqizela imiphakathi nezimboni ugesi ngamanani angabizi.

tsn: seno se tlhoka dikgato ka bobedi tse di gagametseng mo ditshenyegelong tsa matlole – go akaretsa le go sekaseka dikonteraka tse di saenilweng ka bokhukhuntshwane – mmogo le dikgato tse di ka kgoboketsang metswedi e e ka fokotsang dikoloto tsa eskom mmogo le go tlamela ka matlole a mangwe mo a tlhokegang.
zul: lokhu kudinga ukuncishiswa okukhulu ezindlekweni - kubandakanya nokubuyekezwa kwezivumelwano zokusebenza ezingalandeli umthetho - nezindlela zokuhlanganisa izinsiza ezizonciphisa isikweletu sika-eskom bese zifaka imali lapho kudingeka khona.

tsn: badirisanimmogo ba rona mo mererong ya loago – e leng mekgatlho ya badiri, ya dikgwebo le mekgatlho ya baagi le ya puso – e ikemiseditse go bokeletsa tlamelo ya matlole gore go kgwonwe go sekaseka matsapa a matlole a a leng gone mo eskom ka tsela e e ka se kgoreletsaneng le tshomarelo ya matlole.
zul: okusetshenziswana nabo emphakathini - izinyonyana zabasebenzi, amabhizinisi, izinhlangano ezibhekele inhlalo yomphakathi kanye nohulumeni - bazinikele ukuthola uxhaso lwezimali ukubhekana nosizi lwezimali lwaka-eskom oluzoyiqhuba isikhathi eside ngokwezimali.

tsn: ba batla go samagana le seno ka ditsela tse di ka se beeng madi a badiri a go rola tiro mo kotsing mmogo le ka ditsela tseo di ka se thulaneng le dithulaganyo tsa tiriso ya matlole.
zul: bazofuna ukukwenza lokhu ngendlela engabeki impesheni yabasebenzi engcupheni futhi engathunazi ubuqotho bohlelo lwezezimali.

tsn: fa ba ntse ba semeletse go konosetsa tumelano eno, nnete ke gore phepelo ya rona ya motlakase e tla tswelela go goga boima go fitlha re bona le go tsenyatirisong ditsela tse dintšhwa tsa tlhagiso ya motlakaseka dikgato tseno tse di tshwanetseng go tsenngwatirisong ka gangwe mmogo le tiro e e santseng e re letile ya go kgaoganya intaseteri ya motlakase, re tla fitlhelela le go reka tlamelo ya motlakase o o rekegang e bile e le wa leruri.
zul: ngesikhathi besebenza ukuqedela lesi sivumelwano, iqiniso ukuthi uhlelo lwethu logesi luzobe lulokhu lukhungathekile koze kuqale ukusebenza kokukhiqizwa kogesi okusha.

tsn: re samagana le kgato eno ya go kgaoganya motlakase ka nako eo phologo e e bediwang motho e tobaneng le matshosetsi a yona a magolo a a bediwang phetogo ya maemo a loapi.
zul: ngalezindlela ezisheshayo nomsebenzi oqhubekayo wokuhlela kabusha isisekelo semboni yethu kagesi, sizozuza ukuthunyelelwa kogesi okuthembekile, ongabizi futhi, ekugcineni, ozosiqhuba isikhathi eside.

tsn: mo maabaneng ke ne ke na le ayakha melithafa, molwelakgaratlho mo mererong ya maemo a loapi go tswa kwa eerste rivier yo a neng a tsenetse kopano ya foramo ya merero ya ikonomi ya lefatshe (wef) kwa teropong ya davos monongwaga e maitlhomo a yona e neng e le go ikuela mo baeteledipeleng mo lefatshe go ema ka dinao go tshegetsa dikgato tse di tshegetsang thibelo ya phetogo ya maemo a loapi.
zul: sithatha lolu guquko olunezinqumo ngomgudu wogesi wethu ngesikhathi lapho abantu bebhekene nokusatshiswa okukhulu osake kwaba khona okungesimo sokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu.

tsn: ayakha o nkopile gore ke netefatse gore ga go ngwana ope wa moaforika yo a tla salelang kwa morago fa re fetola tiriso ya motlake go ka dirisa motlakase o o dirisang khabone e e kwa tlase, maemo a bosa a a kgonang go itsetsepela mmogo le go somarela setšhaba.
zul: izolo ngihlangane no-ayakha melithafa, isishoshovu sesimo sezulu esisesincane sase-eerste rivier esasihambele isigungu esengamele ukuthuthukiswa komnotho emhlabeni e-davos kulo nyaka ukucela abaholi bomhlaba ukuthi babumele baqine ubulungiswa besimo sezulu.

tsn: khomišene ya ga moporesitente e e mabapi le merero ya phetogo ya maemo a loapi e tla netefatsa gore fa re tsena mo tirisong ya motlakese o o dirisang khabone e e kwa tlase ga go ope yo a tlogelwang kwa morago.
zul: u-ayakha ungicele ukuba ngiqinisekise ukuthi ayikho ingane yase-afrika eshiyeka ngemuva oguqukweni oluya emphakathini onciphise ikhabhoni, obekezelela isimo sezulu kanye nozinzile.
